01d0e7f2-b3de-4196-85db-f755446b4c11: A silly and endless story about how some kids kill time while repeating July 7th every day.
af857779-a400-46ef-917a-3b3a248e2221: The sequel series to "Kinnikuman ii sei".     A new threat appears to defeat the Legends, known only as the 'Time Chojin'. These mysterious villains travel through time, in their quest to eradicate the Justice Chojin. If their plan succeeds, they will erase the New Generation from history and usher in a new era of evil domination over the humans.     The New Generation must travel through time to stop the Time Chojin.    In the process, they earn the distrust of the Legends. The ensuing conflict triggers the start of the 'Ultimate Chojin Tag Tournament', which will pit Legends against New Generation, and Justice Chojin vs Evil Chojin. The winners will determine the future of the planet as we know it and reign supreme over Earth.
8300b59b-0d57-4681-b2b7-c4bbfc811dae: This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live. Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...!? A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank "Taranis"' and fight to save their families!
fbf326f7-ccbd-4d54-bbad-852d76e46523:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.
60e976fb-99ee-4d12-9656-ba31662f2bf7: For the sake of saving her most precious person, the fourteen-year-old girl Ai Wen enters a time machine. However, before she knows it, she has accidentally travelled to the future! There, she meets Ulysses and many other previously unimaginable characters…
290c8cbc-d3de-4fca-b7d6-8d72f3beb9b0:
***I want a do over for the me who had no courage to speak of, and be born again as a new me.***

Koharu Kanba, who spent her gloomy high school days as a "social outcast", will now restart her life!!

(Source: CyComi)
6dee370f-cfed-4101-88f9-f2840750ad8c:
Yukito Takahashi, a G-rank adventurer, has spent decades being mocked as useless because no matter how much he leveled up, his stats never improved. Even as he grew older, he dreamed of being young again and stronger, but he died during an adventure without ever getting better.

However, after his death, something unbelievable happened—a mysterious message appeared:
"A critical bug in the status system has been found. Your life will be rolled back."

With that, Yukito was sent back to his younger self, but this time, all his stats were maxed out at 9999! Now with godlike powers, Yukito can live the life he always dreamed of.

This is not your typical story of an unlucky protagonist—it's a tale of ultimate luck and overwhelming power! Get ready for a thrilling adventure where luck changes everything!
417bcbea-aff7-4690-b337-cdefce7a3ac5: Based on two of Shakespeare’s most beloved supporting characters, Everywhere and Nowhere follows the time travelling adventures of best friends Anne Guildenstern and William Rosencrantz, as they explore, fight and flirt their way through history. Their first stop is Ancient Greece, where the pair find themselves at the right hand of a very charismatic Greek leader loved by men and women alike, who also may just be bringing his people to the brink of war.
85240fb4-e5b1-4fe3-9485-51066164d9b2: Yugo, who is deeply in love with the heroine, Shiina, has witnessed her death countless times. His abnormal love for her has given him the power of a magical gun to transcend space and time. However, every reset comes at a cruel cost: causing her memories to fade one by one. Even so, his burning flame of love never fades. To save Shiina from her untimely demise, and until Yugo can reach the one irrefutable "proof of love"—a kiss—he won't stop pulling the trigger.
0f13d05a-dacf-43ff-93ca-165523e55a46:
"Only I can see the future in this deadly game."

Yoon-Jae leads an empty life after his wife and daughter are brutally murdered. One day, his journal reveals one mysterious sentence: "You can see them again."

Yoon-Jae is pulled into a parallel universe where everyone is a player in a lethal game, and the final survivor will be granted any wish. 

Desperate to be reunited with his family, will Yoon-Jae succeed in fighting his way in this hellish world to be the last one standing?

17a56d33-9443-433a-9e0d-70459893ed8f: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.
48414850-6adf-4073-8591-2402ff47e74c: The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again! The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided! Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
a9c157f6-a720-4adc-87a4-79a3601aa4e8:
Reaching his limit due to daily work, the corporate slave Enami Shuusuke collapses on the station platform one day. In that moment, memories of his childhood friend, Yorumiya Hina, who died in an accident, flash before his eyes.

"I'm sorry, I couldn't save you then."

As Shuusuke falls into a deep sleep bearing regret, he finds himself time-leaping back 10 years!
53f1ec5e-058b-4d18-a23b-2a7dbca5669f:
Cecil Perdium, the Mercenary King, was killed in battle before he could avenge his family. As he faces death, he learns that Duke Delphine, the man who caused the downfall of his family, didn't work alone. 

Suddenly waking up as his teenage self, Cecil must work to both overcome his poor reputation and build up his strength to save his family. With their soldiers and knights defecting due to the harsh conditions they must endure, he has his work cut out for him. 

Can Cecil become the mighty warrior he once was and avert his family's fate?
a5f5c315-e735-4670-83be-e8894e4097dc:
An empire stained with blood

That day, consumed by the cursed sword, I cut down the people I loved most with my own hands.

Fifteen years have passed under its curse. Now, having claimed all ten legendary swords forged by man, I made a wish upon the holy sword.

"Take me back—to the time I killed anyone."

Time rewound to the moment before all tragedies began. And yet, the sword remained in my hand.

This time, I won't succumb in the same way. Neither the cursed sword, nor fate, nor anyone else will control me again.

"There won't be a second miracle.
This time, I will find happiness."
8145f3de-efb1-42ba-973d-f248d6665402: Dragon Ball: New Hope is a fan-manga that tells an alternative story of the Cell saga, where Gohan is defeated by the villain.
a4304d3b-191d-471f-8c78-353d403a35d0:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god's whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world. She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere. And that girl can do no more than a single thing... Survive the Sengoku Era – that's all.
___

Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/62898/)  
Alternative Manga Raw: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3714)
4a973243-952e-44d7-a50f-883b4b7c9cc2:
In dem mysteriösen, einem RPG Dungeon ähnelnden Turm lebt der alle berühmten Hunter beneidende Gong-Ja Kim sein alltägliches Leben.
Eines Tages wird sein Wunsch nach mehr mit einem legendären Skill beantwortet, mit dem er die Fähigkeiten anderer kopieren kann ... auf Kosten seines eigenen Lebens.
Bevor er einen Sinn daraus ziehen kann, wird er vom Rang 1 Hunter, dem Flame Emperor, ermordet!
Das aktiviert aber seinen Skill und nun besitzt er einen neuen, nämlich die Möglichkeit, durch seinen Tod in der Zeit zurückzureisen.
Wie wird Gong-Ja dieses Skills nutzen, um seine Konkurrenz zu überflügeln und die Spitze zu erreichen?
418f03bc-3e57-4ecf-b081-495a9e879cd1: This is the horizontal version of "Haibara-kun's Strong and Youthful New Game", which is available exclusively in digital format.
e049c08e-86d1-43df-b27d-065ee448972c:
"Luo Qingtong, a young lady from the 24th century who ranked first among those with superpowers, miraculously transmigrated into a different world. There, she begins her journey of vengeance as the crippled, oldest daughter of a duke from the lower kingdoms, where villains line up to get face-slapped and scumbags and manipulative bitches wait to get tortured!

An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth. She'll exterminate anyone who offends her! All is going well... but then she accidentally gets involved with a man of peerless beauty, whom she attempts to flirt with whenever she's unable to win against him in a fight. From there on, it becomes a story about their romantic pursuits..."
05d90d16-6530-46c9-8593-80664caf4871: Godai, a policeman, who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka, a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened, is that even possible and what will be the consequences?
0cfcda3b-0dcb-459b-9931-aa823e7bf403:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
72b3ae65-f936-42b7-966a-891014ddebf4:
From Nyan-Nyan Rampage:  
  
"The final arc of the story begins…  
  
When Takao Osugi receives the mysterious "Universe of the Four Gods" book from his mentor, Einosuke Okuda, he does everything to keep it away from his young daughter, Suzuno. But when disaster strikes Tokyo, can he still protect her from her fate?  
  
Shortly after the tragic finale of Genbu Kaiden, young Suzuno Osugi's tale as the Priestess of Byakko beings to unfold!"
85a8ebda-9959-4244-ad03-a2d9f6a746a2:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!
ea0e7020-2b2f-4f17-9251-fee3632dc135: Kiska, a boy who was mistreated by the villagers, was able to get by thanks to his childhood friend, Namia, who was the only one who stood by him. One day, Namia is found murdered in the village. Kiska is framed for the murder by the other villagers, and banished to an inescapable S-class dungeon...?
429d98fa-1352-4adf-94d1-969efafec386: When the duke, who was in poor condition, suddenly died, the land fell into the hands of the rebels. In a short time, the rebellion was suppressed by the royal family, but… The point is that I, Lise Estelle, will be hanged for treason. “It’s not fair!” I’m simply the best doctor in the area. If that’s the case, I’ll become the duke’s doctor this time so there’s no rebellion, and I’ll make the duke’s heir healthy! “No one cares about you as much as I do. Therefore, you must definitely listen to me !
db1f4c31-f92f-4f4f-a8c6-fc898e432888:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.
c0bdc917-50d6-44df-8349-a702e5466951:
From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?
773c2211-750b-4fff-bd64-c914986e4637:
Zephyr kämpft als letzter Überlebender der Menschheit gegen das Böse in einer von den Göttern verlassenen Welt. Als er in einer Schlacht von Tartarus, dem Gott der Zerstörung, getötet wird, scheint alle Hoffnung für die Menschheit verloren. Doch Zephyrs Schicksal ist nicht besiegelt. Die Götter, für die seine Kämpfe als Unterhaltung dienen, geben ihm eine zweite Chance und schicken ihn zehn Jahre in die Vergangenheit, als er noch ein Sklave war und nicht der mächtigste Mensch der Welt. Kann Zephyr sich an Tartarus rächen und die Frau retten, die er liebt, oder ist er dazu verdammt, die Vergangenheit zu wiederholen?

2f925660-0d7d-4ad4-bd88-6db9ffc3649f:
One winter day, Selim succumbed to the Devil's Temptation and transformed into a Demon. Before being killed by the Hero, he slaughtered the people of the Royal Capital and the nobles, and pulled the trigger for the devils to invade the Kingdom. After Selim's death, the devils overthrew the Royal Capital and destroyed the Kingdom. Selim, who was trapped by the devil and watched the Kingdom fall, somehow found himself returning to his 14-year-old self. A message written on a transparent panel floats in front of him.

"You have become a seeker. By doing the right things and accumulating virtues, your level will increase."
e657d5b8-f90b-4e55-b00f-d204bbbecc62:
"I'll kill the Demon Lord who's trying to wipe out humanity no matter what it takes..."

In a desperate battle against the Demon Lord, Link loses one of his dearest friends. Fueled by his comrade's dying wish, he unleashes a desperate final blow. But it's not enough. The Demon Lord’s army of magical beasts overwhelms humanity, and the world falls. Link should've died. And yet... he wakes up, back in time, as his ten-year-old self?! Now, with the memories and battle experience from his past life, Link vows to change the future. This time, he'll do whatever it takes to defeat the Demon Lord once and for all.
77ae6d99-0d2d-4f63-8903-6246cac20897: In the Tearmoon Empire, the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least, she was supposed to have been! Instead, she woke up as her twelve-year-old self?? To avoid the guillotine in her second life, she won't repeat her past failures... "F-For me, something of this level is an easy task!" Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy, timid princess image, she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!
eb4c3542-46a5-4ffa-ae1c-a038353a8b0c:
Everyone adored my stepsister, Loena. And I, her elder sister Siché, hated her.

“Loena. I really hate you.”

After losing everything, Siché left behind those final words and ended her life before Loena’s eyes.

That should have been the end...

“My name is Loena. Are we going to be family now?”

Life began to repeat itself. Cruelly, hopelessly so.
86d25eac-eb2f-4ec0-a341-f1a5cbbe80b8:
Love, friendship, and a glorious adolescence—that’s what Hodoka Nanamura hoped for when he entered high school. But by his final year, he had none of it. Then, on the eve of graduation,  he sacrifices himself to save his classmate, Sora Hanamitsuji, from on oncoming truck, ending his life… Or so it should have.

Instead, he and Hanamitsuji were both transported back in time to their first year of high school, just before the entrance ceremony. Though Nanamura resigned himself to reliving the same unremarkable, lonely high school years, Hanamitsuji swears that she’ll drag him out of his loner lifestyle!

With a second chance at high school, Nanamura gets to experience the best (and worst) coming-of-age romcom of his life!

*Source: Manga UP! Global*
39c6c068-cdfb-42c7-9c1d-4245c283eed7: Twenty-six-year-old Shibakusa Tohru is about to make his major label debut when his bandmates fire him. In the midst of his despair, he learns that his former classmate Shigure Narahara, now a top singer, has committed suicide. Tohru, who had been a devoted fan of Shigure, loses his emotional anchor and jumps off a balcony to follow her, but instead of dying, he finds he has taken a time leap back to his high school days.
f019b88d-d1c9-461c-851a-7690df063496:
ميخائيل والبورجس، الساحر الوحيد ذو الدائرة التاسعة في العالم، سقط في معركة بسبب بطل ملعون، وتمكن من إلقاء تعويذة سحرية أخيرة متقدمة، <العودة في الزمن>، مع هذه القدرة، عاد قبل ٢٠ عامًا. “حسنًا. سأصبح البطل بدلا من ذلك”

c28cf15d-8eda-43ea-b06c-aca6a8d74500:
That day, when I met you, my world, where I couldn't even speak, was filled with music.

High school student Fujieda Yuzuki is a kind girl who is liked by everyone. She prioritizes the people around her - her friends and her boyfriend - and hides her true feelings. She's not good at using her own voice. Putting others first had been Yuzuki's way of life up until then. That is, until she met you.

One day, Yuzuki comes across a girl singing and playing the guitar on the street. Unable to forget the voice, she was humming a tune alone in the classroom after school when the girl from that time, Terada Hinata, appeared. It turned out to be a student at the same high school. What's more, she spoke to him, saying, "I've come from the future to save you" --!?

A girl meets girl x school youth story!!

(Source: Young Ace Up, translated)
1e998205-8c48-4e27-b82b-a01b2d3b1f52:
After learning 15 miserable years of his life as a failed gamer was one long nightmare, Lee Eojin is glad to be a newbie again! Vowing not to repeat the same mistakes, Eojin starts anew as the hotshot, Stagnant Water. 

He’s conquering monsters, getting sweet gear, and making enough dough to set himself up for life!

 Loved by fans and hated by foes, both old and new, will Eojin break the game and triumph, or will the game break him once again?
a08f45d1-788a-4b7c-b1c4-b87b083e1b59:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
812f9696-048f-496d-9ed4-84c99345d1fb:
Nie Li became the strongest Demon Spiritualist and stood at the pinnacle of the martial world. However, he lost his life during the battle with the Sage-Emperor and six deity-ranked beasts.  
  
His soul was then brought back to when he was still 13 years old. At this point in his life, Nie Li was considered to be the most pathetic of his peers. However, with the vast knowledge he accumulated from his previous life (his future), he began becoming stronger faster than anyone could expect. He also decided to help those who died nobly in his previous life become stronger as well.  
  
Aiming to avert the future destruction of his home by demon beasts, and to avoid his previous fate of ending up destroyed, Nie Li fights to protect his lover, friends, family and fellow citizens who died in the beast assault or its aftermath. He also aims to destroy the so-called "sacred family," who will abandon their duty and betray the city.
3d76302e-6e94-4769-9e6d-7c4dc2e37574: She is a girl that everyone loves but she cannot speak of the love she has for her brother because her brother already loves someone else. In despair, she gets dragged into Ancient Egypt by a snake shaped bracelet that is engraved with a three thousand year old love oath. There, she meets the Pharoah's heir, a party boy….
01e360bc-22da-4e86-bbb7-3ae1091a223b: The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But... it was too late. The Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed Hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn't matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster.
61d791a6-a017-40bf-9e5b-29d9182301b3: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
5283351f-a4e3-4699-af58-021864b5e062:
Born in the remote countryside, Ryuuto's childhood friends were a cheat of a female hero and a wise man. One day at the age of 16, he was killed by a wise man, who was his childhood friend. Soon, Ryuto was reincarnated as a villager. Get the "effort cheat" and the "knowledge cheat"! Although the status is the weakest, he is capable of even saving a hero!

1849fc45-8c4c-4d29-9242-5f35ea689023:
Born as the successor of a low-ranking noble household, Raven Varte wears the sin of plotting a rebellion against the empire. To be granted amnesty, he was sent to fight demons alongside the worst corp of the empire, the ”Demon” corp. Most say that it is a place where most won’t survive for even a year, but Raven somehow managed to survive for ten. When his amnesty was in front of his eyes, on his last battlefield, he met the ‘Successor of the Pendragon Duke Household, Eren Pendragon.

6a468761-5bd6-4de0-a0cb-47cb456ac2e0:
"Jetzt, wo ich zurückgekehrt bin, werde ich keinen meiner Liebsten wieder sterben lassen!" Das Labyrinth der Schatten - die tödlichste Katastrophe, der die Menschheit jemals gegenüberstand. Desir Arman, einer der sechs Überlebenden der Menschheit, befindet sich im Labyrinth. Die sechs versuchen gemeinsam, die letzte Prüfung des Labyrinths zu meistern, scheitern aber, woraufhin die Welt untergeht. Aber als sich Desir gerade auf sein Ende vorbereitet, erscheint plötzlich vor ihm die Welt … von vor 13 Jahren?! Desir ist in die Vergangenheit zurückgekehrt, in eine Zeit, als er Schüler an der besten Magierschule seines war. Er und seine Liebsten wurden wieder vereint, und er ist entschlossen, dieses Mal sie und die Welt zu retten! Es bleiben noch drei Jahre bevor die Schattenwelt erscheint! Ändere die Vergangenheit und versammle mächtige Kameraden um dich, um die Menschheit zu retten!

514f1a94-b09f-4331-8cf9-0f01d06d3b80:
Is dying repeatedly a blessing? 

Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! 

Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
0ee2b91f-803a-4d0d-b0b4-a5b36b5a7fb8:
This is the tale of the members of a [Beatles](https://mangadex.org/title/877aa28e-5c75-469c-84b1-4730bd321f53) cover band in Tokyo who find themselves 
transported back in time to 1961 -before anyone had ever heard of the Beatles-   
and decide to take the mantle of the world's greatest rock band for themselves!  
But will they dare to pursue this dream until the end ?
913c9907-04b0-4926-ad8f-8304c79d5d2c:
Years into the future, the world is infested with mutated insects. Society has split — the privileged live in safety, while the poor struggle to survive. Among them are the Scavengers, a community living in a bunker. They venture out daily into the overgrown, dangerous surface, scavenging resources from the abundant flora brought by the infestation.
‎
‎Despite their struggles, the Scavengers have found a sense of contentment in their harsh reality. But when certain events unfold, the community is faced with complications that threaten their way of life — and thus, the story begins.
630fcb7b-a262-4c92-b0c7-1323392f1b67:
Prince Rudolf gained knowledge of the future 300 years from now during a near-death experience. He uses his wits to change the future in which he will be assassinated as a tyrant prince.
Meanwhile, discrepancies between the story passed down to posterity and reality gradually emerge...
c14b2a85-ca88-4bf7-8937-87baf95491c0: Though a bit of a fool, but hardworking, Suku, a second-year high school student and the new student council president, is in love with his reliable vice president, Ririka. However, for some reason, they always end up fighting. One day, Suku gathers the courage to confess to Ririka, but at that moment, he falls into a time loop. Every time he confesses, the loop resets! How can he ever date Ririka? A romantic comedy with a sci-fi twist, offering a heartwarming school story!
a4b39b6e-a448-4644-a540-64ceff1d8305:
"Hanako-san, Hanako-san... are you there?"

At Kamome Academy, rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries, one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building, Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro, an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance, ventures into this haunted bathroom... but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san... is a boy!
___
**Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.
7f15e45c-b7fd-4164-8d8e-ede14a817f0d:
Ed Rothstaylor is a third-rate villain in a game, disowned by his family and kicked out of the dormitory for his misdeeds. One day, our main character wakes up as this very Ed, and realizes he must earn a scholarship so he can graduate and be set for life. 

Now living in the woods, he resolves to keep away from the protagonists, but four of the female leads just won't leave him alone. Not only that, his presence starts to change the timeline and events of the game! 

Can Ed help the story progress while staying out of the limelight?

---
***Note:** LINE Webtoon (Official English) has made changes to the main character's "original emotional facial expressions" in some chapters like for examples, CH.01, CH.02 and CH.06 is changed while it's kept in all other official language platforms.*
48a824ad-0af3-43ec-ab4f-86eee00212e8:
Only on the verge of death did I realize I'd been deceived my entire life by my perfect twin sister. Shocked by the betrayal, I wished I could just close my eyes... but when I opened my eyes, I was back in my childhood!? 

I had to pretend to be a princess with my sister without letting her know I was a twin! Now that I'm back, I won't just live like in my past life, being taken advantage of by my sister. The relationship with my family I'd longed for, the friendships I had with my friends, the healing power I hadn't realized in my past life. I'll make then all mine! 

Then, by chance, I met the talking bird, Yan. He told me that if I didn't protect him, the kingdon would fall. 

What did he mean? Will I be able to survive?
58466383-f787-4167-85e4-1d3ac8e4ced1: Akio, a compassionate and empathetic individual, comes to the aid of Mel, an enchanting elf who unexpectedly finds herself in another world while on her journey home. Initially, Mel sees Akio as her savior and offers to serve him, but instead, Akio decides to share his life with her for a while. This unexpected encounter profoundly alters Akio's life, which was previously fraught with challenges.
59207236-197a-4a3b-8745-a3f1a7bf8855:
After countless regressions, Persepe finally conquers all five male protagonists in a harrowing reverse harem game. Just when she thinks she’s free, a message appears:  

*Secret Mode unlocked! Find the true male lead to escape.*  

Hope reignites — she only needs to woo the real protagonist to return to her original world. But there’s one problem...

"So… who’s the real male lead?"

With no clear answers and hidden challenges, Persepe must navigate shifting alliances, cryptic clues, and her own growing feelings. 

Can she uncover the truth and finally break free? Or will she remain trapped in the game forever?
56d0205b-221f-4709-89ec-9840e89754ed:
Tiana's engagement was broken off by the prince of her own country, and she was sentenced to exile. However, the knight of a neighbouring country, who was an aide to that country's prince, suddenly proposed to her. Since he was her type, Tiana accepted the marriage proposal and traveled with him to his country, but what awaited her was an unjust death. However, although she should have died, Tiana finds herself back when her engagement was broken and she was proposed to by the knight!

"Now... Now it's too late... I'll have to kill her."

The last words the knight spoke before killing her lingered in her mind. But Tiana doesn't want to die again! Terrified, she tries to refuse the marriage proposal, but she can't escape from the knight who has gone completely crazy! A cat-and-mouse rom-com about Tiana, whose memories construe murderous intent, and a knight who refuses to let her escape and gets more and more yandere...
___
[Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7132gu/) (R18)
7cdafb87-bde5-4025-aba0-36efd9432a61: An isekai series from the creator of Hellsing. The story of Drifters begins during Japan's Sengoku Period (~1467-1600), a time of constant warring between the island's states. A samurai on the verge of death suddenly finds himself thrown into another, fantastic world, alongside important military figures from history. It's time to battle in a brand-new world war.
ef816178-1c37-4d2e-942d-05932505ef3a:
A five-year employee at Hanpyeong Industries, Kim Yi-Wol, a proxy fan of his manager's daughter, has been working unpaid overtime as a proxy fan for five years. 

He collapses after hearing the news of his group's disbandment. When he opens his eyes, he finds himself back in his 20s, with no dark circles under his eyes. He's given the task of invalidating his sister's death by having to debut with the group he proxy-fancied, Spark. 

Failure is met with the dreaded additional condition: re-employment at Hanpyeong Industries and the inability to change jobs. 

With the grim determination and grit honed through his experience as a proxy fan, HR team member, and various other chores, he's determined to debut and then quit!
b05f3623-9f39-4464-ab5c-e75b07ea5c6d: In order to escape the confines of life in the harem, Liang Jian travels a thousand years into the future. During an archaeological dig, the tomb of Emperor Sheng is unearthed, and his body is put on display in a museum. Hoping to finally sever his ties to the past, Liang Jian visits the museum to say his last goodbye to Sheng Mingzhou. But unexpectedly... Sheng Mingzhou is resurrected?!
ec96fc62-975a-4abf-83e3-d2426ca8fbe6:
Von klein auf lebte Artezia Rosan in dem Glauben, sie könne ein glückliches Leben führen, solange ihr Bruder erfolgreich ist. Als Meisterin der Manipulation und Intrigen wurde sie das wichtigste Hilfsmittel ihres Bruders, um den Thron des Imperiums zu erobern. Genau deshalb traf sie der Verrat ihres Bruders so hart, als sie für ihre Taten gefesselt und gefoltert wurde. Nachdem sie von Großherzog Cedric Ebron gerettet wird, nutzt sie eine verbotene Magie und opfert ihr eigenes Leben, um ihm zu helfen, dem grausamen Kaiser ein Ende zu setzen. Die Ereignisse nehmen eine seltsame Wendung, als sie einige Jahre in der Vergangenheit aufwacht und schwört, Großherzog Cedric um jeden Preis zu helfen, selbst wenn dies bedeutet, ihre eigene Familie aufzugeben. Man sagt, Blut ist dicker als Wasser, aber kann Artezia es schaffen, ihren Bruder zu besiegen, während ihre eigene Romanze inmitten des Chaos erblüht?

---
* [Official Translation (DE)](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-villainess-lives-again-de)
eca26ba4-74d9-4391-9e0c-5a15c6f1fab4:
What would you do if you have reincarnated into a vulnerable wolf pup? Need an answer, now!

For survival, Chiye chose to wag his tail and address the vampire nemesis “Papa”, living a miserable, meaningless life. Chiye: Fucking stupid idiot (arwoo arwoo papa) Fan Shiye: Good, become my noble pet! Poop Shoveller x Noble Pet — what kind of sparks will fly between the two who used to be enemies in this life? And will Chiye reclaim everything that was rightfully his in his previous life?
58b30222-4077-47cd-a888-4f112d629f2f:
“Let the survival game begin!”

Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology, humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators. 

Jin Jae-hui, sent back in time during the final stage of the game, arrives at one conclusion - only Kang Sion has the power to lead humanity to victory.
c19e7ff1-36c4-430a-a92a-884716963ea9:
We all know the isekai formula. The MC is always some nobody, they wake up in a perfect body, and they always end up dominating their new world. Sure, Satoru got the first two tropes, but he sure didn’t choose to be reborn as an evil king in his ex-girlfriend’s otome game. He’ll have to quickly figure things out before the hero slays him and his villainess daughter…. all while dealing with sexy magicians, handsy kings and a craving for men’s… *ahem* spiritual energy. Forty-five might be a bit late for a sexual awakening, but better late than never, right?  
  
*Note: This is a all new original English comic.*  


---
39ed85ab-d508-4839-855e-98e8a0376265: An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case!
e91dcdd1-005c-457d-a6c0-84f3fe22c1b0:
Frey Raon Starlight was the hero who killed his family and comrades and destroyed the world. His goal was to return to the past, unlock a "hidden route" to truly save the world, and achieve peace.

As planned, he successfully returns to the past and gains access to the hidden route. However, his relief is short-lived as he is confronted with an unexpected truth: the five heroines he killed in his previous life have retained their memories and are now trying to kill him...!

Can Frey, under such extreme circumstances, save the world this time?
f0f62b75-5989-4f32-9b59-ab56abe35fc1:
Chung Myung, The 13th Disciple of the Mount Hua Sect, One of the 3 Great Swordsmen, Plum Blossom Sword Saint, defeated Chun Ma, who has brought destruction and disarray onto the world. 

After the battle, he breathes his last breath on top of the headquarter mountain of the Heavenly Demon Sect. 

He is reborn after 100 years in the body of a child. ……What? The Mount Hua Sect has fallen? What kind of nonsense is that!?

5c9716ba-acdf-4592-bade-c2f1e1a74eae: A clap of thunder on a clear day sent depressed salaryman Yi Qiu ten years into the past. Now, with the opportunity to revisit highschool as a girl and interact with her former friends…and her former self…she'll encounter action, occasional romance, more tangential subplots than you can shake a stick at…and just maybe, the possibility of changing history for the better.
46e9a772-184d-498b-8553-6e0801545f12:
Fate/Grand Order official comicalize start!

In 2000 AD, the bottom of the mountain range in Central Asia... In a place where no obvious wars or incidents have been confirmed, "Organization for the Preservation of Human Order, Chaldea" finds the existence of a Singularity. Ritsuka Fujimaru and his team started the Rayshift immediately...
ca5fb826-a0be-4c9b-8b38-13c0a444c86b: In the mysterious institution of Familie, girls are raised in isolation. Kurumi, a resident child, falls asleep the day before her 10th birthday. When she next awakes, 14 years have passed. The curtain opens on this tale of misfortune, following Kurumi's journey in an unfamiliar place, surrounded by friends who have long since grown up, and ridden with missing memories.
3148c0b5-807d-4ee8-8298-9ee0ef7dfbf2:
Sanayama Kazura, a girl who just wants to be loved, discovers that the girl she had been spending all of her money on to look her way has betrayed her. In her moment of despair, she is approached by Yoshibe Kinka, who asks if she would like to die with her. Together, they head to the top of a high-rise apartment bulding and jump off it. However...

A story of two women at a crossroads in their lives, facing the feelings they've kept deep inside their hearts.
e07658fd-f09f-4f82-8a6b-03993855f480:
Leo Zeal aims to become an adventurer and arrives in Innsbruck, a town built around the great labyrinth where the Demon King lives. After losing consciousness after being caught up in the collapse of the Demon King's statue, Leo remembers that he is the reincarnation of Hirase Yoshito, a Japanese man who died in an unexpected accident. 

Determined to succeed as an adventurer so as not to repeat the misery of his past life, Leo spends the day actively and goes to sleep looking forward to tomorrow. However, when Leo wakes up, he has been transported to the moment when the Demon King's statue collapses again. All the events that occur from there are the same as "what he experienced yesterday," and Leo realizes that the day is in a loop...! 

What will Leo's fate be? 

A slightly ecchi x time loop x otherworldly fantasy begins!
319c5d91-fcd1-4e3b-adb5-def7b279f849: In a world where half of humanity's territory has been taken by demons, Balt, who bears the crest of the hero, is the hope of humanity. Just before his 17th birthday and his heroic powers awaken, Balt learns a certain truth…
c8ae1a87-fdd9-477f-977f-6d4b2aedcd58: The main character is reborn as a character from a game he played in his previous life. This character falls into ruin along with the villainess, spending the last of their years together. A man named Kururi Helan. No details of this decline is written inside the game, it can´t be understood why this sub-character ended up with the villainess route. However, that is of no importance. Living as a needy farmer along with someone is unpleasant, so the main character seeks a profession. For now, he aims for becoming a blacksmith as he originally had skill in it.
3bca85e3-e5db-4535-9556-8d1f1baa1591: This is an interstellar era represented by warships as the supreme force, the cruelest age, and the gorgeous age! Wang Dong was reborn and returned twenty years ago… Explore countless unknown civilizations, harvest the origin of civilization, and strengthen himself! What’s even worse is that he still has a system! Your battleships and modules will be raffled, but mine is optional! Rebirth + System! What are you fighting with me? Steer the most powerful warship and smooth out all dissatisfaction!
9a5b657d-b6db-45a7-a2b7-b165884d9603: Anastasia, an elf renowned as a once-in-a-millennium magical talent, faces the final battle of a three-way war in another world. In the midst of battle with her arch enemies, the demon race, Anastasia is enveloped in an intense light and, when she awakens, finds herself on an uninhabited island. As Anastasia strolls around the island, a mysterious human appears before her, but she can no longer use magic…!?
ce25484a-6be2-4f29-807c-569dfed8a091:
Junpei, a loner high school boy, became a gyaru after saving the God of Gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Junpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___

In a world where the demon lord had been defeated and peace had arrived, Rex the magical doctor ran a clinic. But the patients brought in were all beyond saving compared to the world itself, people who'd XXX slimes or stuck their peens into man-eaters!? An otherworld perverted medical comedy begins!!

04789891-74e5-49e8-896e-63a09f2e8f56: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
b65fbf0e-6768-407d-ba79-fa9fcb319155:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
394398f2-6287-48c7-9713-cd1759c97291:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

af1f3853-6b99-44a2-b01d-28e9ce9a1e05: With no friends, family, or romance to speak of, Haruka has lived his life just going through the motions—until the day he awakens in the body of a beautiful, and womanly, dark elf! Suddenly, a world beyond his wildest imagination awaits, and uncontainable excitement races through him. There's just one problem: He gave up on putting himself out there a long time ago and has no idea how to strike up a conversation with other people. Teenagers and (other) women are certainly no exception. But with a bottomless well of mana and a ridiculously tough body to boot, Haruka won't let any overthinking get in the way this time. Little by little, the dark elf works past his (her) fears and self-doubt, forging deep bonds with precious new friends and growing together with them.
1ec8e64b-8e4f-4792-9adb-f54ee08f4145: In this world, there exists individuals known as "Majin": supernatural beings able to wield unique powers. They live among the normal human beings, but the divide created between the Majin and the normal human race is severe. There exists a school known as Dangerosu, where the population ratio of Majin students exceeds that of any other high school. In this school, two groups known as the "Banchou Group" and the "Seitokai" face each other in war, but they have created a balance of power, resulting in a temporary peace. Now, with the inclusion of new students, this balance of power is about to collapse. One of the "normal" students, Ryouseiin Otome is forced to choose sides before the beginning of Armageddon.
65edff57-699d-4ce2-a068-7d3ad0398855:
Sanghyeon Kim has the talent and the drive to become a K-pop star—but one thing keeps holding him back: a false school bullying accusation.
After countless rejections, his dream feels more distant than ever.

But when the head director of a major entertainment company hands him a mysterious bath bomb that transforms him into his past-life self, he's suddenly staring at an unbelievably beautiful... woman?

Sanghyeon's second shot at fame is about to begin—in the most unexpected way!

(Source: WEBTOON)
8e74e420-b05e-4975-9844-676c7156bd63:
Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles.
His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father.
But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!
ff442aab-7908-40bc-8d10-93c6bb318466:
Day 1: Recently my eyes seem to be a bit off, always seeing strange things. Wait, the cabinet seems to be moving, I'll go check it out.
......
Day 13: I see them! Damn! Why is this world full of monsters!?
......
Day 101: There's nothing to be afraid of anymore! Donning a witch's gown, I've become a monster myself!
9fc391db-1810-4e72-842d-8151155bbe0f: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...
d1c0e69b-b270-4cb5-a046-c21ccacb3df9: The main character, Otaku-kun, is awakened to his special sexual proclivities through a series of happening interactions with girls of different races! Can you keep your reason?
af2f1d6b-0173-4fea-9871-acbccdb61d9e: Two girls who want to become idols are entering into their long dreamed school—Kiraboshi-juku—Kiraboshi Nadeshiko and her close friend Mangetsu Sakurako. These two are so close that despite both being girls, they're often compared to a married couple by people around them.
b6991701-a6a5-4ad1-8b0e-833dc13ac5b5:
Dinato, once feared as the mightiest Demon King, was cursed by an item belonging to Annie, the female hero he defeated. Transformed into the body of a beautiful girl, Dinato's troubles only grew when Annie was revived as a gyaru—and due to the curse, Dinato is unable to defy her!

Stripped of most of his powers and now targeted by his former monstrous minions, Dinato is brought to his knees by this harsh reality. Amidst his struggles, Annie reveals the only way to return to his original form: a journey of "helping people" by defeating monsters that threaten humanity—a task utterly unbecoming of a Demon King…
20155eb0-c25e-454a-b096-a6537aec1b96: Delinquent student Torao is tired of losing to the school's top dog, Inuzuka Ryouhei. One day, before his latest challenge, Torao accidentally drinks something from a vending machine that turns him into a girl! Worse yet, Inuzuka has fallen completely head over heels for her! What will Torao, now Torako, do to change back and ward off Inuzuka's advances?
87ed0cea-cd84-40fe-ad94-71e9257536f8:
"I also wanted to be... the strongest in the world." 

An Arch Mage who died without fulfilling his dream wakes up to finds himself being reincarnated as a member of the imperial family. And what's more is that his new body has a talent for close-quarters combat! This time he holds hope that he finally might be able to fulfill his desire of being world's strongest... 

But after reincarnating his new name is Evangeline. Indeed, he had become a girl.
In her princess life where muscle training and fighting are forbidden, Eva brings dumbbells to her room and wields a sword! And before long, she becomes the strongest!?

A fantasy about a tomboy princess' rise to the top!
0ca5bda2-0567-4529-963f-4136a098d4aa:
"Juliana, your fiancé has been decided.”
At that moment, the frail daughter of an earl awakened to a shocking truth—within her resided the soul of the infamous "Cold-Hearted Emperor" Julius. A man whose ruthless conquests left behind mountains of corpses and an empire under his iron rule. 

Now, reborn as a delicate young noble girl, Julius finds himself in a seemingly peaceful era. But beneath the surface lurk corruption, poverty, and disease, all exploited by scheming villains. With the wisdom and might of a former emperor, Juliana will not stand idly by. The young lady who once ruled as a tyrant is ready to cleanse the empire once more—this time, with her tiny hands. 

A dark yet thrilling tale of power, justice, and a battle against the hidden evils of the empire begins!
6c96bc30-8189-4f30-b327-fbaa0767bfe7:
Chiaki is handsome, academically gifted, athletic, and born into a wealthy family with a beautiful sister. Despite his seemingly perfect life, he faces a persistent problem: he's never been lucky in love and struggles to capture the attention of girls. Determined to turn things around in high school, he wakes up one morning to a surprising transformation—he has turned into a girl!

He is shocked to find out that he has lost the appearance he was so proud of, but when he looks in the mirror, he sees a very cute girl in the reflection. He immediately goes to show it off to his twin sister Kaede, who happens to be very popular with the girls, but there is also something very strange happening to her...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
d1d16bd6-6b08-4985-b15e-e8586a8de78a: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?
1396300f-30b6-4751-bd52-3e35a6369fad: A 4-Koma Ts comics of The typical Cliche where the Mc's Bestfriend turns into a girl one day.
5cfad028-38b1-4f50-a282-70ac438fa91a: Halo is a talented female elf magician who has memories of when she was a man in her previous life, which is why she wishes to make out with a cute girl. Halo decides to buy Filia, a beautiful female slave with big breasts, but things don't go as she expects them to...
5449a0f7-916c-4a73-8685-4c39adbffdda:
Author’s DESCRIPTION: 

...I think TS girls who are unknowingly jealous are the best...
He probably doesn't mean to stare at you.
I just couldn't help but follow her with my eyes...
When she sees her best friend (male) happily chatting with another female
And when he sees his best friend (male) talking happily with another female, he can't help but show his jealousy on his face...
You used to be a male, but now the female in you is coming out little by little.
I bet he subconsciously thinks the male belongs to him...
He's a possessive lover...
99cb051f-667c-4750-b72f-6db45c968bc4:
Dimension Wave—a super popular VRMMO game where players can experience several years of fantasy in just twenty-four hours of real time. Enticed by the entry ticket his sisters won, a young man takes part in the project’s Second Wave. However, as soon as he enters the world of the game, he finds that his sisters have played a trick: he’s been transformed into a girl with the cringy name Kizuna†Exceed. But instead of letting it get to him, he decides to chill and take this new life as it comes. Without sparing a fraction of a second deciding, Kizuna immediately chooses to fish rather than fight on the front lines in this fantasy world. Alongside his sisters, Kanade and Tsumugi, a Japanese-style beauty named Shouko, Yamikage the fake ninja, and other quirky comrades, he works to enjoy his second life to the fullest.

NOTE: Many characters that appear in “Dimension Wave” also appear in “The Rising of the Shield Hero.” However, despite the many similarities, the characters in both series are not related to each other. “Dimension Wave” is not a spin-off of “The Rising of the Shield Hero”, but a separate story in a different universe that shares many similarities.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/dimension-wave)
c3557b1c-7523-4de1-9670-cce10f5166d6:
A new relationship begins after a seven year reunion!  
  
After being separated for seven years between Hokkaido and Tokyo, a young man waits at the airport to reunite with his best friend. However, what arrives instead is a message from his best friend saying he will be late, and a mysterious beauty! The ever-spirited mangaka, Hiroki Ohara, makes his debut on Comic Newtype!

However, they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.

Now, every time Akira sneezes, his entire body undergoes a gender-bending switcheroo! That’s right, Akira is always just an achoo away from getting in touch with his feminine side. f51b1dbf-b962-4f8b-bc10-a939d23d068b:
Author’s DESCRIPTION: 
My New Year’s TS girl sketch!

My buddy kept whining about wanting to visit the shrine with his girlfriend.
The wish came true—though instead of going with a girlfriend, he went as one.
The gods knew what they were doing: turned him into my ideal type—tiny but busty, super cute—and even put him in a kimono!

He’s so adorable everyone’s staring, and since he doesn’t realize how cute he is, he keeps clinging to me nervously, especially since he can’t walk properly in sandals and a kimono.

What an amazing first shrine visit of the year!

…Well, in the end, I got TS’d too, and we ended up as a pair of pretty girls in kimonos.
0b1a7961-7518-4807-a2e9-7b6b7718c1c8: Imagine finally adjusting to your new lifestyle as a girl and they hit you with the “free trial’s over, time to turn you back to a male!”
6440a4b0-2fdc-4a99-9378-f53e5ee6c90e:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate. A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
da88b8f1-0b6f-4e69-a07f-ec1c624b2aa7: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!
40bb7285-b317-40c9-9ba3-c00df793ae38: Byeon Tae-in was an ordinary geek, completely engrossed in webtoons and internet culture—until one day, everything changed. Gates opened, monsters poured out, and humanity teetered on the edge of annihilation. But unlike everyone else, Taein didn’t feel fear; he felt a rush of excitement, as if he had been thrown straight into one of his favorite webtoons! “These monsters look like the weak ones that always show up at the start to highlight the hero’s new powers!” And then, something extraordinary appeared before him: [You have been chosen.] status window? Perfect! Taein had consumed every webtoon in existence. Now, if he becomes the strongest in this world… what kind of epic story will he write next?
3e7c6d22-dfe4-462f-9d31-298313543bdb: Featuring a cynical beauty, a reclusive NEET, and an expressionless hot guy. 6bae5c8c-d5ff-43df-acf7-b7670532c8b1:
Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth's science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?

9d3d594f-c68d-43ff-b392-398cbe62541d:
It was in the year 2800 of the Midgard calendar. Back then, there was a Overlord who once reigned supreme and had reached the very brink of subduing the world. Her name was Lufasu Mafaalu, a great woman dreaded as the Black-Winged Overlord. She was too strong, too fast, and too beautiful. However, she was defeated by Heroes who opposed her ferocity, and her ambition was brought to an end.  
  
Or so went the story of our protagonist’s in-game character, whose body he now possesses for some reason in a world 200 years after Lufasu’s downfall. Follow our protagonist as he becomes unnecessarily feared by his surroundings and unnecessarily worshiped by his former subordinates as he―or now she―cheerfully travels around this fantasy world.
d773c8be-8e82-4ff1-a4e9-46171395319b: A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army. Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.
5927e373-f024-42ad-9307-6f4c05ea3fc4:
Mizuki gets confessed to by a boy in front of a special mirror. Legend has it, that if you confess to someone you like in front of that mirror your wish comes true.  
  
There is a slight problem in this equation: Mizuki is just a very feminine looking boy.  
  
Also, it seems that he caught the attention of the Norse Trickster God, Loki, while glancing into the mirror. Loki decides out of boredom to mess with Mizuki and turns him into a real girl.
5813825a-b729-4ce4-8dfd-54c3391f8d19: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
c68f23f4-560e-4b39-bacc-c557b41a342b: Saku Himura, who hates bothersome women. Kohaku Minase, a handsome womanizer. Hazuki Kazatani, awkward around women. Appearing before these three university students having problems with girls was none other than Mira, the "goddess of love"! But as luck would have it, it turned out she was a naive, good-for-nothing goddess! Thanks to her powers, they become overly attractive, or even change genders, and it’s utter chaos! With a persistent succubus and a woman from their past showing up too, will the three of them be able to protect their peaceful everyday life?
975f3334-8395-4393-84a2-50fcaccbcdc0:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However... will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?

"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "a handsome older man"!
90d81edd-accb-4c8d-b44c-e38254d77935:
For his high school debut, Minto Shishidou pretended to be an outgoing playboy, spinning lies about the girlfriends he goes through. This corner he backed himself into weighs heavily on his mind when he joins a school trip, and he’s determined to use the occasion to get a girlfriend for real.
But then an unimaginable incident strikes him and his classmates, setting the stage for a locked-room love comedy centered around the wishes of these boys and girls.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
a781de8e-0935-45bd-bc33-cbc76ea8c6f9:
A boy who used to be abusive to girls wakes up one day as one.

"I'll go back being a boy soon," he thought, however that was not the case. 
Follow Akira as he grows and learns little by little to accept the puzzling changings in her surroundings and her heart.
afa40bc8-34fa-4b03-a1e1-50f4eb79f9da:
One day, a beautiful girl enters Tatsuya's room... only to reveal that it’s his father, completely transformed by the shock of losing his job!
Confused by the father he no longer recognizes, Tatsuya begins to experience gradual changes in their once-distant father-son relationship.
As the father takes on a more motherly role, and Tatsuya starts acting more like the father, or perhaps a close friend becomes like a father figure...

A new TS comedy that, despite being called ‘biologically impossible’ on social media, is surprisingly a father-son story that will warm your heart!

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)

Chosen from above, a selection of teenagers are made into magical girls to fight for the city and to aspire everyone! Rin Yamabuki has just moved into town and still has a lot to learn about and still needs time to get adjusted to everything. Rin's close friend, Wakaba, reveals he himself is a magical girl.

One day, an ayakashi named Shirogane notices the budding romance between these two childhood friends. Eager to both devour Suzu and foil Matsuri’s chance at love, he performs a forbidden spell…

1548a4c8-db3c-4bab-8916-a2c202160026:
My name's Karina—or at least, it is now! I used to be a nondescript, run-of-the-mill Japanese salaryman until I was whisked away to a divine realm where the Goddess of Time and Space told me I'd be living a new life in a new world—and as a girl, since apparently she prefers it that way. First she wants me to beat some final boss she has a grudge against, then she takes control of my body to show me how to use my new spatial magic powers in a tutorial fight... Wait, isn't that the final boss I'm supposed to beat?! Less than in a minute into the tutorial and he's dead?! And now she says the world's my oyster. Seriously?!
___

da474214-2f0a-4c1f-9a74-5ca86522dfdf: Hellsing, an organization devoted to the elimination of the vampire threat, has recently uncovered information regarding the attempted production of "man-made" undead. Although the technology of creating artificial vampires is still in its infancy, it has advanced enough to be a serious threat. In an attempt to put a stop to this perverse and dangerous experimentation, Hellsing has sent two of its most skillful agents to Poland. A young man by the name of Walter C. Dornes - a.k.a. "The Angel of Death," and Alucard, an ancient vampire currently in forced service to the Hellsing Organization. Together, they attempt to stop the progress of the Nazi's efforts.

September 11, 197x, In the whole Kanto region a magnitude 8-9 violent earthquake occurred. Scholars called it the great destruction of the Showa Era, but the people called it the earthquake from hell! Volcanoes erupted, buildings crumbled, Tokyo became decimated in a single day. The government, after failing to recover the city, abandons Tokyo and moves the capital. The survivors form a society with no laws. In this harsh lawless world emerges Jack, a 10 foot giant who annihilates anyone and anything in his path. The manga details his journey.  
  
The numbering is from the Complete Edition, with around 20 Chapters per volume.
bb7f866e-82a2-4244-8e97-214a41556350:
A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, a half-ogre, half-human girl. 

Sixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. The order was to select Rama as the new "Demon King Candidate" from the Ogre village.
061dfe00-45bb-4cd8-86fc-73bc5d749791: A couple's daily life as they adjust to the boyfriend turning into a girl.

30d61f7f-b018-45df-a2fb-570089084214:
A large bus carrying students from Ryoreikan High School, attended by children from respectable families, plunged into an accident. The bus ended up at the scene of a yakuza conflict. While the students managed to survive, when they regain consciousness, it is the yakuza who were supposed to have died in the accident that end up inhabiting their bodies.

Eiji Shiokawa, a member of the Tsukihiro syndicate, awakens as "Shiori Kirino" and tries to blend into school life for the time being. 6f6a9058-bebe-431b-9905-f1451b937aad:
Though Yuri may look like any other high schooler, his life is a ceaseless onslaught of the worst luck imaginable — so when he hears about Blade Skill Online, the ultra-immersive VRMMO where luck is a stat you can control, he can’t wait to start playing and escape his IRL problems. 

Following the advice of an online guide, he chooses the summoner class with a bow for his weapon, and for his stats, he pours every last point into luck, naturally. Thus begins his blessed online life! Or at least, that was the plan. He soon learns he’s been trolled — summoners are useless, the bow is garbage, and the game’s barely playable with his abysmal stats! 

To top it off, a bald barbarian starts hitting on him barely a minute into the game because the avatar randomizer made him into a hot girl! Still, Yuri’s used to dealing with whatever life throws at him, and he’s not going to let the trolls have the last laugh! 

He’ll push his luck to the limit and leave the rest of BSO’s players racing to keep up!
