e6a19b50-af9b-4ace-b8d7-216681e07856: A town full of woodland creatures finds a human child... and has no idea what it is! The arrival of a mysterious furless creature sets the town of Treehollow into a tailspin: what is she, and does she have anything to do with the ominous Abroad?
b28e1dd2-5c5b-4803-ae64-502a4d21548e: Magical-girl loving Airi one day wakes up to a talking plushie? But just as she thinks this is her time to become a magical girl, her pet dog Hanamaru(♂) ends up making a contract instead...
a967d6e2-e269-4ab8-9306-04ffc4c2cb52:
In a distant place, on a certain mountain, a young dragon has been captured by a beautiful female tiger. The two, who were predator and prey, begin a journey to find a way for two animals with very different life spans to live by each other's sides.

TL;DR: Tiger Woman x Dragon Boy
930d4661-5550-4f66-a108-67ff2d55cd12: Gama Gama Aquarium, a small aquarium in Okinawa, is an hour's bus ride from Naha. Kukuru Misakino is an 18-year-old high school student who works there, and she knows about the "secret" of the aquarium: sometimes you can see mysterious things. One day Kukuru meets Fuuka, standing in front of a water tank with flowing hair and a tear rolling down her cheek. Fuuka has given up on her dream of becoming an idol and she has run away from Tokyo to Okinawa. Wanting to find a place to belong, Fuuka earnestly asks to work at the aquarium. The manga follows Kukuru and Fuuka as they deal with the issues of the secret of the aquarium and a looming crisis of its possible closure.
a2700ed6-a11d-4080-8a09-cb7d901c31cb: A story about a girl whose pet dog suddenly becomes a cute human girl. What happens when a dog's love for her owner is translated into human form? Will her dog learn good or bad things from humanity?
f97aea58-bc22-4c45-bd63-487c0683f882: Yamada, who works as an ordinary company employee, goes to visit the family home left behind as an inheritance by his late grandfather, and there he finds a door to another world!! Beyond the door, he meets a talking black cat and a homunculus girl, and as he begins living together with them, he enjoys a cheat magic life in modern Japan and a heartwarming slow life in another world♪
206b25a1-f7c2-4234-84d0-732f9317740d: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline.
7324c64a-b35a-4072-84e6-dff029a4af27: Spica Virgo is an apprentice witch, but she can't use magic. She needs a tutor to get into the magic academy she's always dreamed of, but she doesn't have the money or the connections... But suddenly, Spica meets a mysterious, talking black cat who can use magic! He agrees to make her his apprentice, but only if she promises to rid him of his curse! But to break it, she has to kiss him on the...!?
c0defdaa-e9eb-4c7d-ae27-db989fcf0105: A newly built 1LDK apartment with rent of 4,800 yen! The reason is the "earthbound spirit of a Shiba Inu"...!?
2ae16e3d-f4de-4604-bb72-63dc7e16359d:
Violent Action Comedy about a talking stray pug who's waiting for someone to pick him up from the streets. He happens to save a young woman from rape & abduction and the girl agrees to take him in aftwards. As it turns out, she's not a normal girl but a yakuza clan daughter. Luckily, the pug isn't a regular dog either, but a super strong badass fighter.  

(Synopsis by Manga Mogura)
a09819a9-d105-4c15-8dc1-ea99574dbee8:
These girls aren't human. Still, they adore humans more than anyone. 

I am Hitoma Rei, a NEET nearing 30 years old who was traumatized by  human relationships.  When I changed jobs, I ended up at an all-girls school whose purpose is to take non-humans and make them human!? Spending my days with the strange students Minadzuki Kyouka, a mermaid; Oogami Isaki, a werewolf; Usami Sui, a rabbit; and Haneda Tobari, a bird... 

Why do they want to be human? What do they want to do once they become human? I will teach them about humans. This may be an alternate world, but it's not like I've been reincarnated. This is just the story of a teacher who spends time with some girls who wish to become human, in a slightly odd school.
f7d3a91a-f47a-43ce-9a2c-4da813b15eea: A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"! Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
158bc0cc-e79e-4f13-a001-6d0abe9733ab: An abused little girl with nothing to live for meets an old man with a nasty personality.
b68d970e-6be7-461c-82e8-7986ec7c8037: The city of Shibugaya was once known for its youth and bustle, however now, all that remains are ruins since man-eating rabbits have made a nest of its subway... One wolf-eared girl dares to challenge the underground with by her side a girl with rabbit ears...
7889434b-d9a5-454c-8ea1-8c7a4509fc51: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
c4d5228c-846d-47c5-8659-0aa70d5c0d41: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.
94d60d12-452d-49f0-8d0f-5af785e561a8: Tamako comes for an interview at a ramen shop run only by cats, with no humans. The cat manager asks her if she likes cats, and when Tamako honestly says she is a dog person, she is easily hired. However, her job is not to run a ramen shop, but to look after cats...?
a0b8d5fe-e49c-4f43-a0b2-9ebeea920233: Zoos are made of small and big dreams… but it takes more than a dream to feed the animals! And that, Haruko will realize quickly, as she takes her first steps as a caretaker at the Hidamari Zoo. Despite an overwhelming enthusiasm, her inattentiveness has earned her the dislike of the director of the park, who puts her to the test by entrusting her the care of withdrawn and uncooperative animals… It is now up to the curious talent of the young girl to decipher the secret emotions of the animals through their scent!
ee4bf782-9fe9-42a6-be7f-3809293818c2:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market. Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds. All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
f461e344-2385-46b5-83b8-8776f5ea65d0: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
076b3757-2050-4362-b0ad-52513ecefa3f: People have been created that are human-animal hybrids, and powerful businesses bet on the outcome of their duels. College student Nomoto Yuuya's casual acquaintances ask him to drive them around to pick up girls one day, which he soon finds out means by force. The girl they kidnap is an animal-human hybrid named Hitomi, who slaughters all of them except Yuuya. Hitomi is a honey badger, which has been called the most fearless of all animals. Now Hitomi is assigned to stay with Yuuya, for his protection! Killing Bites are underworld duels between human-animal hybrids. One beast who knows no fear will fight in this animalistic world full of fear and insanity.
ce23a691-9041-43d7-a2cb-5607281b0e79:
White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp.

It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).
653000fb-1edd-4e05-9d44-36358708a5e9: In a world where beastmen stand on top of humans, OL Saki continues to struggle to lose. Saki endured the days of power harassment from her boss, but one day she was suddenly called by the company president, Atlas. I'll do my best!
c615f226-4608-4a12-a340-a974e2a429dd: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?
61830b36-1712-4b7b-9421-f671e9ced6d3:
Minato Seno's high school life had just begun when his homeroom teacher requested his help with Nekozane, the cat-like chronic napper who sits next to him in class. Timid and socially anxious, Minato has never talked to her or even seen her face. But when he finally musters up the courage to wake Nekozane, she unexpectedly hugs him on the spot! Thus begins a sweet tale of two teens awkwardly stumbling into a new friendship, unaware that their feelings are slowly turning into something more!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
0a0cee31-d434-4b58-9aed-cc633036b9eb:
A certain girl genius with more power than knowledge accidentally summoned dozens of students and teachers into a dangerous world filled with beasts and magic, but the protagonist isn't a student or the homeroom teacher... it's the janitor.

At the time of their summoning, the students and teachers each gained a power formed from their soul, but not the janitor. As the janitor was about to be bestowed with a power that would protect him, his power was forcibly taken from him by an arrogant student. Having gone three years without a contract extension, he failed to get a job after having graduated from a third-rate university. Somehow he is still a contractor at 25 years old and was a janitor for 2 years, with a take-home monthly salary of less than ¥120,000. From a society that rejected him, he was thrust into a world that rejected him. And what janitor-san wished from the Goddess who took pity on him was...
___
**Character Designer:** [Iwamoto Eiri](https://mangadex.org/author/6072165b-41b3-4b12-9afc-f99efff4cb72)
c314aabc-24f1-43b4-82b6-9601b8fa24c8: There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club", located somewhere in Kamakura, you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today, people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club", where Maya and Gakuto work, relying on this rumor.
9b1dd3b2-20a1-4b14-b22e-7eae63610141: Princess Soria has been cursed to live in her dilapidated kingdom as a chicken for the last century. Her curse can only be broken through true love with her Prince Charming. Unfortunately, the only fitting candidate for her comes in the form of Emperor Lenok, who doesn’t know a thing about romance! He also needs her help to save his empire from a long-term drought, a problem that can only be solved by breaking her curse and restoring her kingdom. But how is a poultry princess supposed to fall for such an unattractive ruler?!
379c0da7-6f91-498a-b666-23317b487c05: After falling through a magic mirror, Nanako and company find themselves stuck in a world where the people are talking animals - and now must find their way back home.
1b614b46-845e-43b1-b9a0-587df889c893:
A lighthearted adventure series based off then-current Sonic games, changing focus nearly every year. Games covered in story arcs include:  
  
- Sonic Unleashed  
- Sonic & The Black Knight  
- Sonic Chronicles  
- Sonic Colors  
- Sonic Generations
bd53615a-217c-437b-a9af-bd0de6c66d1a:
Legend of Crystania is set 300 years in the future from Lodoss, and is set on the continent of Crystania where the refugees from Marmo landed. It follows Pirotess's quest to free Ashram from the gripes of the animal god Barbas, and the hero Redon and his companions in a quest to free Crystania from Barbas' control.

77c8cc57-95c1-4f9b-8843-493eb2697566: Takeru Kamishiro is an ordinary middle aged salaryman who was chosen by god to be reincarnated into a fantasy world in the body of a handsome young man in his prime. Takeru sets out to learn more about the world while gathering rare and interesting materials along the way to sell for money which he can use to gather even more materials ad infinitum.
03426dd2-63c5-493e-853e-485d7c7dc9c0: Spinoff of the KonoSuba series, featuring the daily life of Kazuma and Co.
a43bfc8f-3daf-4aba-bb2e-284109cbc03b:
Mari is a high school student living in a town where beastmen and humans coexist. When she is late for school, she meets Tsunagu, a beastman who has come to the school as a "special student" for the Beastman Education Program, at the front gate. Mari is bewildered by her first contact with a beastman, but as she gets to know him, she is drawn to his kind and pure side. However, some of her classmates don't seem to take kindly to beastmen, and suddenly the two of them are locked in a warehouse. Suddenly, they are locked in a warehouse and Tsunagu hugs her! He says, "You smell sweet..." His breathing becomes ragged.

A human and a beastman. What will happen to the love between two people who transcend race?
Pure and exciting interspecies youth love.
3d554465-37c6-4e3b-a720-6eed5c58279c:
In Animal Town, humans and animals live together. Iroha is a young girl who loves animals and her close companion is her dog Komugi! One day, a mysterious creature GaruGaru goes berserk in the city. In order to protect Iroha, Komugi transforms into a human and not just any human, a Pretty Cure! These two Pretty Cures join forces to protect the berserk animals and return them to the Niko Garden.

(Source: Toei Animation USA)
d9d779ee-7f38-491d-85cd-dfb78e29d802:
The beautiful student council president is cornered by the handsome biology nerd!
Kirishima Sakura is a flawless, elite beauty and the student council president. Her dream is to become Prime Minister one day, and she diligently fulfills her duties as president to sharpen her leadership skills. But one day, she meets Seijirou Tanabe, the school’s most eccentric guy and a handsome biology geek, and soon finds herself swept up in his obsessive passion for living things.

And that’s when Sakura discovers it... The hidden side of Seijirou Tanabe that no one else has ever seen!!!
c6b43c87-7973-4ab0-8e43-ab927c7e9a7f:
The Rabbit Princess is the princess of the Rabbit Kingdom.
Her daily life is surrounded by many animals; it is a very heartwarming and cute life... but that's not all!
Cute things can be poisonous too!?
This surreal fairy tale manga is heartwarming, yet it never lets you relax for a single panel. A roller coaster ride of relaxation and tension, that will become an addictive experience!
49c7b586-b0a3-4776-b3f5-3bdc62d82161:
Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street. 
Because of his father, Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society.
So one day he’s gonna find that man, and RAPE him.

6e4a9bde-bf64-4fef-b052-5fc348264e76: Yuri dies after a long illness, and is reincarnated by a god into another world. He is given "Saiteigen no Nouryoku" ("just enough/basic skills") and a new name, Yuri, and hopes to live a slow, self-sufficient life. But upon reincarnating, things get dangerous immediately (gets attacked by a wild boar etc.), and he has to use his skills to survive, build up his living conditions, deal with monsters, etc.
5b7347fa-5e4a-43b6-9dba-3a2da9820b7e:
A dog named Weed happens to hear he is the son of Gin, the great leader of Ohu, who lead the dogs of Ohu to victory in a fight against the monstrous bear Akakabuto.   
Weed wants to find his father no matter what.   
On his way to find him, Weed hears that his father has been captured by a ruthless villain called Hougen.  
  
Sequel to Ginga Nagareboshi Gin.
4c221393-092a-4c43-9af7-be21427aa411: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
abc7e08c-809d-415e-b2c0-bc6cfb046457: Un mauvais timing pour une livraison de colis a croisé le chemin de Leon et Sky. Une coïncidence ? Le destin ? Il y a beaucoup à découvrir et beaucoup de secrets à révéler. - - -
359eb456-02e7-4906-bd48-10624d0419fd:
**A chaotic and ecchi romantic comedy about a goddess out to curse a family and the unfortunate guy who falls for her!**

Kuro, a black cat, is a god of fortune down on her luck. She’s turned into a “vengeful god” against her will, and the only way to return to her former status is to curse seven generations of the Nishikori bloodline. She’s close to being free, but to get there, she needs to make sure the seventh generation actually gets born. That means finding a match for Nishikori Kotaro…which is harder than you might think, because Kotaro is tragically unpopular. Not only that, he insists that the only woman he wants…is cat-eared Kuro herself!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*
f7b22bf3-ac82-4eae-a6aa-8236b12be8ec: 31 year old Takehiko Nakamaru has trained all his life to never be disturbed by anything that the world throws at him, no matter what comes at him, he will remain unfazed. He had conquered "life" and was living in perfect harmony. But when he realizes that his existence in the house inhibits his sister from getting married, his peaceful life is thrown off balance. In his panicked state, he leaves the house for Tokyo in his journey to slay the monster that is called "life".
c875bebb-8d03-4c8e-89dd-a3235f28df62:
This battle action manga tells the story of how humanity is threatened by overwhelmingly mighty monsters called "Kijū." 
While cities are destroyed and people fall into despair, a single rooster stands up against the threat trying to save humanity...
ece206e2-1199-48e4-a88c-1f99af3d5378: Fabre, a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures, is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise, the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan, the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""
f1d82e50-4c28-4621-a470-8f107eddeccd:
One day, Kang Woo-jin suddenly gains the ability to enter a subspace when he reads a script or scenario, and to become the character himself through the subspace. 

And then, at an audition location where he followed his friend, he happened to show the acting he experienced through the subspace…?
bad92115-4108-4de1-a2af-6db815230c80: When he was young, Lee-ahn found and returned a large bag of money and garnered fame as a "Christmas Angel." Since then, Lee-ahn has been very conscious of how others perceive him. Yugeon, who has just moved into Lee-ahn's building, could care less about the gazes of people around him. He acts out at school and even ditches classes. When she learns of Yugeon's arrival, Lee-ahn's mother hopes that he will take care of the outsider for the sake of his reputation. Reluctantly, Lee-ahn obeys his mother. However, Yugeon realizes that Lee-ahn used him for his own image. When Yugeon threatens to tell Lee-ahn's schoolmates about it, Lee-ahn gets defensive... "I don't care if you tell them. Just know, whatever happens next is not my responsibility." I was just going to end things with no regrets... Just wait! Do whatever you want!! Like a beautiful marbling that doesn't mix with water, these two create a beautiful dissonance.
550fa93f-26ca-4fbf-af73-6c4c01264e5c: Могут ли два конкурирующих альфы стать парой? Спросите Клауда Линга, который попадает под машину, спасаясь от ростовщиков. Водитель — не кто иной, как его бывший соперник Мариус Джи! Их путь от друзей детства к отчужденным соперникам принимает драматический оборот, когда Клауд симулирует амнезию, чтобы избежать неловкого воссоединения, но Мариус заявляет, что они бойфренды! Пока Клауд разбирается с этим, он задается вопросом: является ли происшествие удачей, способной восстановить давно утраченную связь, или лучше оставить прошлое в прошлом?
10d2737d-3d77-49c3-85da-1955c4c52974: Transmigrated as a fake millionaire heiress, Ye FengLai has to rely on currying favor with the real heiress to survive, only to be given the "villain card" by the real heiress. What can she do? No problem! Step 1: Pretend to have amnesia and become a cute girl; Step 2: Start groveling. The plan is a huge success! She saved her own life, got the money, but... why is the real heiress's gaze towards her getting weirder and weirder?! A sweet, innocent girl who thinks she's groveling but is actually flirting without realizing it X A cold, aloof, and self-assured kitten skilled at conquest.
6370bf37-e997-4a5b-8651-3c5bb60c9c3a:
Five years ago, my first love, Cha Mia, disappeared. Now, she has reappeared before me, completely changed.
An unexpected reunion at the police station… and she turns out to be a freshman at the same university?

The story of two people who thought it was over begins again on campus... or so I thought, but she still insists on letting the past go.
48dab831-9f19-4769-9f69-c738221b96d2:
Shape-shifting wolf and rabbit couple  
  
  
  
[Creator's weibo](https://weibo.com/u/2673967277)
7f8f8b55-0b59-4d4a-afab-e439c5ba468a: Max and Joy may sit just inches apart at work, but they're miles apart in every other way. Max prefers to be a fly on the wall, while Joy is the office's social butterfly. So when Max accidentally sees something on Joy's work laptop he wasn't meant to, he's pulled off the wall and thrown straight into the tangled web of workplace dynamics. Maybe this change is exactly what he needed... or is it?
da6cbb8a-2df2-4fd6-bfca-766e0ea2d860:
"I'll be your friend." 

A chilling ghost boy, Haesu Lee, visits the outcast, Eunha Joo. The moment she accepts this dangerous friendship, unexpected events unfold around Eunha... 

Will this hand offered by her mysterious friend be salvation, or a curse?
31d20f08-2168-42f6-b23c-8efc9c65b9d0: Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?
1ea8345f-9173-474f-ae4f-a4bd2dab8075: This is the life story of a cute and dumb fox.
09c2692b-3cd9-4459-b8d5-d7d2e1daaf61:
"I know that? The more you push away, the worse you want to be.”

She was willing to become a villain for revenge.
In front of me, a brave knight of the Empire, Count Weiss, the emperor's right-hand man, appears.
He is the ragged boy whom I abandoned long ago.
The beautiful face that was crying is still good in my eyes, but now he has become a dangerous man and approaches without hesitation.

“So did you approach me? Do you have to take it from me to marry the princess?”
“Well, was that really what I wanted?”

Deadly cohabitation with this beast.
0b1eb6ab-a2fb-4be7-890c-9ca1138e6abb: For Olivia Madeleine, illegitimate daughter of a duke, her only hope of a better life away from her cold-hearted family is her betrothal to arrogant crown prince Leoford Franz. When the revelation of his tryst with another debutante comes as an unsurprising wake-up call, she has no choice but to barter for her freedom with Edwin Lowell Vikander, the ruthless, war-hardened Grand Duke of the north. As her dangerous dance with Edwin begins, Olivia seeks to leave her former fiancé with the coldest gift that vengeance can impart… A heart made bitter with regret.
c76c0852-e8b0-4ed1-8125-c952d74fba70:
A being that appears to be human, but is stronger than them, Shil. These mysterious beings scattered throughout the world, remain dormant unless Simeone bestows them with a name. After that, their only purpose is to protect that person. Julitan, a simple cook in a small fishing village, encounters a Shil and gives her a name that resembles her crimsom eyes. “Please, tell me my name”. She requests. “Kanellian, the contract holder of noble souls, swears to become the servant of Knight Julitan as her master.” However, Julitan soon realizes that his ordinary abilities cannot handle Kanellian’s extraordinary powers. In the end, he embarks on a long journey to find a new contract holder capable of matching her formidable abilities…

“اقتليني كما وعدتني”.

عندما تختفي أختها التوأم، ليلى، القديسة، فجأة في أحد الأيام، تجد إيلينا العادية نفسها مضطرة للزواج من ولي العهد كايل، وهو رجل سيء السمعة بسبب قسوته، بدلًا من أختها.

Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

984df7d5-ae4c-43c6-aa65-737b9f37e5ef:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate, the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.

---
Every night, Yeo-un takes the last train home—same route, same time, same routine. But one thing keeps catching his eye: a girl with a guitar and a presence that lingers in his mind. When a shared love for the indie band Long Afternoon sparks a conversation, their late-night encounters begin to turn into something more. But Hae-in isn’t just another fan—she’s the voice behind the band, a secret she can’t afford to reveal. As music draws them closer, the truth may threaten to pull them apart. When the final note plays, will their story end in harmony… or heartbreak?
67e56a7a-c7ea-4db8-84f0-db19c2034729:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.
4d7be19c-8258-436c-a091-46856b6d6022:
“Dawn” entered the hall with her calm movements and stood in the middle. Her face showed no emotions, like a doll, but she was captivating and elegant, strikingly like an ice queen. Exer smiled lightly, spread her legs, and said, ‘As Lord, I will embrace you tonight.’ A fateful encounter for the first time. A woman falls in love at first sight. And a man fights the world for this woman. ‘If this world cannot accept her as a wife, then I will change this world.’ A love story between Dawn, the Eastern girl who endured a tough childhood while fleeing from war and became a slave, and Exer, the handsome man who was known as the strongest warrior in the kingdom.

---
Arrogant Duke Ixor Malkuth is used to getting absolutely everything he wants... until he meets the beautiful Daon, a slave who refuses to give in to his demands. As the conquerer of Daon's territory, Ixor tries to treat her like his mistress, but when she runs away, he decides to charm her into loving him. Yet with every attempt to seduce her, Ixor finds himself slowly falling for her instead. Will the prideful duke succeed in stealing Daon's affection, or will he find his own heart conquered?
ff4b110d-efcc-4be5-9459-b6321189d6e1: Reformed gangster, Nam Geonho decides to open an adult sex toy shop with Yeonwoo, his most beloved hoobae, after getting out of prison. Geonho had hoped that opening the shop in the countryside would allow him peace and quiet but interest in the shop soars and customers surge. To provide good recommendations to the increasing number of customers, Geonho decides to try the toys on himself but as he struggles with them, Yeonwoo walks in. When Yeonwoo decides to help Geonho, a sudden strange atmosphere descends and…..

The world is plunged into an icy age, and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life, our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped, thanks to his kind heart.

But fear not, for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!
2a62fa7f-ff92-4b2b-9073-049cdfff464c: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

Two girls, hand-in-hand, cross over to another world, into a magical academy set in a melodramatic Western fantasy novel. They transform into two people completely unrecognizable to each other: One is a rich villainess who is incapable of using any kind of magic, while the other is a young girl extremely talented in the field of magic, who's said to be the reincarnation of the Demon Lord. Originally set to save the world, the two of them unexpectedly fall in love.

"Male lead, female lead, may you two live a long and happy life together, forever. I, the villainess, am going to elope with Miss Demon Lord!"

Through mana, even though he's apart from Pauline, he can always feel like she's with him...

One day, Rowan encounters a shocking sight of Pauline, who he believed had left for a noble family.

1963ed06-aac7-4db1-82c9-51603c5ae062:
Yu Chaoyan, who became wildly popular with her performance in Black and Red, is as well known for her various rumors as she is for her fame. However, in reality, she is just a girl with a poisonous mouth. Recently, Yu Chaoyan was angered by a male actor's linked publicity stunts, and in a fit of rage, she powerfully challenged him on live cameras:

"If this world only had this man, I would rather date a woman"

This bold statement immediately exploded into the hot polls and caused a huge uproar. As a result of this, Yu Chaoyan was attacked in the parking lot by the male actor's fanatical fans who were lying in wait. At the moment of danger, Yu Chaoyan was heroically saved by Yin Zhou, who entered by mistake after taking the wrong path…

6fc653be-d90f-4dde-a0a6-018804d6853c:
While everyone else has some sort of blessing or gift when they get transported to another world, LuMing seems to have been given a body of a crossdressing salesman in deep loanshark debt. Originally LuMing was already an overworked programmer, a shitty life it was already.

He now lives in a world where people have abilities that make up professions! As a cardmaker he falls deep into thought. If the working mechanics behind cardmaking is similar to programming in his old world, wouldn't he be ridiculously overpowered? In theory, couldn't he just compress the entire world or realms within a card?

That is, until he finds himself waking up from a car accident on his exam day! But as luck would have it, Woojoo can now copy any move exactly as he sees it, and his two left feet that kept him from debuting are now moving to the beat! With this newfound skill, will Woojoo be able to turn things around and become the star that shines the brightest on stage?
b326ef7e-df22-4f86-871a-eecd9b33f2bf:
Gu Yeon-seo, l'as de l'équipe marketing de la société AZ. Derrière son apparence impeccable et ses capacités exceptionnelles se cache un secret : il est un gumiho (renard à neuf queues) qui, après 200 ans, a enfin développé ses neuf queues.

Tout le monde pensait qu'il était destiné à devenir un renard céleste, mais Yeon-seo a obstinément choisi de vivre comme un humain, réussissant ses examens d'équivalence du lycée, ses admissions à l'université et même la recherche d'emploi, souvent brutale.

Mais une erreur imprudente menace de tout révéler. Son identité secrète est découverte par le développeur Yoo Min-hyeok... et, à la grande surprise de Yeon-seo, sa magie de renard ne fonctionne pas du tout sur lui.

Pour protéger sa vie quotidienne paisible, Yeon-seo élabore un plan ridicule : conquérir Min-hyeok et sa jeune soeur. C'est ainsi que commence la romance chaotique et intime du gumiho dans son quartier !
ade0306c-f4b6-4890-9edb-1ddf04df2039: After witnessing the death of one of their own, the Absolute Ones — creators of the many universes outside of our own — frantically seek to fill the power void left by their fallen brother. But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

Pyo Wol ist ein einfaches Waisenkind und durchstreift alleine den gesamten Kontinent, bis er eines Tages auf einen mysteriösen Mann trifft und plötzlich das Bewusstsein verliert. Als er wieder zu sich kommt, befindet er sich in einem dunklen, engen Raum mit einer eisernen Tür als einzigem Ausgang. Irgendwie schafft Wol es, die nächsten grausamen Monate zu überleben, während er versucht, einen kühlen Kopf zu bewahren und seinen Körper auf das vorzubereiten, was folgen könnte. Als sich die eiserne Tür endlich öffnet, erfährt Wol, dass er an diesem schrecklichen Ort nicht alleine ist: Eine Gruppe Maskierter hat 300 Kinder entführt, um sie zu menschlichen Waffen auszubilden. Nun liegt es an Wol, zu kämpfen und die anderen umzubringen – denn nur die wenigsten können überleben und am Ende ausgewählt werden. Wird er es schaffen, seinen Kidnappern zu entkommen?

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

Madoi Ayame, from the engine section, who just so happened to appear in the vlog, also exploded in popularity when viewers from across the world found her cute. Every day passed in a flash, yet those summer days felt like they could last forever in that clubroom. But when this summer ends, the dominoes between us will all begin to fall, at once.”

“Why did you suddenly start narrating a light-novel-style summary, Machino-san?”

6fb4ea58-3cba-4e7c-8f3e-2ddbeedf816e: Najika is a great cook and likes to make meals for the people she loves. But something is missing from her life. When she was a child, she met a boy who touched her heart–and now Najika is determined to find him. The only clue she has is a silver spoon that leads her to the prestigious Seika Academy. At Seika she meets two brothers Daichi and Sora, could one of them be the boy from her childhood?
31b11fc4-c408-47f3-bcef-586b16f474c9:
Leticia's father, the current king, is very wise and knew that both of his older sons have their own supporters, and that if either one became king, the other brother's supporters would rebel—throwing the country into a civil war.  
  
To prevent this, the king decided to announce that he will retire while he's still alive and make his daughter, the princess, his successor! However, the princess doesn't have any political allies. So she decides to gather a group of knights loyal to her and form her own "round table" before the day of her coronation.  
  
The only problem is all of the good knights who are strong and skillful and loyal have already been snatched up by her father and brothers for their own personal guards…  
  
Based on a light novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/1058/list/).

Hanada was always self-conscious about  his rough skin, cracked and peeling, like a hide of an elephant. In contrast, a beautiful girl in his class had everything he didn't, an open and outgoing personality, clear and radiant skin, lustrous hair, even her steps bounced like a crane in dance. But she proved more than those attractive attributes, and he found himself drawn to her, even as he despaired at his chances. But an unexpected invitation, and a clash of hope against insecurity...

86550883-5f01-4cbd-a914-08434f4b8c82:
The main character is Leonora, the daughter of an impoverished noble of Padua. She is a beautiful silver-haired, emerald-green-eyed girl and very good at fighting with the sword.   
  
One day, she is forced to marry an arrogant young noble, but she discovers on the day of their wedding that this man intends to use her to become king of Italy because she is involved in an ancient Italian legend: Leonara is the girl shown on "Kakan no Madonna" (Madonna of the Flower Crown), a famous painting drawn by Leonardo DaVinci. There exists a legend that tells whoever gets the legendary sword "Emerald Lion" will unite and rule over Italy. And the secret hiding-place of the sword can be found with "Kakan no Madonna"–that is, Leonora.  
  
In order to find out the truth of the portrait's secret related her and to hide her identity as Kakan no Madonna, Leonara disguises herself as a black-haired boy, Leo, and sets out to find DaVinci. On the way she meets Falco, the blond-haired handsome king of Naples, who is unaware that she is a girl, and becomes his servant.   
  
When she finally finds DaVinci, she hears with surprise that she - the girl portrayed in Kakan no Madonna - is destined to possess the legendary Emerald Lion and therefore to become queen of Italy.
a464f3f8-16da-4844-8bbd-f6770bbd0a01: This is a story of a boy who dreams of being with a girlfriend on the night of the first snowfall of the year and a girl who he happened to cross paths with on the night of the first snowfall of the year. The girl, however, mistakes him for a pickpocket when he tries to return the wallet that she dropped. Already in a bad mood from a breakup, the girl mysteriously gives him a piece of toast and leaves him standing there in awe. Was it fate or coincidence that those two happened to meet each other on the night of the first snowfall of the year?

Ritsuka, a Ryousei student, believes that she’ll find a wonderful boyfriend by following the love legends. After all, her older sister, Aya, followed them, and she got married! Yet every time Ritsuka carries out a legend superstition, Kuze-kun gets in her way…  
  
Although they fight all the time, Kuze-kun is always there for her when she’s feeling scared or anxious. While his words are ill-natured, he is kind to her, so Ritsuka feels happy even when she’s mad at him…  
  
Ritsuka falls in love with Kuze-kun. After four of the legendary superstitions were completed, Ritsuka and Kuze-kun fell in love with each other, but…?!

Not only did their housing agency unexpectedly close down, the landlord of the apartment tells them that they had to pay more for their aparment then they had expected. During the work process, Murasame realizes that he is falling in love with Minami but is unsure how to proceed as she becomes more and more popular as a VTuber. What will happen with the love of Murasame and his client? This mysterious and romantic plot is filled with incredible events that will leave no one indifferent!
___
"I'm thinking of becoming a VTuber, and I want you to draw my character, so I DMed you." 

One day, the illustrator Murasame-sensei suddenly receives a DM. The client, Minami, is an extremely attractive and extremely unstable girl. As Minami becomes more and more famous as a VTuber, Murasame-sensei develops feelings for her that maybe he shouldn't...?!

e1973db4-7c4d-4969-baed-10a99d2bcaa8:
After being together for 9 years, Geurim and her boyfriend had lost their spark, leading her to travel to Paris on a package holiday on impulse. Upon her arrival at the airport, Geurim had been waiting for her luggage when she spotted it and reached out her hand… but it brushed against another belonging to a handsome man, who had reached out for the same luggage. Geurim decided to put her excitement aside and enjoy her trip instead, but the man assigned as her partner turned out to be terrible! He didn’t seem to like her either, and went away. In the meantime, Geurim bumped into the man from the airport, who unexpectedly proposed to go around together… Will the two of them be able to stand by themselves by the end of this?

8960a296-62a3-4b1a-ae02-60f0c1d0173c:
A fantasy story for kids featuring a girl named Melmo, who can change her age as she wishes by eating special candies.  
  
Melmo's mother dies in a traffic accident, leaving young Melmo and her younger brother Totoo. Anxious, Melmo's mother in heaven asks God to prepare some magical candies, and hands them to Melmo.  
There are two kinds: Melmo can grow 10 years older to become any sort of adult she wishes by eating a blue candy. By eating a red one, she can become 10 years younger.  
  
Using these miracle candies, Melmo disguises herself as a nurse, schoolteacher, policewoman, and overcomes troubles together with her brother, Totoo.

BASED ON THE HIT NOVEL!  
  
Sylvia's had more than her fair share of hardship. Abandoned by her husband, sold into slavery by her father, and now ruled by a harsh master, she's never felt free.  
  
But everything changes when she discovers an injured stranger in the woods. Despite his initial hostility and the language barrier between them, Sylvia decides to help him at any cost. She's determined to save him from a cruel fate: and he's become her new secret. But she never realized that he'd be a prince — or that he would kidnap her as his bride!  
  
As Sylvia takes on this unexpected adventure, she faces a difficult question: can love be her freedom, or is it just a new prison?
b29a78d4-3306-4cec-9958-dd579c57bc5d: Jiro Ninomiya had a problem. That is, his sister's friends Megu Kurotani and Erika Tenpaku are teasing him about something. Jiro, an adolescent boy, wants to touch their bouncy breasts right away, but if it's just a prank, his life could be in jeopardy, so he puts on a sorry face and tries his best to endure it. However, in reality, both Megu and Erika love Jiro, and it was a deliberate attempt to get his attention. Megu and Erika's temptations become more extreme as Jiro doesn't make any moves... A tactical love affair between two older sister friends who want him to touch her and a high school boy who they think they should never touch. Comedy!!
3077d52a-05dd-420d-ae29-7902c9e2c767: "I'll help you with your 'special training'!" Aspiring actor, Tetsu, spends day after day auditioning for roles, but is turned down due to his delinquent personality, leaving him with little choice but to lodge with his long time friend, Satoshi, who is a popular scriptwriter. Finally, a shot at a lead role presents itself to a disparaged Tetsu, but the offer turns out to be for a "man on man romance" movie. Being attracted to men himself, Satoshi offers Tetsu his guidance to help him get into character, but ends up getting jeered at... Clearly irritated, Satoshi says, "Fine. I'll help you out as an 'experiment'. Why don't we give it a try?" And with that, the two friends cross a line they never thought they would... all because of a movie! A cool-headed, popular writer meets an idiotic delinquent actor in this heart-pounding sensual story!
19af130c-ffd7-4f8b-b71e-f0e88ec89592:
An age-gap love story between a caretaker who loves a little too much and a young lady who’s a high school girl.

Riko, the granddaughter of a yakuza family, has a crush on Iori, her overprotective caretaker.

He has always earnestly pampered Riko and been around her since long ago, and he has always been with her in everything she does.

And when she found out that Iori has a girlfriend, she decided to break free from Iori and give up her love! Riko tries her best to increase the number of things she can do little by little, but Iori doesn’t seem convinced.
3e7cd288-b982-45c5-bcae-f9fa7e902c4d:
England, the early 1900s. Alice, a young noblewoman, has a Japanese maid named Hanako working in her household. The two have a fairly typical relationship…until the day Alice begs Hanako to kill her. As Hanako tries to figure out why her mistress would make such a terrible request, she and Alice grow closer until an entirely new feeling begins to blossom between them. Don’t miss this poignant tale about women falling in love in historical Britain.

A boy, Jiro Ryuzen, is imprisoned in Kanto Juvenile Prison for the crime of "killing his father. He was sent to Seiun Gakuen, a prestigious private school, in handcuffs, which was ruled by the immensely powerful Goji Shinryu...

Together with five members of the Gokehoren, his allies in the juvenile prison, Nagare's fierce battle has begun!

This new dorm of hers, the Strawberry Tree Dorm, turns out to be a place full of weird people - a girl who touches her chest out of the blue, a guy with one of the shortest tempers ever - BUT the good thing is, there’s a really handsome and nice guy with whom she falls in love instantly! Also, not to mention a crazy cat who adores him (looks can be deceiving…). Yuuya’s life just became much more interesting…

A 5 million yen debt suddenly falls on cash-strapped student, Kamijou Yuuki. Because of his father, Yuuki went through many hardships. After a night out drinking, he comes to on a bed full of ￥10,000 bills with a half naked man?! After waking up, the man even says "I'll give you the money".  
Confused, Yuuki escapes and goes home, but he re-encounters the mysterious man, Nao.  
  
"I'll give you the money, so let's have sex. Think of it as physical labor." Nao says, but what does Yuuki do…?
0ab8c645-c1c2-4ddf-b47a-8acf07100a5f:
"Now that we have no ill feelings towards each other, let's live our separate lives well and never see each other again."

It was the start of a possession that began with a typical regretful family drama. After cutting ties with a family that doesn't get along with each other, I thought a peaceful unemployed life was waiting for me.

However...

For some reason, men who had no interest in me before the possession started creeping in.

"I have something I like."
"What is it?"
"It's you, Lora."

The slave who I brought because I felt sorry for him getting beat up now confessed.

"Why doesn't Laura take care of herself? I'll take care of her from now on."

The condition of the butler, who is of mixed race, became strange.

"Lora, will you marry me?"

The Grand Duke, who used to threaten me, proposed.

"Haa, this sweet smell... you're the first one to drive me this crazy."

This crazy man seems even crazier.

...I wish they'd all just disappear.
80131ab9-9646-4bca-948e-0f86a407be5e: School's strongest, Kim Woo Jun and his formidable rival Lee Seo Young who threatens (?) his position. Woo Jun is always vying with Seo Young for the uneasy top spot, but somehow, to Seo Young, it's just a cute game. As the competition becomes a part of their daily routine, new feelings start to sprout between them...
cb672070-285c-4b6c-a485-37deb8c3bfeb: After hearing all his classmates brag about doing it over the summer, Yohta lies and claims he did, too. However, his childhood friend, Wataru, sees right through him. Wataru invites Yohta to "study" together so they'd be ready for when they finally scored. But, why do these lessons seem like they're preparing him for a very different type of experience...!? This eight-story volume also includes romances between rival deliverymen, a hot college guy and his neighbor, as well as a famous actor and his manager!
8e0d6268-3478-4bc9-b85f-f80f74d6210c:
The man who bought him at the black market auction is a handsome young vampire.

Vampires have taken control and humans have been forced to live in segregated areas. Jinosuke Fukuda is a ceramic artist who's lost his sponsor due to the relationship between vampires and humans deteriorating. Right when Jinosuke is feeling miserable about his sponsor cutting ties with him, he gets kidnapped and sold at a black market auction.
A vampire named Noi wins the bid. He is fascinated with humans and wants to do research on them, so he forces Jinosuke to make an agreement with him to let him suck his blood once or twice a week. The first time his blood is sucked, Jinosuke feels as if his body is on fire with unbearable pleasure. He can't believe that getting his blood sucked could feel so good!
A love story between a curious vampire and an older ceramic artist.Noi, a handsome vampire, buys Jinosuke at a black market auction. The first time Noi sucks his blood, his body is consumed with pleasure like he's never experienced before!
b5f7bfe7-29c7-4071-b418-f8582fbf540f: Nagi has an "ideal boyfriend" who is tall, well-educated, good-looking, and just loves and heals her. But in fact, Nagi is dating... her fantasy boyfriend! She was so disappointed with real men that she was leading a fulfilling life by dating her imaginary boyfriend. However, a man who looks exactly like Nagi's imaginary boyfriend, Bino, suddenly appears...? You can't take your eyes off this sudden development! A slapstick heart-throb comedy!
af1d1423-9946-4ff2-80d8-379c17b5efc3:
"Sorry, I'm not a girl." I didn't know anything about Saku.   
  
When they were kids, Kyousuke always thought Saku, his childhood friend, was a girl, and when he realized Saku was a boy he was already in love. Even though Kyousuke held back because he thought having a boy like him would be an annoyance for Saku, one day, he saw kiss marks all over Saku's back… The wholehearted complicated days of love between childhood friends.
31c012f2-40d1-4a3f-adb2-67e49b6dbd4f: Elizabeth Lovewood has always been too much. She laughed too much, talked too much, sang too much, but most importantly, felt too much. And that has brought nothing but problems. Now, in her new school, she´s decided to drown her personality to fit in. But that changes when she´s forced to join a punk band, where she meets someone who awakens distant memories and pushes her to explore her spirituality and a love that transcends lifetimes.
e155d4cd-8b1c-450b-8fd8-dfc73adcb51c: Nagisa once lived in a small fishing village; but, after a long-ago tragedy, he moved as far away from it as he could. After collapsing from overworking himself in the city, however, he comes back to the village, to the memories and people he escaped from, and to Kaito, the only one he never wanted to meet again…
b8fe3348-438d-40ab-a11b-ba6f79af42d4:
Kouki and Nao are twin brother and sister. As a matter of fact, the two have mutual feelings of love for each other, but “twin” love mustn't be permitted.
But then, their mother reveals a shocking truth.

120% pure romcom, grandly start!
3feae5ab-f20d-4159-bd83-032ef41a7ad9:
Ryousei and Shougo are two artists involved in a continuous and ambiguous sexual relationship. Shougo thought that claiming Ryousei as his own would alleviate the feelings of helplessness, regret and loneliness that are plaguing him. Ryousei, although captivated by Shuugo, began to realize that he was just being used.  
  
An opportunity eventually arrives for both Shougo and Ryousei to display their paintings at Shougo's elder brother's art exhibition in Tokyo. Shougo, who has had a complex about his elder brother ever since childhood, thought that "I may be able to return to Tokyo if this goes well", which gradually increased the pressure to succeed. Beneath the starry sky, a paint brush paints a story of youthful love.
4e67b6fa-f839-4fa2-889e-1a72781b3249:
Haruki is a school nurse by day, but a natural hunter by night. Lately, he hasn't been able to catch any prey. When his frustration is about to explode, he is approached by a mysterious young man named Shion. Saying "Give up. Because I'm going to stop you." Haruki laughs at him thinking it's some kind of revenge for sleeping with her man. So Shion takes the opportunity to push Haruki down and tie his hands. "I have been told that I am very good. So all you have to do is lie down and take it." Despite not normally being on the receiving end, Haruki can't help but lose himself to the pleasure…  
  
Related Series:  
Sensei no Iukoto Kikinasai (Prequel)
21e8a973-c3c5-426d-9af8-a564596e7d29: Let's start this lewd party! Model Akira and celebrity Kaito held a limousine party for their inseparable partner-in-crime, Kunimitsu's birthday celebration. When Akira said "Have fun with whoever you want", he was pushed down by Kunimitsu who said, "I want to mess you up."…After moving to the hotel, Kaito also joined for a threesome…?!
a3f2c3a4-92ed-42e0-b380-301c135be2d5: Reiji Kuze is the son of doctors and the new transfer student in his last year of high school. As someone whose socioeconomic background and academic grades are in the top 98th percentile, Reiji immediately stands out like a sore thumb in his new school. And in high school, standing out means you will be targeted. Presumed to be a delicate prince swimming in cash, Reiji gets picked on by the third strongest person in the school... and beats him and his entire gang to a pulp without breaking a sweat. As if Reiji didn't stand out enough already, he seems to have caught the interest of the king of the hill, Akira Ohara, the cat-like lone-wolf that nobody can seem to tame...
2d1a33a1-c73c-42c3-96a4-a409590cc005: Keiji Nishiono, 36, runs a small, unsuccessful detective agency with his only assistant, the beautiful-but-strict Eisei Takatoh. Laid-back and empathetic to a fault, Keiji is constantly being scolded by Eisei, who is much more of a realist. One day, they accept a case about relationship troubles and go undercover as a couple to infiltrate a gay bar...!! Their investigation goes well, but egged-on by the gay men around them, they end up kissing. After that incident, they start seeing each other as more than business partners...
0c114f02-1df1-4c2d-968d-5a2ffa72250f:
A collection of two shojo short-serials and a one-shot from Tetsuya Chiba. Part of a three-volume short stories series, alongside a volume of his shonen work and his essay manga.

- **Papa's Bride** (パパのお嫁さん, Papa no Oyomesan) - Ekko (Etsuko) Nakajima is a feisty little girl who lives alone with her father. One day, after many struggles, one of her father's musical compositions get selected by the Japan Music Association. From there, many joys and sorrows present themselves before them as Ekko's father ascends in the world of music.
- **Jambo Riko** (ジャンボ・リコ) - Riko (Ritsuko) is the daughter of the head of a hospital situated in South Africa. When Riko's parents do not return from their search of crucial medicine, it's up to her and a colorful crew from around the world to search for them.
- **Like the Wind** (風のように, Kaze no You ni) - Chiba's last major shojo work, this recounts the story of a rambunctious boy from an beekeeping family, and the impact he makes on a rural mountain village.
42f80dfc-8cf1-4fe8-b583-94e7b616d5d8: One night, Haise, an elite wolf-beastman office worker, finds his junior colleague, Mitsuki, calling for help in the dark of a park. He says he matched with a beastman on a dating app, but was deceived. Unable to leave the dangerous Mitsuki, who dreams of beastman sex, alone, Haise says, "I'll teach you real beastman sex." However, he is increasingly attracted to Mitsuki, who is full of worldly desires but only has a biased knowledge of AV, as he gets messed up by his own hands...
d964361f-042a-4c1b-907d-3c907dd50060: Roped into fleeing from her ninja village, Satoko, a ninja with the ability to turn non-living things into leaves, ends up encountering a high school girl named Konoha, who just so happens to be a professional assassin. With Satoko needing protection from the ninjas pursuing her for her desertion and Konoha needing someone to help dispose of evidence, the two begin living together.
aecf3168-3b40-4cff-98dc-28b0456322a9: Rio Mikazuki is a shinobi. That is, a shinobi living in the modern worldーa "shinewbi" of sorts. All of the ninjutsu and ninja tools of the current era are at her immediate disposal and are considerably more high-tech than before. However, it seems as though her senior partner, Igarashi, has learned how to use real ninjutsu through the long-forgotten traditional training methods of the old shinobi...
a9581a49-b888-4c17-979c-5abdff6a9b00:
Ninja vs. Ninja!! A deathmatch to decide the strongest begins!!
Kazama Endo, an unbeatable delinquent, goes to scope out Hachisuka Ichiya, a boy who roughed up his henchmen. Endo, who lives and dies by fights with strong opponents, comes expecting another brawl, but it turns out Ichiya is anything but ordinary...!! A bacchanalia of bad boys seeking to put themselves on top begins!!

d8a00acf-2c05-4cd9-8d58-5e8c7c432f7b: The man who annihilated the Soukaiya, the enemy of his wife and child, and buried Neo-Saitama in flames has appeared in Gaion City, Kyoto Republic! Ninja Slayer's new battle begins to eradicate his other enemy, the Zaibatsu!
abd9a294-dcb8-40c2-a32d-30b16b82eceb: Ninjas, known for their exceptional physical abilities, mastery of various tools, and expertise in stealth operations. Knights, who pledge loyalty to their lords, excel in advanced swordsmanship, and are skilled in combat.

The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan.

ff2a2c47-48f2-43d1-b4c9-3f284613ffc6:
Katou Narumi (19) suffers from Zonapha Syndrome, a rare ailment that stops his breathing unless he makes people laugh. He's been forced to abandon his training in Chinese kenpo and return to Japan, where he now works as a clown. The only problem: he's not very funny.  
  
One day he meets Saiga Masaru (11), the recent inheritor of a huge fortune, who gives him the first laugh he's gotten all day. When he realizes Masaru is being pursued by assassins, he steps in to protect the boy, only to discover that instead of conventional weapons, the assassins wield huge, eerie puppets. They soon encounter the mysterious Shirogane (age unknown), who controls a puppet of her own, and claims she was sent from France by Masaru's late grandfather to protect him.  
  
Their paths intertwine and diverge, splitting into two stories: Karakuri and Circus, puppets and performers, tears and laughter. The strange circus of living dolls that spreads Zonapha Syndrome, the human puppets known collectively as the Shirogane, and the puppeteers whose undying grudge set in motion both sides of this performance.
dde336e0-9175-4888-b068-4dadd587f4bb:
An original story adaptation based on the third installment in the Etrian Odyssey franchise.

Former Princess Celia Zoe Granvania and her Ninja retainer Fuuka hitch a ride on a merchant ship sailing to the magnificent Sea City of Armoroad, where an enormous World Tree of Yggdrasil looms over. 

Wanting to explore the vast labyrinth that it houses underneath, Celia hopes to uncover the reason why everything she once held dear is gone...
df0859e6-b2df-4066-9be7-c95032f0771e: After an old family friend shows up to throw Kaede and her ninja family out of their secluded mountain home, the three of them must brave a new world - Tokyo - and fight off malicious goons to stay safe.
8b74c7d1-646f-45e5-a214-a325bb945859: After Amara becomes a Breaker, she goes on an adventure with friends. While helping people with their troubles, encountering obstacles, and discovering the truths of the world of Thanes, Amara hopes to reach her brother who left their hometown five years ago.
5f9f0841-50cb-464b-ac8a-d4e1c78f6ff5: To avoid being chased, the monster fox left his original residence and began a life of escape, he went to an invisible place, met travelers from all directions, wrote what he thought, felt and knew, and recorded it here.
b4e88857-45f1-48e4-a0a0-36ead70970e7: Sumeragi Hotsuma, the blind "Sound Master," can kill Japanese demons with only the "sounds" made by the ring in his hand. His partner is high school student, Hiragi Ranku, adept at the strongest martial art, "Sappo" and blessed with the courage to fight any foe with her bare hands. A surprise, perhaps, that their enemies are "gods." Their battle takes place in Okinawa, a mystical island that protects Japan from evil gods and demons. This is a strange tale, which relates the mysterious history of Okinawa, myths from around the world and other world events with very precise imagery. Here exists a very, very strange world of fiction. The title, Narai Kanai means "Paradise" in the Okinawan dialect. In Okinawa, there is an island where the dead go to find eternal peace. Can Hotsuma and Ranku save Japan and provide these wandering souls with eternal peace?
0164b90d-860e-45b0-876c-0ba89bb29200:
Winner of the 2014 Bookstore Award and the Yoshikawa Eiji Literary Newcomer Award, this blockbuster historical novel has captivated over 1 million readers and is now fully adapted into a manga!

The enemy? The legendary warlord of the Sengoku period, Oda Nobunaga! What destiny awaits the courageous pirate princess who boldly stands against him?

Set in the turbulent Sengoku era, after the chaos of the Ōnin War, the Ashikaga shogunate's power has crumbled. Across Japan, formidable warlords are emerging, each declaring their ambitions in this age of conflict. But did you know there was a woman who dared to challenge the unstoppable forces of Oda Nobunaga, leaving his armies astounded?

Rooted in historical events, this story delivers heart-pounding battles and more! Follow the journey of a striking warrior princess and her encounters with powerful, charismatic heroes. Experience the ultimate Sengoku entertainment!
a54cef55-45c6-456d-8ec9-d08faa19bb42: 10 short humorous stories on each character from the main roster of the Soul Edge game.
a2faddae-151f-4a48-8e0d-754f2f729008:

ef7323d4-7a2f-4084-898a-024df289ac88: Chigachi Fuuta an ordinary high school student who really admires ninjas is gifted with an extraordinary legacy, namely the soul of Hattori Hanzo, a legendary ninja. But because of that legacy, Chigachi Fuuta is targeted by various shinobi and ninja who still survive in the modern era. Can Chigachi Fuuta overcome these obstacles?
c070aecf-2116-4fbb-bb6a-1d44ab1b8985: A boy was deprived of emotions and color vision in order to make him a shinobi. A stranger stretches out the hand towards him in the ruined village. His new life begins as the boy takes it…
2b9e32a2-d746-4a4b-a09a-7d24278aebd3:
Once upon a time a thousand years back from now, there was a legendary man that trembled Japan, in the era of peace.

The man was Musashibou Benkei. Spending his time as a priest soldier under control of Honen of Mount Hiei, he started to feel the emptiness of his own overwhelming power somewhere down the line. One day, Honen descended the mountain with his armed priests including Benkei. And Benkei happened to see...

Why he was born, how he should live? Only heaven knows the meaning of his life. It is an unprecedented saga of a man with passion for Japanese people.
a3d5e737-ca1e-4648-a78e-2214e189f20d: Kaede, the heiress of the Kisaragi ninja clan, has decided to run out on her arranged marriage and take matters into her own hands. Searching for a companion on her own, she meets the most unlikeliest of guys; a total weakling. However she is soon intrigued by his courage, and chivalry. Can love blossom between these two kids from completely different worlds?
bfac74ce-672e-4f2a-96d3-c243706e03d6: The story takes place before the events of the Kojiro of the Fuma series and focuses on Musashi Asuka's past. As a child, to save his sister who was sick and dying, Musashi Asuka is saved by a mercenary and gives up his life in exchange for his sister's salvation. So that one day they can meet again, Musashi must become a Ninja Hunter. However, until this is accomplished, the path will be turbulent and unknown.
1e6644fb-d847-4ca9-b80e-6c8e9ecd4339: Kisaragi Saya is a lonely, gloomy high school girl who is cursed to never be noticed by those around her, almost like a ghost. During her first summer in high school, Saya discovers the full-dive VRMMORPG "Shadow Assassin's World," changing her world forever. Even in the game, amidst a world monsters, demons, and other players, Saya finds that her presence is still nearly undetectable - so she decides to turn her curse into a blessing to become the top-class Ninja, "Kuro!" One day, an extroverted Ninja named "Hikari" crashes into her life and asks to be her apprentice! What lies ahead for this pair of polar opposites?
97f74fe8-64c8-427c-b13c-f59f4e1ad694:
Seinen (and one Josei) One-shot compilation focusing on insincerity, revenge, and the two-faced nature of men. 

Includes the following:

- **The Record of Peter Kürten** (ペーター・キュルテンの記録, Peter Kürten no Kiroku, ALT. ENG. - The Tale of Peter Kürten) - Manga biography on the infamous serial killer also known by the moniker *"The Vampire of Düsseldorf"*. Peter Kürten, a former prisoner-of-war, forms an idealistic couple with his wife and is a devoted unionist at meetings. In actuality he is a sexually perverted serial killer nicknamed the Vampire of Düsseldorf who taunts the police with escalating murders. After one of the murders, the police force a fake confession from another man, causing Peter to angrily reveal the truth to his wife, who gives him up to the police. At trial it is revealed that Peter is actually a criminal with a history of incest, bestiality, arson, and murder. When his lawyer tries to defend him by claiming madness, Peter angrily exclaims that his actions are revenge against the bourgeois. Peter is executed by guillotine. (Tezuka based the story on the work of Shunsuke Tsurumi)

- **Sensual Nights** (もの憂げな夜, Monouge na Yoru) - A wealthy Japanese playboy visits Vietnam to seduce a woman who has supposedly stopped aging while waiting for her sweetheart who was taken away by soldiers. As he is in the middle of preparing to have sex with her, his contact tells him that the woman's man was taken away by the Japanese army during the Pacific War, causing a deep hatred of Japanese people in her. He panics, but recovers when the woman reacts by offering him her body. When she fights back against his attempts at intimacy, he tells her that her lover is likely dead and forces himself on her. The man then sees a sight of a wrinkled old woman that startles him so much he jumps out of the window. The woman he had seduced was actually the daughter of the unaging woman and her sweetheart, and his contact was her fiancé.

- **Lord Iechika Mogami** (最上殿始末, Mogami-dono Shimatsu) - Piipii, a meager farmer, dreams of being a samurai so he can support his wife and their four children. One day he is employed by a lord to be his double, and Piipii's family is secretly killed. Piipii trains to be a lord, grooming and dressing himself to be the spitting image of the lord. As a test, the lord tells him to give the order to open the castle gates. Piipii rides back to visit his family, only to learn about their deaths. On the lord's wedding day, his double is supposed to replace him during the wedding ceremony to protect him from any attempts on his life. During the switch, Piipii murders the lord and consummates the marriage with the lady Sasa instead. When she learns of his identity, the lady has an affair with a syphilitic beggar, and kills herself. The disease spreads to Piipii and Sasa gets her revenge.

- **The Lady of the Rhine** (ラインの館にて, Rhine no Yakata nite) - A Japanese woman accompanies her husband on a business trip to Düsseldorf. She catches him having an affair, and when she confronts him, he leaves her. As she desperately searches for him in the streets, the woman is hit by a car and is hospitalized for a month. When she recovers, she visits her benefactor Lady Rathwood, the owner of a castle they had visited earlier. As she lives with Lady Rathwood, the woman learns of her hatred for men and her hatred for her husband is kindled. One day she discovers that the car she was hit with belongs to Lady Rathwood and she witnesses Lady Rathwood taking off the disguise of the woman who seduced her husband. Lady Rathwood calls her husband to the castle and gives the woman a knife, telling her to take her revenge. The woman refuses and goes back to her husband.

- **Fire Mountain** (火の山, Hi no Yama, ALT. ENG. - The Thief Akikazu Inoue) - Time is during the Second World War. The ruffian Akikazu Inoue (whose first name could also be read as Showa) went to the Sobetsu village in Hokkaido, became an assistant of Mr. Masao Mimatsu, an observer of Showa Shinzan, which rapidly generated. The description that Mikami lived for the observation and protection of Showa Shinzan was based on a true story.

---
**Volume 265 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
234d3d29-6044-4d6c-9a9c-9c8e5b31cc50:
"My name is Gen Kurosu, and as long as I stand, the Victory Flag will never fly over the heads of the Red Army!  The machines roar and blood sprays! My name is Gen Kurosu!"

Motocross is a sport in which contestants race for fame on steel horses through rugged, rough terrain. 

The essence of motocross is the struggle against the harsh nature and oneself. This is the story of a lone warrior who, despite being called "Stupid Don Quixote," stands in the way of the "Red Army," the most powerful motocross team in Japan, which has achieved an undefeated record of 150 victories in a single year. 

This is the memorable first serial publication of manga master Tetsuo Hara!

b53eecee-77f9-4881-947e-1f98bee2c928: Hisaki and Yasha are an odd pair of friends: Hisaki is quiet, distant, and possibly keeping secrets from everyone, while Yasha is loud, violent, and in serious need of anger management. 17d314ae-b032-4496-a1c8-30edaea261e2: Jiroubei (57), after 38 years of loyal service as a shinobi, loses his job after the death of his mistress. e39eb61f-f538-46fe-b8bf-db115ec51d1d:
Sengoku Period (1579): a young woman who has lost everything dedicates herself to seeking strength and a death on the battlefield. 
Reiri once lived happily with her family, until the day a group of soldiers came by after a battle and started a senseless slaughter. 
Her father, mother and brother sacrificed themselves in order for her to survive but she was truly saved only after the intervention 
of Okabe Tanpa no Kami, a warrior which had been sheltering in the village. In his service, she grew and learned to fight excellently, 
chasing her goal of a death in battle. However, her path to death may not be as short and straight as she hopes…

ef2b491c-c339-428e-a4d8-85bcc5dba46b:
(from ebookjapan):

Kaijo Tsuyoshi is the son of a Shorinji Kempo dojo owner. One day, he is ordered to wear a costume that was delivered to his father. He is told to put on the costume, which gives him superhuman strength, and fight with his friends, and his father is killed! 

The enemy are the Black Crusaders, international merchants of death. A shadowy army of nations around the world has joined forces to form the EGL (Eagle) , the Kanto Branch of the EGL Japan Bloc works with Goranger to combat them!

What released by Seven Seas Entertainment as part of their *Classics Collection* lineup only contained a portion of the total four volume Goranger. What was brought was written and illustrated by Shotaro Ishinomori, and composed 1.5 volumes worth of content. Aka 15 issues published in weekly Shounen Sunday in 1975.

The remaining volumes contain Goranger serials written and illustrated by Ishinomori's assistants. Titled Goranger Gokko "pretend play" The contents in them are suggestive and more comedic in tone. 

[Official English](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/books/super-sentai-himitsu-sentai-gorenger-the-classic-manga-collection/)
51e1b2f2-8e20-4ece-a271-81959e37e22d:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.

4129ff9b-c278-43db-adc5-113ca63e0247:

but he only gets the "copy" skill which is apparently useless but we all know it's secretly OP or something. 
He's enslaved to be a gladiator by his summoner, the big-boobed head priestess Zayd. 
He has to fight in the Colosseum and if he loses he gets sexually abused.
