5c1728a9-87c6-49db-9a61-a0df8acadc16:
Drawn in 1971 and 1972, these stories expand Yoshihiro Tatsumi’s vocabulary for characters contextualized by themes of depravity and disorientation in twentieth-century Japan. Some of the tales focus on the devastation the country felt as a result of World War II, and, yet, while American influence does play a role in the disturbing and bizarre stories contained within this volume, as always, it is Tatsumi’s characters that bear his hallmark, muddling through isolated despair and fleeting pleasure to live out their darkly nuanced lives.  
  
Some of the tales focus on the devastation the country felt as a result of World War II: in one story a man devotes twenty years to preserving the memory of those killed at Hiroshima, only to discover a horrible misconception at the heart of his tribute. Yet, while American influence does play a role in the disturbing and bizarre stories contained within this volume, as always it is Tatsumi’s characters that bear his hallmark, muddling through isolated despair and fleeting pleasure to live out their darkly nuanced lives.
2a4bc9ec-2d70-428a-8b46-27f6218ed267: Anthology from various doujin artists about Nagatoro and Senpai keeping to the theme of Nagatoro teasing Senpai and sometimes it backfiring on her.
8acaf27f-79b1-4355-9ed4-3e1b7d5ee6e6: An anthology of self-contained science fiction tales, each shining a light on different lives — on Earth, in space, across the present and the future — capturing the delicate shifts of human emotion. It all begins with Episode 1, a remake of Welcome Back to the Day After Tomorrow’s Future, the award-winning debut by Kae Hashimoto (76th Chiba Tetsuya Prize), which captured hearts on X with over 250,000 likes. This SF omnibus delivers stories that are at once strange and heartwarming — Odd and Kind.
8c953456-55a6-4294-913c-3f5f640711b1:
I can't be honest with you, but I'm really full of you, so I want to tell you and touch you--. Wu likes a senior member of the calligraphy club, and Miyabi is missed by a junior member of the first year. What do girls in love tell each other when they can no longer hold on to their feelings?　

This is a series of short stories about irresistibly sweet and passionate kisses overflowing with “I love you”, by Uzuki Coco, a rising star of heart-throbbing stories.

A young woman frequents a certain French bistro. She would really enjoy the food they serve if only it weren't for the bossy chef owner. "You may not like me, but I love your food."  
  
**2) Invisible Girl in Love** (Toumei Ningen no Koi)  
A story about a socially awkward girl who's kept to herself for so long that she may as well be invisible to her classmates. Then, one day, she falls in love.  
  
**3) Matryoshka**  
A sweet analogy of the Russian doll: Matryoshka.  
As each doll is opened up to give another one, so do each memory containing his feelings towards her.  
  
**4) The Selfish Couple**  
  
**5) Drops.**  
A series of interconnected vignettes depicting how something as ordinary as rain can alter the course of people's lives.

b113560e-da69-4604-b6f4-03892f59652f:
An anthology of six short stories:  
  
1. **The Ice Wanderer**  
Set in the Klondike region in 1897, and recounts the American author Jack London’s fortuitous encounter with an enigmatic old man.  
  
2. **White Wilderness**  
Also related to Jack London - it's an adaptation of the early part of his novel White Fang, in which two men and their team of dogs are relentlessly pursued by a pack of wolves.   
  
3. **Our Mountains**  
Set in 1920s Japan, the story follows an elderly hunter in his attempts to take vengeance on the enormous bear that killed his son.   
  
4. **Kaiyose-Jima**  
A nostalgic tale in which a boy is sent to spend the summer with relatives on the coast after his mother is taken ill.   
  
5. **Shôkarô**  
A mangaka looks back on the strange apartment building he lived in when he first came to Tokyo as an aspiring artist and the unusual people he met there.   
  
6. **Return To The Sea**  
The tale of a marine biologist working on the coast of Alaska who becomes obsessed with an elderly bowhead whale and the Inuit tales of a whale cemetery.  
  
*Toudo no Tabibito* was published in English as *The Ice Wanderer and Other Stories* by Ponent Mon / Fanfare on January 1, 2010. It was also published in Polish as *Wędrowiec z tundry by Hanami*.

Nagisa's summer vacation seems like it will be uneventful, except she keeps running into the handsome Yuuji. Can this be a summer romance, or maybe something more?

Madoka has been having sexy dreams of Akashi, probably because he's always teasing her! He has so many girls around him, she won't even give him obligatory chocolate. Can Akashi change her mind?

8103d717-d92d-4735-904a-123deb9977f3:
A collection of short stories from the pages of Sho-Comi!  
  
Story 1: Side Seat de Daite by Shinjo Mayu  
Mamii is in love with Sawaii, the person everyone considers to be a dork. When she confesses to him, he tells her he has conditions for dating her. What are the conditions? And is Sawaii the person she really thinks he is?  
  
Story 2: Brazen Lovers (3 chapters) by Mio Ayukawa  
Yuuna's mother moves them everytime she breaks up with a boyfriend. This new place is a real dump. Annoyed, Yuuna heads off to the beach where she meets a very sexy guy. Sou says "Lets always be together." but when Yuuna wakes up he's gone! Two people like this are bound to meet again…  
  
Story 3: Feel It, Roast Virgin by Kousaka Yuuka  
Rika is a virgin and is very nervous about her first night with her boyfriend Yuuya. It doesn't help that Yuuya tries to do it everywhere, outside, at school, he's ready! But will Rika be ready?  
  
Story 4: St. Gal Chick Valentine's Day by Ibuki Kaede  
Mika's school has separate buildings for boys and girls and the girls have asked Mika as a student representative to get them co-ed classrooms so they can spend Valentine's Day with school idol, Subaru. Mika vows to try her hardest, even though Subaru annoys her. But maybe he's not such a bad guy.  
  
Story 5: Secret Apple by Toda Megumi  
Sakura Kazuki and Katou Ryu are lovers who have been meeting secretly for two years. Because they were once step siblings, and their parents had a messy divorce, they can't tell anyone. Will they ever be able to love freely?  
  
Story 6: Double Face The Dangerous Classmate by Uchuuda Kai  
It seems Kuroda has been caught in yet another dangerous situation! The boy; whom she considers rudest in her class, Yuuki; has locked the door to the sport supply closet..
7aa8d3ed-1f76-45d8-8434-67c03089543c:
1. Real Kiss by Miyasaka Kaho  
The player, Fujikawa Mitsuki, likes to tease Haruna. One day their cell phones get switched. What will happen next?  
(Also published in volume "Real Kiss" as the first story.)  
  
2. Body Talk by Doumoto Nao  
Yuuri falls in love at first sight with Shingo, a basketball player from another school. From that moment on, she pursues him relentlessly. How will their relationship work out?  
(Also published in volume "Body Talk" as the first story.)  
  
3. Atashi no Mannaka by Watanabe Shiho  
In their school, dating was forbidden. Unknowingly, their secret kiss was seen. Now the principal's son is interested in her and takes matters into his own hands. Enmeshed in a dizzying spiral of desire and betrayal, where will she find love?  
  
4. Uso to Koi no Hajimari by Shimaki Ako  
Akane does a favor for her friend, Tomoko, by agreeing to show her childhood friend, Ken-kun, around Tokyo while pretending to be Tomoko! Will she be found out?  
  
5. Aa Itoshi no Caramel Boy! by Kayono  
Akira and Yuujirou, who are childhood friends, both love to surf, and both have an unrequited love for each other. This is because after Yuujirou kissed Akira a year ago, she slaps him! Now all he does is bully Akira and Akira has feelings of regret for slapping him!  
  
6. Renai Sensou by Sugi Emiko  
When Hiromi appears to be cheating on his girlfriend, she become furious and goes in search of a new boyfriend.
487b6225-3797-4991-8d1e-83bf543002f6:
A collection of naughty tales:  
  
1. II40°C (Shigano Iori)  
Yuiiko is dating Seki-sempai, but he's very protective of her. One night at a party her friends get him drunk so she can have fun, but she ends up sleeping with sexy DJ Ritsu! But she'll probably never see him again.  
  
2) Sensational Love Lesson Ensnaring Melody (Murata Yuka)  
Nana is a slave to her piano teacher, Satsuki. Satsuki has a split personality and only Nana sees the dark abusive side. Trapped in this relationship, can newcomer Tsukamoto help her break free?  
  
3) I Want the Enchantment from Your Lips (Kuchibiru kara Toroketai) (Ayukawa Mio)  
When Mifuyu was a child her brother told her kissing tastes like slugs, then made her kiss one! She's scarred for life, and serial dates to try to find a guy who she can kiss. But she's left a trail of broken hearts behind her and some of them are bitter…  
  
4) The Love Textbook (Renai Kyoukasho) (Harushiro Amami)  
Mimi Kawashima bought a sexy novel because the author has the same name as her beloved teacher, Shingo Toono. But the girl in the novel is named Mimi Kawashima too, and she has a very intimate relationship with her teacher…  
  
5) I Want to Be Melted by You (Anata ni Toketai) (Watanabe Shiho)  
Mebuki has a crush on Kasuga who goes to school across the street. She decides to confess to him, but Kasuga might not be the guy she thinks he is.  
  
6) Pure Heart Urges (Junjou Shoudou) (Ibuki Kaede)  
Hagimoto is in love with Kei, but he turns down every girl who confesses to him. So she decides to give a very physical confession, but will this ruin her chances with him forever?

Roux comes from another country and lives with Ichiko, a smart player who fools around with all the girls. She doesn't wear panties because it's not a part of her culture…? And kissing is a casual greeting!?

The go-to girl for love advice has never had a boyfriend? Her geeky chameleon teacher finds out, but how? How can a chameleon teacher also be an erotic novelist?!

The 4th volume of the Isekai x Over-the-Top Love BL Anthology is here!

Dive into a world of fantasy and intense affection where love knows no limits. Whether it’s brewing tea for a possessive king, getting marked by a demon lord, or receiving letters from a childhood friend dominating another world, each story offers a different flavor of romance in alternate universes!

Cover Illustration: Shinobu Takayama

Included Stories:

"The Royal Tea Brewer"
Art: Okaka | Story: Saki
A humble servant finds himself brewing more than just tea for a cold but captivating king.

"The Stunningly Beautiful Fourth Prince Wants to Lose His Virginity Before Marriage"
Art: Mochita | Story: Omochi DX
A royal beauty on a risqué quest before tying the knot.

"The Rank-C Adventurer Already Belongs to the Demon Lord"
Art: Akatsuki Amama | Story: Kirin Kakuta
A low-ranked adventurer discovers he's already been claimed by someone… terrifyingly powerful.

"Spring Feelings, One-Sided Love"
Art: Morishima Peko | Story: Mia Mizuki
Tender emotions bloom in spring as a silent love tries to take root.

"A Letter from My Overpowered Childhood Friend in Another World"
Art: WA:WA | Story: Mameko
An ordinary day is shaken when a letter arrives from someone who’s now unbeatable… and possibly still in love.
a2225df7-0cbf-46a6-9b96-56adba090e6b:
Robot is an all-color manga compilation compiled and edited by the elite manga artist Range Murata, character designer for Studio Gonzo's Last Exile and Blue Submarine No. 6. Murata's hand-picked contributors come together in a mind blowing experiment of what happens when top manga artists work in the unusual medium of color.  
  
Robot was partially published in English, the first three volumes by Digital Manga Publishing from September 19, 2005 to December 1, 2006, after which the license was taken over by Udon Entertainment, who published volumes 4 and 5 from December 1, 2007 to May 1, 2008, before they too dropped the license. It has been published in its entirety in French by Glénat.
2a045681-d08e-41d7-b028-dd2981667584:
A special booklet that came with Yuri Hime 11. Most are mini-sequels to stories from Yuri Hime, Yuri Hime S, and Yuri Hime Wildrose.  
||  
1. First Love Sisters (Hatsukoi Shimai) extra by Shinonome Mizuo is a version of Alice in Wonderland.  
  
2. Hatsumoude Syndrome: In an extra in Kazuma Kowo's Pure Water Adolescence series, Nanao and Matsumoto celebrate the New Year.  
  
3. Creo the Crimson Crises extra by Takewakemaru  
  
4. Aoi Shiro 4-panel strips by Edoya Pochi  
  
5. Getting Cozy: A group of 4-panel comics based on Morishima Akiko's The Conditions For Paradise (Rakuen no Jouken) collection.  
  
6. Nanami and Misuzu extra by Minakata Sunao, featuring New Year's-related gags.  
  
7. Apple Day Dream 2 by Jounouchi Nene is about how hard it is for Yuma and Kaoru to be apart. The first chapter's published in Sayuri-Hime 2.  
  
8. Watermelon Sacchan by Yoshitomi Akihito is a mini-sequel to Suika from Nettai Shoujo. Rin buys Sacchan a watermelon.  
  
9. Cassiopeia Dolchu by Takagi Nobuyuki is a short in the Cassiopeia Dolce series from Yuri Hime S.  
  
10. The First Smile of the New Year: original by Mizuki Maya. A girl tries to make her friend smile.  
  
11. The Vice President's Fortune by Hakamada Mera is a short of the "Kaichou to Fukukaichou" series from Comic Yuri Hime S.  
  
12. A Maiden's Heart is a few 4-panel strips about Iwami Shouko's Yuri Hime S series flower*flower.  
  
13. The Maidens' Salon is a few 4-panel strips about Sudoo Kaoru's Yuri Hime S series Otome -Kikan Gretel.  
  
14. Girls Don't Cry: Ritsuko gets a shock –one of her friends thinks Sayo is cool! A mini-sequel to Sweet Little Devil (Nanzaki Iku) from Yuri Hime Wildrose' first volume and Heart and Soul from second volume.  
  
15. Image Change: Izawa thinks Yoshikawa could use an image change. A mini-sequel to Blue (Hayase Hashiba) from Yuri Hime Wildrose   
  
16. The Greenhouse New Year's Dream: Saki's first dream of the new year is naughty. A mini-sequel to The Greenhouse Witch and The Greenhouse Secret by Mikuni Hajime (Yuri Hime Wildrose)  
  
17. Hao! extra: Haoran takes offense at a dictionary's definition of a particular term. A mini-sequel to "Hao!", by Chi-Ran, that appears in the first volume of Yuri Hime Wildrose.  
  
18. The Bridal Squabble by Tokitsukaze Otoha is a mini-sequel to "Ichiban Suki na Hito" from Yuri Hime Wildrose. Rinko and Ai fight over who gets to be the bride.  
||

9b921b75-965e-4b05-97e7-dbabb7e7cb1c:
Born to a first time omega father, Katsu Keiichi goes through his life with a handful of hardships. He struggles to keep up with school and life outside of it whilst also facing the troubles of being an omega.

When he transferred to a different school fit for his creative talents, Keiichi met Mochizuki Kaiten, an upperclassman alpha who was the first person to befriend him. 

Despite leaving his home town, Keiichi still has some inconveniences shadowing him — bullies, rivals, conflicting feelings, and the fear of becoming a stray.

[ This is my first time doing this manga thingy, so it's not much or perfect. I do this for fun though! Just wanted to share the stories I have in my head. Hope it's not too bad! ] —Mao.
8c1d3701-199c-441b-ab31-46bf25e55e64:
Makoto Mitsuya, an economics student living in a dorm.

After his roommate was hospitalized, he indulged in his otaku hobbies to the fullest while living alone. However, his new roommate, Ken Hayami, turned out to be the complete opposite—a flashy, party animal with a totally different personality and appearance!

Frustrated by their clashing personalities and Hayami’s annoying behavior, Mitsuya initially held a grudge, but slowly begins to open up thanks to Hayami’s attempts to get closer.

One night while drinking together, Hayami teases Mitsuya for being an inexperienced virgin. Annoyed by the teasing, Mitsuya impulsively pushes him down. But when Hayami reacts with obvious pleasure, Mitsuya gets carried away—and the two end up having sex…!?!?
60746565-57c5-4a8a-9147-cb63f9b9c58a: The flawless Prince Nazaire changes schools in hopes of wooing a bride… only to encounter the tyrant Cassius Li! At first, the two cannot stand one another, as they constantly infuriate each other. Yet between ball dances, rescues, and secret rendezvous, Nazaire and Cassius begin seeing each other for who they truly are. But love between a prince and a commoner could never happen, and if Nazaire hopes to ascend the throne, he will have to give up Cassius. Torn between love and duty, can the prince and tyrant reach their happily ever after?
4fb13e27-641c-427e-ac61-01db67837b83:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)
9f646ffa-2f4e-4ad2-9aed-1452194369c8: Little Geuroo was curious about him. That boy from next door who asked him a strange question. The boy, Lee Garam, who always avoided him even though all Geuroo wanted was to get close to him. But before Geuroo could even confess, Garam disappeared in thin air, leaving only clusters of blue light behind. And then, one summer, he appeared in front of Geuroo as if nothing happened…?
003ef8e4-0ae6-4dfe-8195-cd42a8cf37dc:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?
e002d3bf-3166-472c-aaa3-35b013b51969:
"If you're coming, then just come. You missed me didn't you."  
"Understood, 'Master'."  
  
A florist and his regular customer…  
On the surface, they seem normal but they have a very special relationship…  
Restraints, handcuffs, toys, SM…  
The florist is a master and the other is a dog who listens obediently…  
However, things take an interesting turn when their already unusual relationship grows into something more.
6dfef8eb-a32a-4729-b854-995346321ed5: My boyfriend, that was 287km away is now 3km away? Professor Bo Chang Yi used to be good at understanding others but is now no longer humane. The happiness in Ting Shuang’s heart vanished in an instant, leaving only fear, if you think about it, it seems that there will be disaster in the near future.
6be61729-1150-4d15-851b-90d9888f9e1d:
The 31st generation descendant of the Yoo Sim Joo clan, Joo Cheongdo.
 The curse that he was given when he was young kills everyone he has given affection to and even threatens his own life. However, Cheongdo, who cannot give up his will to live, expects a final miracle from Yoo Chanran, who can solve any problem.
"How much is it? 
"Starts at 100,000 won per hour."
c164880f-bbc1-4b5d-b980-63121be49609:
« J’aurais préféré vivre en oubliant tout ça. »
Malgré tous ses efforts, Hyeon-gu se retrouve affecté en province et doit rentrer dans sa ville natale. Là, il croise à nouveau, pour la première fois en dix ans, son ancien camarade de lycée Moon-sang, qui gère désormais la librairie Jeongmun Seolim, leur ancien repaire.

En le revoyant, les souvenirs de leur tout premier baiser, soigneusement enfouis, refont surface… et son cœur recommence à battre.
fd8976d9-002d-40b0-b41d-5df9cd927701:
The setting is ancient-China. Our main characters are poisonous (sometimes domesticated) harpy-like creatures, who get their poison and the ornate coloring that they’re so proud of, from the toxic plants which they eat.  
  
This is a yaoi focusing on the (somewhat fraught) relationship between two such harpies.  
  
If you’re here for a human x harpy relationship… Well, let’s just say you won’t be disappointed either.
d0f286ac-9ecf-4472-a3d7-1009eb0199e2: Basketball players. Bad boys who aren’t really bad boys. Roommates. Senpai-kouhai BL romance. It all started when Kagiura moved into the school dorms with what seemed to be a bad-boy upperclassman. But after he’s left in the tender care of his mother hen of a roommate, Hirano, it’s too much to ask for Kagiura not to fall in love…right?!
a54c0d5f-78f6-499d-86dc-8da00a8e4b2e:
A story about the twisted entanglement between a depressed, shut-in, have-been mangaka, and another best-seller, Super Darling mangaka.
This is an independent manga done by Eno Sumi (After God) under the alias of Hanae Deki (英恵 溺).
4c755396-f91a-46d3-8f4b-55b58f210d12: At the place where 20-year-old Kota works, a college student starts working as a part-timer for the summer. His name is Chizuru, a boy Kota never wanted to see again. They were classmates in junior high, and were forced to kiss each other in a punishment game. Chizuru must hate him, but for some reason, he tries to kiss Kouta whenever he gets a chance! What's more he says that he came to work here just so he could see Kota again!?
841358dd-887a-402d-bb83-fe8bf59bfff9: Myungha Tae is going to die in 300 days. Well… maybe. After getting sucked into his friend’s novel, "Love Interest Zone," 29-year-old Myungha becomes a 19-year-old high schooler again with one mission—make Yeowoon Cha happy or die. With only 300 days to succeed, Myungha must break past Yeowoon’s barriers and prevent him from experiencing the same tragic fate as he did in the novel. But with Yeowoon’s favorability toward him in the negatives, will he be able to survive?
a00b8e8c-ff04-450f-8941-95ecb9feaa34: It must be a sign when you keep running into the same cute stranger over and over again. Even more so when you both share a love for instant noodles. Who says a nearby convenience store isn’t a place to fall in love?
3d4d88b3-9eeb-4702-93b5-9e8cd20e67d3: A goth boy and a jock forms a bond over time...
62994137-014f-4499-b88a-c219b115fd64: Xue Zhao came looking for a missing woman in Chenjia Village. However, he learns that the village answers to a cult devoted to a forgotten Gu deity. Xue Zhao then tries to escape with his companions, but he soon realizes that there are even more terrifying, hidden secrets within the village. These unknown horrors go far beyond anything he could have imagined...
a8ee1d8c-43e9-485f-9651-265e94d6b4e6: Pairing: Gojo Satoru x Itadori Yuuji
b6638272-35cf-4206-9136-76d55f072235:
Cha In-woo, a shy student with zero presence, becomes partners with Kwak Ha-jun, who looks exactly like his favorite game character. While Cha In-woo is excited to bond with him while working on homework assigned by his teacher, Cha In-woo suddenly finds himself drawn into a cruel bet by Kwak Ha-jun...

A heartwarming romantic comedy between two high school students!
f777da8d-878b-4114-a256-31b21933afc3: Ten years of unreturned feelings left Kanta a bit wary of love. So it's pretty ironic when Ryo, whose older brother is now dating Kanta's former crush, grows attached to him. They easily bond over their shared passion for gaming and hang out together quite often. Kanta finds himself enjoying Ryo's cheerful and honest personality, not even bothered by the family connection to his past heartbreak. But then, out of the blue, Ryo admits that he might be falling for him!
baac09cd-6eb9-43ec-a780-980c8da4f066: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
f6c718eb-b836-45d6-83a4-6fa5738e536c: The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~
2df33524-2a47-4967-8bde-9718d37cbe90: When a brother takes the place of his younger sister, he becomes a "Blessed Maiden," charged with dispensing magic... with his body?! An otherworldly story of the relationship between an arrogant sorcerer and his "Blessed Maiden" (♂).
fb0e8a82-fc5a-4d81-a000-827bce15590f:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.
3a840ace-45a3-41b6-9c96-9a720d510a30:
Vampires Charles J. Chrishunds (Charley) and Johnny Rayflo have a strange relationship. Charley is a cyborg and a vampire hunter for the Vatican, while his master Rayflo enjoys a playboy lifestyle. While fighting crimes involving vampires, Charley struggles to control his lust for blood and for Rayflo, while Rayflo delights in seducing his servant and attempts to deal with issues from his own past. Rayflo cares about Charley (also known as Cherry and Chris), and these feelings don't seem to be one-sided.  
  
*The second volume of Vassalord contains a bonus one-shot in the back, a fantasy story called "Zoul Harf" or "Zoul Half." This special one-shot was first published in the Comic Blade Masamune summer issue in 2003.
162fafbc-8902-45bf-a595-6750ccd2bb7d: A world where demons prevail and humans are rare. Hiyori, a human, is considered to be delicious to demons. However, his classmate, Hodaka, a pushy big-horned demon, found out his secret. On top of that, he kissed and tasted him…Charming a demon—a troublesome situation?! Surrendering to one's instinct and pleasure leads to…
b521bab9-2671-40bc-90f3-9833902704f3: The fish circle the bait beneath calm waters of a lake. Inside the club, Jiang Rang follows Qing Zhou's invisible "fishing line" into a private room. Qing Zhou plays prey, but he's the hunter. As passion ignites, a hidden camera rolls and intimate sounds reach a third listener. Blood fades in the dark water. Who's really the catch in this deadly game of seduction?
514e7b5a-688e-4c5c-9294-8f0f250f6425: The star of a male idol group who has a cold demeanor, who also has no control in restraining himself. And an idol with a harmless and childlike cutesy personality on cameras and is able to stay in character, but is an complete opposite off-stage… They're sworn enemies that hate each other and somehow ends up having to act like a couple with each other as fan service?! Yup, Looks sweet!
591d260c-ead0-4380-a181-76d4c905267e:
High school graduation.

The rival I’d been tangled up with all throughout my school years came up to me and confessed that he liked me. It wasn’t the outcome I’d imagined, but in the end, I thought I’d finally won.

At least, until I ran into him again years later—this time with a young son in tow.

Filthy slut…

If your heart was that easy to sway, why’d you even confess to me in the first place?

Well, whatever.

Someone like you? Fucking you again would be nothing at all.
2cd59abe-3680-4543-9f40-ae7c01ff3276: Histoire d'amour amusante entre un alpha aux allures de gangster et un médecin alpha indifférent.
d7ba00ea-d1ed-4855-8dfb-77ab8e6e2797: Taichi, who moved to Tokyo and dreamed of meeting his "soulmate" on his first day at university, suddenly fails miserably on a dating app! He is saved by a mysterious handsome man when he is in trouble at a hotel, and things are going well... or so he thinks, but they break up just before the two of them get together. While he is feeling frustrated about being toyed with, he meets the "mysterious handsome man" again, now known as Kiryu Chisato, who is actually a senior at the same university as Taichi!? A foolish DK who tends to go out of control and a super cool senior who is good at paying attention, are these mismatched two destined to be together? Or...?
d0dde84d-4b60-42c9-8be8-5906343988cb: Young Ruan, the little lord of House Marcellion, has never had an easy childhood. With his older brother constantly feigning illness, the burden of the harsh heir’s training falls squarely on his small shoulders. One day, unable to take it any longer, Ruan dashes out of the mansion and loses himself in the forest. There, he stumbles upon a boy his own age. They don’t exchange names, and yet none of that seems to matter. With him, even nibbling on grass becomes an adventure. Ruan finds himself laughing, playing, and perhaps for the very first time, feeling free. Day by day, his thoughts drift further from the rigid lessons of succession and closer to the warmth of that kindhearted boy. But gossip spreads quickly, and soon even the stern Count Marcellion hears whispers of his son’s wandering heart… Could a simple forest friendship change the path of an heir?
42060735-a373-465a-a7a9-0fee5db73e3e: A true story about the creation of the camera.
2a17978f-30ba-4cec-bbc5-e8810f21b6c0: Aoi, a hard-headed young man secretly yearning for love. When playing the harem game he secretly bought in his best friend Ritsuki’s house, he somehow gets sucked into the game’s world with Ritsuki! While understanding that if they don’t clear the game they can’t leave, Aoi decides to try his best in romancing one of the girls, but suddenly Ritsuki confesses to him…? The story between a whole hearted ikemen childhood friend x a hard headed young man who secretly yearns for love virtually unfolds!
cd3ee2c5-4317-4e23-a8df-7d3093948f31:
In the summer of 202X, a crisis comes for the majority of demons who have been receiving human souls and filling their mana.
As there are more devilish humans than demons, there is no need to seek help from demons even while selling their souls.
In order to overcome this employment difficulty, demons are preparing to move to a 'mongma' that can absorb energy without human consent.
It’s the same for Uffir, but it's not as easy as it sounds. In the end, a detective, Cheol-ho, appears in front of Uffir, who is trying to become a mongma by tricking him...
3f31e362-8e43-4510-b004-6f1f0037b345:
A prestigious school where only girls can attend-Winebirds Royal Magic Academy. A boy visited there. His name is Noah.  
  
It was called as the first male student to co-educate the school.  
Then, he started living together with a problematic beautiful girl, Anya.  
  
However, his pure smile and non-pure tentacles created various ripples in the school…!!!
5ad85438-68dc-4f83-947e-a3766680d287: Sasaki-kun, a slightly crazy boy, is in love with his senpai, a bad boy, and he likes that even more! Siina-senpai changes girlfriends more than pants and Sasaki-kun has a record of more than 160 confessions to his senpai. While Siina-Senpai devises ways to make Sasaki give up, Sasaki is in love with this bad boy and won't give up until he wins him.
ed7a22ce-b1f9-4b38-b44f-c2187ae438fe:
[#BL Manga] [Omegaverse]
*Even if they can't put their gratitude and love into words…*
A story about two people who deeply understand each other!
A Puppy-like Alpha × Tsundere Omega Childhood Friends Omegaverse Story
When he goes into heat, the uke becomes honest...
This is the daily life of Kousuke × Natsuki!
2e1accb0-c8df-4a24-9ea8-10392b411085: Second spin-off featuring Otoha and his manager.
d41567d0-ecd3-4b9f-975a-5f20697e1ea6:
It's a typical confession scene of a boy confessing his love to a girl... Or is it?

(It's just a single panel lel)
e4913955-6d5b-47ff-835e-120d0509c7a3: Mizuno is a thirty-something office worker who is not good at real love and loves shojo manga. While he is tormented by regret after spending the night with Meguro, a subordinate he has a crush on, under the influence of alcohol, Meguro casually proposes to them that they go out together...!?
ad1fba55-cde5-45d9-a66f-01316580e666:
"This guy's my lover."

Ryou quit his job after his girlfriend invited him to join a pyramid scheme.

One day, when he went to her home, he was worried about her and found a large number of Yakuza!

Ryou is in a desperate situation when he is suspected of being in league with his girlfriend, who has absconded with money belonging to the Daikoku clan, and is rescued by Miyoshi, a junior high school classmate who happens to be a member of the Daikoku clan.

The two end up living together as fake lovers until the situation cools down, but Miyoshi, who was supposed to be a good friend at the time, is quite cold toward Ryou...?
2e85b6e4-f73c-4483-8860-f55f2bd67119: I want to be the reason you, whose name I don't even know, choose to live one more day tomorrow.
fc9dc38d-d92f-4063-bd72-9a539fa392d8:
Sumino, a first-year high school student, enrolls in a prestigious soccer school in Kamakura but breaks his leg soon after joining the team. Unable to practice and feeling out of place, he spends his days wandering aimlessly and his nights partying. Then one day, he meets Aoki, an older man working at an izakaya, and slowly begins to experience emotions he has never felt before. A story of one unforgettable summer, both the worst and the best.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
16a49509-c1f5-49a6-af81-6255969a9665:
Mayo, who is gloomy and lacks self-confidence, is currently active as the bright and cheerful popular VTuber "Mahiru".

The more Mahiru, the polar opposite of his true self, is loved, the more the reality of being alone becomes painful...

Even his manager Ogino, who praises him a lot and spoils him, is probably only looking at Mahiru, not the real "me".

Because he knows this, he can't take Ogino's words "I love you" seriously and wish to be loved by him so much...!

However, as if seeing through Mayo's "desire to be bullied", Ogino asks, "Shall I bully you instead?", revealing the depths of his body trembling with anticipation...!?

A sweet, sadistic, caring manager x an unconsciously masochistic, gloomy VTuber

Development of the mind and body! Pampered Love Days!!!!
4b049c18-1c49-4f92-949f-d2e725a7a67c:
Mok-yeon receives a proposal for a threesome from his friend and sex partner, Sun-hwa. The other person is Nan-jo, a man that Sun-hwa has been wooing, and while he's great to have around because he's rich and kind, the problem is that he is boring to have sex with. At first, Mok-yeon was just a little curious about Nan-jo, but throughout the threesome, he couldn't take his eyes off Nan-jo. Mokyeon makes a seductive offer to Nan-jo, who wants to save Sun-hwa from him.

“I'd like to have a taste of your body, Nan-jo. Would you be willing to spread your legs for me?”
50d9f5b3-fc69-4742-bd72-1d652c337cf4: The cute and cheerful girl working at a Japanese style maid cafe, Hana. The black haired cold beauty, Mei. Though the two are in love with each other, they have not realized it. However, they have a secret that should not be discovered…
25940c8e-d443-4fd4-b90a-4751f9daee62: A BL (Bloody Love comedy) set in a long established bathhouse between a skilled vampire and a super pure virgin high school boy.
87bf00f1-7964-4105-8781-f08d94bc2896:
Seven years ago, Toraji met the most beautiful man he had ever seen.

The time they spent together was as passionate as it was brief, and the man disappeared among the multitudes of Edo, the shogunate's capital. Toraji never learned his real name, or address, or occupation - but he never gave up on finding him again.

Only, he didn't expect that when he did, the man would turn out to be the master of a high-class ryokan and restaurant, or that he would have a young daughter. How did this happen? Why did he run? Who is the child's mother and where is she?

And most of all, will Toraji get a second chance to pursue the one great love of his life?
05a62dc9-7eec-437a-ab0e-9427a9fd7190: Nitori is dead. Or at least he should be, except, he was sent by mistake to the Bird Afterlife instead of the human one. Chief Karasuma, a raven deity and also a salaried afterlife manager, is unamused at first, but then concedes to give Nitori a chance to work for him. Nitori loves birds, and even more so, he loves chief Karasuma, with his glossy feathers and powerful beak. How will he manage this strange new... afterlife?
ca69d12d-4bae-412c-89e6-2f6e74fd22c0:
A guy loves his (guy) friend. But he knows he's unworthly for him.  
  
But a desire is a desire nevertheless. And it grows.
ae2ca2d2-5cfd-408d-a337-71f4e4c475f3: After a cataclysm rocks the world causing humans and animals to perish in large numbers, those left behind work to restore the land. The sage Mannaz is tasked with decontaminating a poisoned forest but quits before the job is fully finished and leaves his disciple Baum to look after things in his stead. When the handsome knight Pera comes in search of Mannaz and only finds Baum in the sage's home, he resolves to wait there until Mannaz returns. With this new unexpected housemate, Baum's life is about to get a lot more interesting.
f5531a88-2251-425e-91ad-98d187260090:
1-4) When Ryuu transfers to Hitomi's school, he leaves an immediate impression on him. Curious about rumours of a full-scale tattoo on Ryuu's back, Hitomi starts getting closer to him. Before long, the friendship and fascination Hitomi feels for Ryuu start developing into more, but before he has a chance to come to terms with his feelings, Hikaru appears on the scene…. and he has his eyes set on Hitomi.  
  
5-6) Now that Hikaru has become close friends with Hitomi and Ryuu, the group dynamics have changed. When Hikaru expresses his growing interest in Hitomi, will Ryuu admit his feelings or let Hitomi slip away…?  
  
7-8) Ryuu seems to have found comfort in other places as Hitomi and Hikaru Taira get further involved. Sexual frustrations finally find an outlet, though misdirected.  
  
9-11) In a startling series of events that lead up to Hydra's transfixing climax, hearts break, enemies resurface, and ties of friendship bind the trio in a complex web of struggle, sacrifice, and redemption.
07c28be5-7a71-4611-aae8-0630b45292de: This volume includes short stories of four couples.
dd0633ee-f05e-4874-9a07-9a49386a89c7: A story about cousins, unhealthy relationships, and denial of one's sexuality. And of course rough sex.
b265615e-19f3-41d0-bb22-2fd088907445:
Under the cover of the night  
In the silent harbor  
Two lovers, lips sealed on each other, reunited after two long years…  
True love never dies…
4d594c91-3111-484d-a00e-37124c352949:
1) Buchou to Takeda-kun  
Taku is in love with his childhood friend Hiro, so when he's invited to Hiro's house whilst his parents are away he plans to do something about it. However, it seems Hiro has something similar in mind!  
  
2) Yume Miru youni Dakaretai (Hold me Like in the Dream)  
Iizuka Kunio is facing middle age and is not going without a fight, especially since his younger subordinate Takeda-kun has been at his office.  
  
5) Asayake no Anchikushou  
"Soap" was the name of a place where Motoki whored himself to homosexuals. He hadn't expected to work there permanently, but circumstances had left him to stay. Life wasn't that great, but a meeting with Jiro from the tofu shop changed that. And after that it seemed as though chance and kindness slowly weaved them into each other's life.  
  
6) Seishun Nano Missile Heaven (The Attack of the Youth Missile)  
A oneshot concerning friends since elementary school, and it's time for a birthday celebration. Both boys seem to have their "gift" in mind. Who gets the gift? Who gives the gift? Who is the main course for dinner?  
  
7. GINO
a8ba539c-5d56-487a-a507-0b9e78b26545: Isayama Natsu is a free spirit: he doesn't wear socks, he sets butterflies free from rooftops, and he gives blowjobs to other boys in the school's tool shed. Taneda Kouki, who believes himself normal in every possible way, accidentally sees the latter while taking a shortcut. Isayama bewilders and fascinates Taneda, who also begins questioning his own normality…
7425835d-f726-4e9f-9399-ef1107308060: As a child, Kasama Ryuuji watched his parents killed before his eyes by the rival, Yazuka gang. As a teenager, he finds the woman who raised him after the death of his parents, raped and murdered by the same gang. With the lost of his loved ones, Ryuuji wants nothing more to do with the Yazuka. When everything seem lost, the kind and caring, Araki, who claims to be the brother who his adoptive mother appears. Ryuuji develops a special bond with Araki but how will Ryuuji react when he learns that Araki, in fact, is the only surviving member of the Kasama gang, who has devoted his life to protecting Ryuuji. Will Araki-san, the dragon, be able to keep Ryuuji safe, or will his enemies use the young man as a pawn against him?
326663d6-3fe1-4d92-ab5a-2ca57157d5e1: Motoki was originally an ordinary guy with an ordinary life. Soon, however, Motoki starts noticing that things are changing in himself and his surroundings. His bad eyesight is cured, and suddenly he becomes prettier. As if in response to this mysterious change, two strange men appear in class, Shidou and Kubota. His classmates tell him that they have always been there, but he has no recollection of them. Then he finds out that both of them are after his life, and planning on "devouring his heart."
c79acfd5-a863-4ad4-aaf4-51ba524ff4cd: A collection of cute, heart-warming yaoi oneshots.
78c63eab-0851-4c48-87fa-2df8e87df373:
"Wh-Who are you?"  
  
One day, Taichi, a college student, is approached by a stranger in a place that is very dear to him. He is informed by this man, who calls himself Zama, that the place may no longer exist. It is where the orphaned Taichi first met his beloved guardian Kanda.  
  
Who is this Zama? Taichi is anxious…
5d51751b-8649-49b8-a7b3-e9f9aa78bfba:
Kondo Masahito is a tough high school senior, while his older brother Yoshio is a calm and gentle kindergarten teacher, so it is not rare that younger brother protects the older one. Different personalities make it difficult for Masahito to understand his brother, but he still tries.  
  
Chapters 5-9 are oneshots:  
5) Ghost –Setagaya-ku no Maboroshi–  
6) Amai Natsu no Kyousoukyoku  
7) Unbalanced・Tart  
8) Kimi wa Nemuru  
9) DEAR / Ganbare! Kagaku-bu
0704ce72-f28c-4a99-a431-d6b78252e691: Although they’re brothers, their appearances and personalities are complete opposites. One day, these two different brothers suddenly switched souls!? After possessing his cute, girly little brother's body, the tough big brother's hard days begin.
9df915ea-5b50-4c61-96d6-91b3983b92ce: During a trip following a devastating heartbreak, Raoul meets the handsome Arabian prince, Asif! The prince is more radiant than the sun and Raoul finds himself captivated by Asif's beauty. Despite Raoul's vow never to let himself suffer heartbreak again, he wonders if this love is worth breaking his vow over.
91a39200-2338-4773-b7be-bc40430f0b94:
1) Saikou no Kimi  
All begins when Soga Naoaki went to complain to the president of the student counsil, Yoshizumi Sekai, about the reducing of his volleyball team's bookings. By coincidence, Naoaki becomes the vice-president of the student counsil because of the health of the current one. He and Sekai don't get along, but what happens when they have to organise the school festival? Also found in Koibito no Namae  
  
2) Kimi to Boku no Itsu Pobun  
Oneshot also found in [Renai Jikaku Shoujou](https://mangadex.org/title/55805/renai-jikaku-shoujou).  
  
3)Kimi ni Ai ni  
Oneshot also found in [Takaramono](https://mangadex.org/title/27658/takaramono).
1e0cb226-3b30-4484-b2eb-c74b7230b86e: The students always call him dark, dirty, scary so science teacher, Fuwa Tsutomo, couldn't show his true identity as a good-looking man. Yet he had liked a student, Kurusu, who was failing science. So in order to help and be with Kurusu, even if it's just for a while, Fuwa changed into the "Phantom of Science" and be a private tutor for Kurusu. Unfortunately Kurusu's friend revealed his secret, but still Kurusu didn't care; he only hated Fuwa, not his "Phantom"
55b00af0-4df4-48a3-9cd0-a0e980773e27: The mysterious man who seduced me in my dreams… has materialized in real life?!
72241621-8bb9-46fa-8dd0-583d10f720ea:
1: Chief Mikimoto has been in a "relationship" with co-worker Kosaka for the past month. Kosaka has now fallen in love. One night, Kosaka is looking for Mikimoto… and he finds him having sex with the company president! So what does Kosaka do? Throw logical thinking to the wind and join them to form a threesome!  
  
2: As Kagiwashi-sensei is patrolling the night streets, he happens to come across what he thinks is bullying – but is that actually what is going on?
7a7e8551-2e53-4ac4-953b-398402dd1b8f: Kazuto has injured himself and he's living alone. His half-brother, Kiyoto, offers him his servant Toudou for help till he recovers from his injuries. But Kiyoto isn't thinking about Kazuto's health but something else Kazuto posseses. How loyal will Toudou be for his master when there are other feelings stirring underneath?
029f797c-9457-488d-89b4-e3ac8e66c608: An original doujinshi about a pair of cat lovers.
88fd8c32-d419-4d95-812c-7cee85671660: It's 1904. Natsume, the son of a old and prominent family, is cursed with a small, frail body. Because of this, he isn't qualified to enlist in the Japanese forces for the upcoming war with Russia. He is unhappily resigned to becoming a teacher. That is until he meets Daigo, a student. Daigo reminds Natsume that he could inspire and lead just as many future soldiers and leaders of Japan as a teacher, as he could as an officer. Daigo promises to become a great solider under Natsume's tutelage. But unlike Natsume, Daigo isn't in it only for the honor of Japan.
fc95d2b8-8fc0-4823-9b48-33b2bc2498f5: They've been dating for a year, and still haven't had sex. Even after booking a room in a nice love hotel just for the occasion, his boyfriend still has hang-ups. What could be the problem?
73d04f87-2b4f-41e0-b205-b6e5e660595a: Ren and Shizune have been dating for 7 years. Now they're moving in together. Will Ren manage to get virgin Shizune to play naughty games with him?
d6cc6eae-6802-4456-865f-3f07325108b3: Ren is a cat from the Pet rental organization. He can give his master anything they desire, so long as they don't hurt him. What will his new owner want him to do?
13d85061-7aed-43fa-9c2c-4b4fc5ed7624: Fujimori and Matsuda attended the same high school and college; unbeknownst to even himself, Fujimori had made it a habit to hang around his senpai under the pretext of enjoying the delicious sweets that Matsuda was so good at making. But after Matsuda moved to Toyko for work, Fujimori cut off contact with him. 5 years later, they reunite unexpectedly and…
725bf5e3-6b86-4765-a78b-952ebe4c4d69: Kirishima "Maa-chan" Masao and Kurokawa "Tai-chan" Taisuke have been friends since they were little, both looking out for each other – but when Maa-chan catches his friend being assaulted by a teacher, he can't help but blame himself for always thinking and never acting on his desire to protect his friend.
2384995f-3ea1-4a2e-9c51-44791ced18ac: After graduating from high school, Masami, an office clerk at a law office, ended up raising his niece Akira due to his sister suddenly running away from home. When taking Akira to kindergarten one day, Masami discovers that his high school ex, Kei, is working there. It was their first time seeing each other in five years…
2a8736f7-0d3b-4e8d-8b1e-0d16f073ce0e: In this country, every person has to be matched up with a partner. Partnerships are made around when you turn three or four. The doctors decide who gets paired together. One person acts as the 'supplier.' The other as the 'receiver.' It is impossible for a 'receiver' to continue to live without periodically being given power from the 'supplier.' And in the same way, it is imperative for a 'supplier' that a 'receiver' accept some of the power generated within their body. This 'power' can't be made anywhere other than inside a 'supplier's own body… So for the 'receivers,' we 'suppliers' are completely indispensable…
6ee72587-38fb-48c9-a498-d22c19428014: The nerd and lover of dams, Tora, and the novice, Amane, are fellow research partners at the university. Both had planned on going to Amane’s family summer home for a break, but for some reason, Tora made Amane angry and ended up hanging out with Amane’s friends instead. There, Amane turned out completely different, acting like a diva queen. Furthermore, in the group, there is a poor, heartbroken ex-boyfriend of Amane’s. Is the weekend for these five men going to be troubling…?! Enjoy the troublesome days of love for Tora and Amane.
f84bf15f-66bf-475d-ae12-bdfe0c0b77fc:
This whole incident began with a phone call from Ikushima's younger siblings while at the bus stop, where Ikushima had the most unfortunate luck of meeting a happy-go-lucky boy, Ariie. Ikushima may look pretty, but his seemly bad and cold attitude earned him the nickname "the queen". Even though he doesn't think that he is wrong (actually what he says seems right, justified even) but his good intentions are always taken the wrong way. He blames this on his extremely serious look.  
  
Stumbling upon the queen's soft side, Ariie uses this information to his advantage and starts following poor Ikushima. Will love blossom from this seemingly weird pair…?
b7ee6afa-9041-46b7-b02e-c01fb1e0701b: Beautiful college student Yonomori is secretly enamored by his underclassman, Hinohara. Yonomori is a really cocky junior, but sometimes, Hinohara touches him as if he were a precious jewel and fills his days with heart-wrenching hope. On one of those days, he is shocked to learn that Hinohara has a person he likes. Even while being plagued with hesitation, Yonomori goes to Hinohara to inquire about the identity of that person. But in exchange for an answer, Yonomori is to become…?
0cceed5a-35fa-47bb-98e3-929d257db457:
Pairing: Oikawa x Kageyama

An Oikage book (in which Miya-san is very involved, though not romantically)
e15ae9a4-73e5-463c-a22f-b79ebdd648ff:
1: Every Sweet Night   
Garyou's childhood friend Kou is a famous model who never has time for him anymore. So Garyou hooks up with random guys to try to ignore his feelings for Kou. But the latest one may be more than he can handle.  
  
2: The Return Road  
After his parents moved overseas to further their careers, he had to live with his uncle. Their relationship has always been contentious, so will things turn out well?  
  
3: I Want To Drive You Crazy  
Tsutsumi has an angel's face and a devil's mind. The high-schooler is always thinking up new ways to tease his pet: the school's doctor!  
  
4: His Training Failure  
A middle aged video store owner is enthralled by his younger lover Tetsu. But is Tetsu as serious about him?  
  
5: Love At First Sight  
An unpopular model is finding it hard to get gigs and has finally decided to model for an SM painter because of the double rate the job provides.   
  
6: Sweet Youth  
A gay high school student is at the end of his wits; he can't come out, he doesn't know how to find a partner, much less experience love and sex.   
  
7: Beautiful Life  
His cute cousin has just lost his parents. Looking at his crying face, he can't help but want to comfort him.  
  
8-9: The Reason To Torment  
He can't quite put what he is feeling for his classmate into shape: does he hate him or is it more that just that? Why does he want to bully him so?
ec7fa8d1-81c2-475b-bdae-d2aa85105bff: Kawashima is a third year high school student who's always had a shitty life. He has a violent personality so people constantly misjudge him and his actions. One day he meets Sayama, a first year who's good at everything but has zero ambitions in life. Thanks to his easy-going personality, he becomes the only person who's ever tried to understand Kawashima. These two will have a huge impact on each other's lives.
f29d6baf-db7e-475b-802a-f5ac6726bbef:
1-3) Saikkyou Lover - Strongest Worst Lover: Saji's roommate and coworker Ryousuke is really his type. But Ryousuke doesn't seem to be interested in him…  
  
4) Saikkyou Lover 3.5 - Never a Dull Night  
  
5) Hot Spot - The Inn Where Love Begins- Five years ago Hinata's parents died and his friend Yumiji Munehisa, nine years his senior, helped him out financially. About a year ago they started having sex, but what does Munehisa really feel for Hinata?  
  
6) The Beginning of Love (Koi no Hajimaru): Suyama has always protected his friend Tomoi from perverts, but Kouki may be the biggest pervert of them all, and his condition for staying away from Tomoi is …Suyama!
c619fde7-c5db-40f6-ac1f-e68c6d81f68f:
1) Saikkyou Fortune - Highest Fortune  
Gilbert is the illegitimate son of a wealthy man. When his father dies he is brought to the family castle where he must contend with his cold half-siblings, a family treasure and the kind but straitlaced butler named Gandolf.  
  
2) Umi ni Hana Furu Youni - Falling Sea Flowers  
When Will is out searching for the pirates that killed his brother he's kidnapped by other pirates. The captain, Eve, offers to help him take revenge, but what does he really intend?  
  
3) Sadistic Risk  
  
4) Sadistic Risk 2  
  
5) Sadistic Risk Extra - Cat & Dog
d4c47865-39d2-4db8-b882-f02269989142:
1-3) Sweet Warmth  
After a difficult time of being dumped by his lover and getting hurt by falling down the stairs, Shinshu meets Fushimi at work, where he is assigned to help him due to his injury. Fushimi is tender and thoughtful towards him, which is a different experience for Shinshu.  
  
4) Kiss at Midnight  
When childish and spoiled Harumi gets rejected by his housemate whom he loves, he moves in with Hisaya who has always been there to pick up the pieces for him.  
  
5) If Love is Secondary  
Natsuhiko gets drunk one night and is taken home by Jin. Natsuhiko seduces Jin, only to realize later that Jin is his college crush who turned him down! Jin was such a playboy back then, has he changed at all?  
  
6) The Love that Follows You  
Takashi is ready to propose to his girlfriend, but she never shows up for their date. At her apartment he finds a note and her younger brother Yukinari. With his girlfriend gone, Takashi starts spending time with the lonely Yukinari, but is he only a father figure to the younger man?
2ecd6f04-4b48-4c1f-8c4e-9807be2aa616:
1) Amai Kimi ga Suki  
Kawakami is a top student with a penchant for donuts. Kaji is a troublemaker who fell deeply in love with Kawakami. Although they ignore each other at school, when they're all alone… they eat, kiss and… play. “You're so annoying!” is Kawakami's favorite line, but there's much more than meets the eye. A cute story of an unusual first love!  
  
2) Rising from the Ashes, Kaji-kun  
Amai Kimi ga Suki extra  
  
3) Dangan Baby  
Once again Noda has been rejected by his one-sided crush. As he tries to drink his heartbreak away, he gets picked on. Unexpectedly, a stranger comes to his rescue. The next morning, he wakes up naked in an unknown bed and catches a glimpse into his savior's half-open suitcase: There he spots - a gun…? Just who is this mysterious stranger?  
  
4) Let's go wild, Baby  
Dangan Baby extra  
  
5) The Kitten and the Prince / The Cat and the King  
Oosado works as a researcher on pheromones and keeps Goro, a giant pet cat, at his laboratory. Most people keep away from him because of his cat. Only the medical student Tojo gets along with Goro splendidly. Why is it that Oosado always feels irritated by the animal-attracting lad?  
  
6) Telephone!  
Maki is very shy when it comes to answering phone calls. To cure his phone phobia, his superior Sasamoto decides to call his house phone every day. Soon Maki's anxiety fades - and he begins to anticipate the calls…?  
  
7) Beautiful Thing / Beloved  
Sugita is staying in the hospital because of his broken leg. A regular Japanese hospital if it weren't for his attending physician, Dr Yamada. The bright blonde beauty of a doctor seems to stick out like a sore thumb in Sugita's perception. That is until he witnesses an exchange between Dr Yamada and one of his collegues…  
  
8) Your Favorite Song  
Atsurou has inherited the piano-tuning skills from his renowned grandfather and so far, business has been going well. That is until he receives a much anticioated request from the Benriya house to fix their antique piano. No matter what he does, the piano's young owner cannot be satisfied with his piano-tuning. Just what is wrong with this piano and its owner…?  
  
9) After  
Your Favorite Song extra  
  
Note: The scanlator combined chapters 2 & 3 into one chapter, and did the same with chapters 4 & 5. He then renumbered the remaining chapters.
83543ee2-e5d9-4761-90c7-1ff91fb0dcd6:
1. Ai, Daro. 1  
Yukihiro and Takase are salary-men working together in the same company and whom share a physical relationship. However, Takase's easy-going nature and loose relationships with women makes things complicated for Yukihiro.   
  
2. Ai, Daro. 2  
Yukihiro is moved to a new section of the company - located 3 hours away from Takase. Can their newly formed relationship stand against this sudden separation?  
  
3-4. My Eyes & Your Eyes  
Kamihara has never felt feelings of 'like' or 'love' towards another before but doesn't like it when Nakahashi points it out. Nakahashi is also of a similar state of mind, so when he suddenly confesses Kamihara finds it hard to reply.  
  
5. Only Angel Knows  
Chiaki has always had a weakness for abandoned creatures, so when he see's a man getting beaten by a gang he intervenes and ends up taking the man home to treat his injuries.
c678ef85-95d1-4de0-b4f7-d8c1ab844cf0:
“I want to satisfy my heart and body…!”  
  
What does it mean to become a pair of lovers? Confessing love, having sex, does that alone make you lovers? When did the feeling of falling in love become a greedy luxury?
4a852022-2c99-4471-bfac-f32e03985e19:
Iriya Tetsuo was the nice, quiet kid that everybody knows. Until well-meant prodding on the part of Hanada Satoshi made him choose the 'easy' way out. He purposely failed the entrance exam to a good school, and picked fights so that he wouldn't have to be around Hanada anymore.  
  
The last thing he expected or wanted was for strong-willed Kizu Ryouji to show any interest in him. The sparks fly between the two, while Iriya's best friend Kasuga Ryouta watches jealously…
0bd019db-8259-4274-989f-9a8f70fa631e:
1-2: Kimide Oboreta Ato wa  
A quiet student attends drinking parties to see the flirty student he has a crush on. But after drinking too much, he ends up back at flirty student's place and wanders into the shower with him…  
  
3: The Other Side Of The Glass  
Iori is the adopted son of a powerful family. He is sexually harassed by his adopted brother Yoshiyuki and must present a cold face to the world. Will Ariga be able to see past it?   
  
4: After School In The Atrium  
Star student Hayase invites poor Koharu to his house so he can sketch him. In the nude. Probably totally innocent.  
  
5: Maid-kun no Gohoushi na Hibi  
A young butler is trying to serve his junior master to the best of his abilities, but the young master only wants to sexually harass him!  
  
6: Pet Grooming  
Cat-boys are roommates at a boarding school.
5ea87b7a-accc-4cc2-beb0-f6f5a70d8a0a: Cool guy Yagi and obedient Otani don't really seem to get along, at least on the surface. Otani is an aspiring photographer, who would love nothing more than to capture the image of the one he loves, the likes of which won't allow it. Then, kouhai Karai takes his chance to get closer to Otani…
5a3a3a13-06dd-474f-a1ae-6b2dd88c9b65:
Timid Yasumori is always wearing half a smile with fear in his eyes as he gets bullied.  
  
Takemi who has had Yasumori on his mind, rescues him, and in the heat of the moment, he confesses his feelings to Yasumori. In reply, Yasumori gives an unexpected answer: "That means you'll submit to me, right?"  
  
While love takes on many different forms, these feelings can't be replaced— A love story packed with the inconsistent meanings of "love" uniting as one.
472a93c1-209b-4978-bc7c-300bcaa23af4:
1) Don't Show Such a Sweet Face  
The morning after a drinking party, Okishima Naoki awakes in a strange bed, in a strange apartment, with a strange woman and a senior co-worker! In addition to that, he can't remember anything that happened…
af1a94c9-7a96-47b4-9639-f41bc216b33c:
Collection of short stories about a young uke with a dominant older seme. Contains violence and extremely graphic non-consensual and consensual sex.  
  
-Ayato  
-Shino   
-Haru no Mae (Before Spring)  
-Mitsugekki (Honeymoon Season)  
-Sakura Iro no Ato (Cherry Blossom Colored Scar)   
-Sakana no Me (Eyes of a Fish)  
-Fusou (Frivolous)  
-Natsu no Fuukei (Summer Scenery)
1ca12c64-c2aa-40b2-9635-811c64863d83:
From Aarinfantasy:  
"When you want me to do work, please choose a sunny day". "Pray. The only thing you can do is to pray". Yakumo is a killer who hates fish and is afraid of water. He was bought from a Karachi Boss by the Isseikaiakeno Group. He only follows the leader's right hand man, Yoshitaka, and pesters him for a "reward" after every job. Both are drowning deeply in this mysterious relationship between a man and a boy-a hard-drawn gem of Roman picaresque.  
  
Features characters from Loyal Dog and Kitanai Yatsu.
717970bd-c3dd-4b4d-aae9-c3434ca02a01:
Pairing: Kageyama x Hinata

What’s the next step after a secure, loving relationship? Kageyama and Hinata are both dancing around the question, but how will they take their first steps of the rest of their lives together?
d7c8a022-3e83-4681-9823-eacb54007e2e:
Collection of short stories:  
  
1) Anohito to Nitenai Kuchibiru  
Kaji was in love with his sempai for years but his sempai got married and had a child. Kaji takes care of the kid and watches him growing up…  
  
2) Kuchibiru Kara Biyaku  
Sequel to Anohito to Nitenai Kuchibiru  
  
3) Blood  
When their father dies, the rival half brothers must sort through their feelings of anger, regret, pain and desire that their lives have been steeped in thus far…  
  
4) Kagari Oni  
An exorcist solves a mystery involving demons. Not really a romance, just a historical fantasy story.   
  
5) Datenshitachi no Yoru  
S&M relationship between step siblings is taken to extremes.  
  
6) Double Snake  
A former gangster has turned into a regular office worker, but he still sleeps with his gangster lover. But one of the newbies doesn't like the fact that his favorite 'boss' is having a relationship with an office worker.
3a51e8d1-d06d-4e67-8d88-7959c68acf39: A friendly meeting at the hospital results in a surprising sum of inheritance. How will Sei accept this generous offer?
d175ef58-bbcd-4476-880c-220c83c60078: Okada is once again dumped by his girlfriend. He runs into Kitazawa, an old friend, and the two end up talking about their days at school… before landing in bed together.
5dcb9dc5-8b54-47ef-b9af-6271128d5e2a:
In the Keisei High School infirmary, the school's doctor is regularly visited by Atsuki, the frail and handsome school prince.   
  
They grow closer over tea and biscuits, but could Atsuki's feelings be real or are they merely being used to escape the loneliness caused by the death of his parents?  
  
Can love bloom successfully between a teacher and their student?
0bf2c8b3-a1fc-4077-a8f6-3fec70991adf: Shingo works as a medical rep. for a pharmaceutical company. He's introduced by his customer to anesthesiologist Reiji, who works for a large hospital. When they first meet, Reiji has an ice-cold attitude and tells Shingo to get lost. He's a tough customer who's not willing to open up at all. Shingo's efforts pay off, though, as he gets invited to go with Reiji to a conference in the countryside! That night, Shingo finds a chance to get closer to Reiji. One hotel room, one bed, a crumpled robe and an intense expression. "He's totally making a move here…… right?" Not only is he with a man, but it's that cold, straight-laced anesthesiologist… "Should we have sex? Just what the heck's the right answer!!!!?" A hot medical rep. and a handsome anesthesiologist, embroiled in an adult affair!
80c9d369-595d-4faa-9d2b-eab2146d367a: Takashina, who usually finds it unpleasant to maintain close relationships with others because of his extreme sensitivity to smell, accidentally encounters the perfect scent while helping out one of his senpai at the college lab one night. From that day on, his desire to keep experiencing that smell grows ever stronger, and then…
722c4fd2-3824-4301-b945-dba1a42b19fc:
"Oh God… I want to be happily in love…!"  
Shiba-chan, who was dumped by someone he really liked, is invited to a matchmaking party by a friend. There he sees a boy he likes! But this Yushima-kun is not just a bit weird, he's also a jerk!?  
Shiba-chan feels as if this will be a love that will leave him empty-handed again, but…  
A cute love story. Includes chat from after the publication as a gag manga.  
  
  
Note: In 'Nikutai Kankei', the third story 'Anti-Dramatic', is a sequel to this story.
dea656c4-fd62-43c7-85ad-d072583bca5c:
Pairing: Iwaizumi x Oikawa

Sequel to "The Third Battle Deployment" published in volume 1 of Kizuato BtoE
7472c1f5-998d-4ed7-a1c6-7ef863075efe:
1-3) Oh My Bitch!  
When Wada's friend, Tsukasa, comes begging for a favor Wada is leery, seeing as he's not receiving anything out of the deal. Yet Tsukasa promises that he'd be properly compensated for his troubles. Wada has no idea how Tsukasa plans to compensate him, that is until a strange guy happens upon his doorstep and offers to do anything he asks.  
  
4) Father  
On that hill, where there is acceptance, Father is always happy and smiling, this is where Inaho, a faithful church goer, finds Father. Begging to hear Father's stories, he can't help but admit he finds Father very "pretty", all the same Father thanks Inaho for being "beautiful". Neither of them realize, the other is hiding a much darker secret than any of them could ever fathom.  
  
5) Welcome Back, Darling  
Noticing Shiro's lack of shame, Shiro's roommate begins to wonder if they're just "fuck buddies" or if there is more. Upon seeing his neighbors act lovey-dovey he begins to yearn for the same thing with his precious roommate Shiro.  
  
6) This is Bad  
When Akasawa unexpectedly meets an old classmate Aoki, he realizes that Aoki lives close to his job! So upon that realization he invites himself over, in hopes of "cultivating their friendship" yet Aoki admits not even knowing they were in the same class. That doesn't matter to Akasawa, who decides on his own that he'll visit Aoki everyday on his break to cool off and maybe get to know the strange Aoki better.  
  
7) Goodbye Lovers  
Despite the old and weak fence on the roof of the school, Toyama can't help but be attracted to it. His thoughts turn dark when his friend Hayano comes to meet him on the roof, wondering if it'd be okay to simply jump off. Hayano scolds him for being so dark, and tells him to talk to him before being rash, but that's not all. It's their last goodbye, how should they remember one another?
d88b07d7-244e-4355-8918-5dcccba24052:
1) Wait x Time  
  
2) Baby Baby Baby  
  
3) Romantic Baby   
  
4) 1½ Darling  
Young master Tiger is as vicious as his name suggests. Born as the only son of a very rich family, Tiger has developed into a selfish, violent young man. Can anything be done about such a troublesome boy? Tiger's new butlers seem to believe so.  
  
5) Sweet Sweet Dear  
  
6) Doushiyou  
  
7) Kono Kimochi wo Nanto Yobou  
  
Extra) Otomari x Time
2a3735d6-1406-4d62-90d8-0eb23f4912a0: This manga takes place a few years after the two lead males have graduated from high school. One of them came out in high school, and the other was a scary senpai who kind of took care of him. But several years later, they meet at the same office, where the kouhai has yet to come out of the closet...
76073e26-1b34-42cd-8161-2fdba3f7138a: Kazunobu Kaizuka, an editor at a publisher, was suddenly asked by his twin younger brother to help turn down a guy from an one-night stand. But when Kazunobu went to meet the guy, it turned out to be Yukihara, the author that Kazunobu is in charge of and his long time love!
5b495416-4e54-402c-8169-84f70d36ee85: The White Jewel Pin, a precious treasure, is only worth something when both halves are present. When the White Jewel Pin breaks in half, two men from different organizations become the carriers of each half. Both are determined to get the other piece. One, for freedom; the other for the master who saved him.

Compilation of short stories:

3) Ugokenai Yoru (Night without Motion)  
Kouichi suffers from a childhood trauma which puts up barriers in his relationship with Akira, who, as you would suspect, eventually overcomes the obstacles in the way of their physical relationship.

A guy comes back from the dead to be with his lover.

Whose feelings are simmering...?

When Masaki goes to college, he ends up staying with his cousin Haruomi, whom he admires and has a crush on. However, when he meets him again for the first time in several years, he has completely changed from the older brother he admired to a sloppy old man. He is shocked by his appearance, but he remains kind to Masaki, and his feelings for him grow stronger once again. However, no matter how hard Masaki tries to tell him how he feels, Haruomi stubbornly refuses.

"I love you."

Masaki is frustrated that he can't even accept his words, but he can sense that Haruomi is indecisive...
49e4767d-b307-4a27-a140-dc905016f433:
1) Romantic Beauty  
Since she's moving to a different town due to her dad's job, Yuka decides to confess to the popular Takigawa-kun during the Junior High graduation—only to be rejected and called a "fatso" in front of everyone! A humiliated Yuka becomes determined to turn herself into someone Takigawa will notice so she can realize her dream of having her first time with him. However, when a completely transformed Yuka goes back to her old home town for a school reunion, the person who calls out to her is…?!  
  
2) The Queen and Her Slave  
After drinking the night before, Ai wakes up naked with a stranger in her bed and no memory of how they got that way! She learns that not only has she lost her virginity but it's… to a sixteen-year-old high school boy?! When the young, but handsome Madoka offers to be her slave, Ai accepts and becomes his "queen"—much to the envy of her friends. But is there more than just a master-servant relationship here…?  
  
3) Pure Love, Forbidden Love  
Kazuko treasures her fond memories of her cousin and first love, Ryo. When she transfers to his school after being apart from him for 10 years, she races to reunite with the prince from her childhood—only to find him with one of his many "sex friends" in the student council room! It seems the boy Kazuko remembers as being so gentle and caring has changed! Or has he…?  
  
4) The Days When I Yearn For Love  
Mochida likes Aoyama but has a hard time speaking to him normally. Because her class recently changed seats, she now sits next to Aoyama. Will she be able to open up to him before they change seats again?  
  
5) The Warmth of Your Fingertips  
While on the train, Yuna's classmate Yuasa protected her from a pervert. Yuna felt really happy but lost her chance to thank him. Although he is a quiet guy and may look angry, he continues to protect her each time on the train. Is there something more to his actions?
