192db6bc-17ee-4bf6-bf17-6dd614c01f4d:
The portrait of a girl in 60s -70s in Japan.

Maria depicts the chaotic trajectory of a wealthy girl, whose family made a fortune in the after war. New arrival in a school of girls, Maria is independent and indomitable. She sleeps indifferently with girls or boys, and causes confusion among students as well as teachers, attracting fights and disasters.


With Maria, the story of a teenager in 70's Japan, master Kazuo Kamimura tackles the taboos of his time. The excellence of its staging, the elegance of its line, serve wonderfully a striking, uncompromising writing. As with "Dosei Jidai", and in the image of the new wave, Kazuo Kamimura upsets the Japanese society and blows a new wind on the manga. Perhaps the most sultry of Kamimura titles.
137fd35d-f19b-4b57-ab5a-f428bbcc3253: Mao's father returns home after disappearing for three years with a terrible secret...he has found the ancient Buddhist relic, the Arm of Kannon...but this cherished artifact contains a curse that oculd spell the end of humanity as we know it.
cc0fb464-6c71-42f6-8e4a-422041f4af46: Ayane is in love with Tomoya, Her Onii-chan. But, their childhood friend, Sayaka is trying to split them up. Ayane is not going to let that happen, No one can take Onii-chan away from her. Her plan? She wants Onii-chan only for herself, and she is willing to do everything to make that happen. She wants to have a family with Onii-chan, only the two of them. No one else matters in her little world, and she is going to take care of everyone who tries to interfere.
8f57b207-5a82-4665-8470-e4989d504a1d: She has the looks of a model that stands out from the crowd, and on top of that, she has a great personality, too. Daily life with such a sister must seem quite strange to other people.......?
ef78abcc-1156-41d0-a2d9-c8c3f94520db:
My sister's daughter has grown up into a little devil -
After being cheated on by her ex-girlfriend, and was kicked out, Saya moves in with her older sister and her husband.
However, Saya is seduced by her sister's daughter, Rui, and kissing becomes a daily routine.
1a91719c-1009-482a-9915-389a366505e7: Yanagi, a second-year high school student, has a faint crush on Mizuki, the younger sister of her childhood friend Momo. One day, while rummaging through Mizuki's personal belongings in her room, Yanagi discovers the truth about Mizuki...?
74aca1a9-4210-47bf-9505-3f96e6e3b863: Morisawa Kai and Sato Tatsuki are best friends. However, unlike Kai, Tatsuki is completely unreliable, lazy, and ill-tempered. One day Tatsuki takes Kai out driving in his new motocycle only to get into a bad accident that leaves Kai dead. However, Kai's spirit ends up in a body of a girl named Fujii Marika. After seeing how cold and unaffected Tatsuki as well as everyone else was after his death, Kai transfers to his previous school in which he starts noticing flaws to Tatsuki's cool mask…
8a38a197-949e-4f83-90cd-5ee6b9ed36d3: One day, Mai remembers that her perfect stepbrother is a character in a death game manga, and that one year later he will hold a death game involving all of his classmates, killing his sister in the process. Mai plans a variety of surprises for her stepbrother every day based on what he said in the manga, "Nothing unexpected happened, so I was bored," but as the days go by, he begins to show abnormal signs... Only I know what my brother's really like. Pepu's comicalization of Inada Sou's popular web novel!
d3b7fa20-9719-466c-9ce8-52aa8cc9b776:
18 year-old Yoshino is in love with his sister, Himeko, who has brother complex towards him. Yoshino and Himeko's father remarriage introduced new members to the family. Tsubaki, who is of the same age as Himeko, is as beautiful as a bisque doll. This new step-brother plans to expose Yoshino's secret feelings for Himeko. Yoshino thought that the underlying reason of Tsubaki doing this is because he likes Himeko too. However, never did he expect that Tsubaki was doing this for. . .   
  
Special/Extra: Hana had always wanted to have a boyfriend and she finally had her first one. Rei was disturbed when he found out that his beloved sister accepted a guy. He was determined not to allow any guy to have Hana. Rei let his feelings show and confessed to Hana. Hana was disgusted by the twisted feelings Rei had for her. Rei decided to leave when rejected. Hana did not want Rei to leave her, what should she do?  
  
Tsubaki's story: An extra about Tsubaki.
bdb0f1f7-27f7-46d1-8b72-a637bfcc8f2d: Ai just loves her big brother, Yuzuru! He's so kind, so reliable and so cool! He always protects Ai from trouble and when she cries, he cheers her up! He's the perfect big brother. But, bad things happen soon. Her parents divorce and she and her brother are separated! Now, after 9 years, one day, Ai, now 14 years old, finds a tall boy in front of her school! Who is this boy-?
14f6bd96-e062-40d6-8fd2-fc6925e54624:
It's the beginning of a new era in the Egypt of pharaohs, the marriage of the young Hatshepsut to her half-brother Seti ensures his rise to Pharaoh, under the name of Thutmose II.

Ambassadors of the gods on Earth, they shine to their people and seem at first glance like the perfect couple. However, under her mask of a perfect wife, Hatshepsut hides a deep rage… She doesn't want to accept the restrictions others try to place on her as a woman, she wants to become the Pharaoh, like her father!  
 
---

*Loosely based on the actual [historical figure](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hatshepsut).*
1bbf82a0-8b98-43b6-ad81-95f328838823:
**From Aerandria Scans:**  
In this grim and realistic take on classic fairy tales, Prince Ludwig, a female corpse collector, is ordered by his father to find himself a wife more suitable than the women he often brings into the castle. Along with his servant Wilhelm, they travel across the land in search of fair maidens from classic stories in hopes of finding Ludwig a wife.
6f28beeb-47c8-48a4-9d35-e71c2837d68f: Two sisters, with ten years separating them. Once close, they grew distant with time. As the younger sister enters high school, their relationship once again begins to change. This time in an unusual direction.
e91e6240-fb50-4421-9140-5a3ace5aec2a:
When they were children, Shirabe Yamada encouraged her brother Minoru to become a mangaka, but years later, and now that she's a high-school-age streamer, she can barely stand him. Now a university student and amateur mangaka, Minoru does his best to keep his craft a secret from her, but on the day his manga is cancelled by the publisher, Shirabe accidentally discovers his studio at his room and that he's the mangaka 'Aoi Ringo'.

Shirabe then confesses to him: she's Aoi-sensei's diehard fan!
4f9eab7d-a2b2-4ee5-9d59-6744f0df4e12: Natsuo Fujii is in love with his teacher, Hina. Attempting to forget his feelings towards her, Natsuo goes to a mixer with his classmates where he meets an odd girl named Rui Tachibana. In a strange turn of events, Rui asks Natsuo to sneak out with her and do her a favor. To his surprise, their destination is Rui's house—and her request is for him to have sex with her. There's no love behind the act; she just wants to learn from the experience. Thinking that it might help him forget about Hina, Natsuo hesitantly agrees. After this unusual encounter Natsuo now faces a new problem. With his father remarrying, he ends up with a new pair of stepsisters; unfortunately, he knows these two girls all too well. He soon finds out his new siblings are none other than Hina and Rui! Now living with both the teacher he loves and the girl with whom he had his "first time," Natsuo finds himself in an unexpected love triangle as he climbs ever closer towards adulthood.
bf55dd16-ba26-49de-adb3-cbf7d2bc6775: Keita has two step-sisters (without blood-relation) who love him in a lustful way and have no problems expressing it, they even like to compete over it; much to the laughs of his friends (which he usually endures without problems). One day they come to his school to give him his lunch, he gets annoyed due to the atmosphere and explodes on them, to counter attack his anger they confess their tender feelings for him in front of everyone and leave. Feeling sorry he chases after them and says that he'll study hard in order to get in the same highschool as them.

Just as he enters college and makes a promise to himself to overcome the trauma of his past, his father remarries and asks him to move out of the house. His father arranges him to live with his aunt (Minamoto-kun's father's younger sister) for the time being. She is an extremely beautiful woman who is also a non-tenured professor at his college. 8b09478b-eace-435d-96c1-0218e165a125: When Momoka's mother and Touri's father married the two kids became sister and brother overnight, but as they grew up together this relationship began to change…
05f282b4-5010-48ff-8729-90059e90de57:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited... and ended up breaking up on graduation. And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.

"Isn't it obvious that I'm the elder brother." "Isn't it obvious that I'm the elder sister."

The children of the partner of their parent's remarriage was their ex-lover!? The former couple, mindful of their parent's feelings, decided on a 'sibling rule' where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but— When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together... along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?
___

cddbbb5f-60f4-42aa-b3f2-62c6815a00e7:
Haruto, currently financially unstable, not in education, or in employment, is begging for rent money from a woman. When his negotiation plans go awry, the person who suddenly appears is none other than Haruto's brother, Asahi...!

He had always acted as the "perfect brother" in front of his family, so Haruto is unable to confide to anyone in his family about his current ruined state, and desperately tries to cover up the situation.

However, Asahi forces Haruto to bring him to his place, and he discovers Haruto's current state...?!

【An obsessed-type cool little brother x Former perfect older brother】
The love between brothers who frustratingly misunderstand each other unfolds! 

What is the truth behind the "complexes" that each of them harbors...?

A story about a little sister who loves her big brother.
Even when she knows her true feelings for him are wrong, she just can't help herself.
She's looking forward again today for her big brother to come home.
472a9e3a-c6c0-4e97-95f0-df76f6d31f09: A semi-autobiographical account of the author as she experiences abuse, sexual and otherwise, at the hands of her family who are also deeply religious. Aiko wished for someone to kill her and the world she lives in. With the Great Hanshin Earthquake, the Aleph doomsday cult, and the Kobe child murders, it seemed like the ends of time was approaching. Unable to dream of "somewhere away from here", all she can do is face her violent life head-on.
ed183646-2d06-43fe-be03-63dba38212d6:
Kei has been a vegetarian and tended to have an unbalanced diet since childhood. He and his much older brother Sai, who has a brother complex but who’s become reliable, get along well together.
For some reason, ever since he was a child, Kei has wanted to taste blood. Even though he knows it’s wrong, he can’t help thinking about it, so his university classmate, who cuts herself, agrees to share her blood with him. As soon as Kei discovers the taste of blood, he realizes he’s always wanted to eat Sai…

Can Kei become aware of his affection for Sai without confronting his desire to eat him?
Extra included for this story of twisted love!
dfbfb93d-3cb1-41d6-b1fa-c7d866cd524d:
Yumeichi is sick and tired of reality. When he wakes up, he finds his overprotective, perverted(?) and stalker brother. Yumeichi, who feels bad after being told some nonsense, tries to escape reality once again by going to sleep, but...

Perhaps there are many things that Yumeichi himself does not know.
116a12cd-4410-4266-af9c-8b0e188baaf5: The daily life of slightly lewd and cute maids.
b5a2ca5e-77df-4c53-98d4-e6e78ed97bcf: It's about a boy named Nishizawa Kazuya who is in 2nd year of middle school. e3c6b051-340a-45fb-9801-057e70253946: Tachibana Souta is a bit of a multi-talented freeter who gets by from one part-time job to the next, his standout characteristic being that he's a bit short. 51622484-5e44-4b24-868c-c640ad018080:

a50ab40e-a67a-406f-9cea-4155a41359c7: A story about my dog-like little sister who awaits my return every night.

What is he going to do now?
bbc68c92-773a-42f3-b2e7-d3ae29cd3b96: Saku had a normal life, living with his cousin Kuran and being tormented daily by his childhood friend, Karin. Convinced she will disappear from existence unless Saku and Karin get married, she makes life a lot more complicated for everyone. Things only get crazier when Hiiro, a girl claiming to be Kuran's and Saku's daughter from a different timeline in the future, appears with the goal of getting Saku together with his cousin Kuran. Saku is suddenly faced with a dilemma: whom does he choose as his wife, and which daughter does he save from disappearing into nothing?

Collection of the mangaka's BL works from 1994 to 1996. 3 chapters scanlated.

Decadence, bizarreness, immorality... The more dangerous something seems, the more people are attracted to it... because there is a devilish beauty and pleasure hidden there that cannot be resisted... Handle with care! This is a very dangerous book.

1 • Kept Youth
A boy, infatuated with his school's doctor, follows him home one day... and finds out that the doctor has been keeping a "pet" in his bed. Who is the boy being kept? But more importantly, why does he look so much like the protagonist?

2 • D-Saka Detective Agency: D-Saka ch.1

3 • Love Bazooka: D-Saka ch.2

4 • Precocious Liaison

5 • Boxed Youth

6 • Dedicated Body
Dr. Shibusawa decides that his young son Keiri should get an early start in the medical field if he's going to inherit his clinic, so he introduces Keiri to the fascinating world of dissection, despite his wife's disapproval. Keiri gains a taste for dissection, Shibusawa suffers his strained marriage, and his wife discovers what's really up with her husband and his constantly snickering assistant in this odd little story.

7 • Handsome Youth In Ice

8 • Dark Honey, Youth
A boy discovers that a biology teacher with some strange habits has been watching him.
72b28da7-eb5d-4dee-a5ca-2f18197deb02: The Ralk Kingdom is a country of extreme meritocracy, but Razel, the son of the stupid king, has no talent for martial arts, and because he is always compared to his older sister who is a sword saint and his younger sister who is a sage, he gets banished from the kingdom. From then on, he tries to live as an adventurer in a different country, but his older and younger sisters, who love him dearly, come after him!?
99ad0a86-275a-46b0-9af7-7cdbd5e56fc4:
Delve into the tortured past of Earl Cain C. Hargreaves, charismatic heir to a wealthy family full of secrets, lies and unthinkable crimes. Follow the young Cain as he attempts to unravel the secrets of his birth, all the while solving each new mystery that comes his way.  
 
---
 
In the Hakushaku Cain Series:  
  
1. Wasurerareta Juliet
Includes 2 oneshots:
   * The Boys Who Stopped Time   
 England, year 1918. Rupert enrolls to his new school just a few days after the murder of a  maid called Noelle. He's the type that just can't sit still, so when he meets Noelle's sister,  he's determined to help her find out who murdered her sister…
   *  Double   
 When they were children, Ren helped his friend Emilio start his career as an actor. But  when Ren didn't have any news from Emilio for two years, he decided to go to New York  to look for his friend…  
2. Shounen no Fukasuru Oto
3. Kafka  
Includes 1 oneshot: Ellie in Summer Clothes  
4. Akai Hitsuji no Kokuin  
5. God Child  
Deep in the heart of 19th Century London, a young nobleman named Cain walks the shadowy cobblestone streets of the aristocratic society in which he was born. Forced to become an Earl upon the untimely death of his father, Cain assumes the role of head of the Hargreaves, a noble family with a dark past. With Riff, his faithful manservant, and Mary Weather, his 10-year-old adopted sister, Cain investigates the mysterious crimes that seem to follow him wherever he goes.
4b94ca62-7106-46c7-86aa-3296d0e4a813:
The story is set in Japan, 700 years after the age of swords and magic, where science has replaced magic. Social problems caused by magic and magical beasts are on the rise, and the Metropolitan Police Department establishes the Metropolitan Police Department's Magical Beast Control Division to deal with them. Kamishima Jingo, a werewolf (lycanthrope), is investigating a horrific case as a detective in the Magical Beast Control Division.

Meanwhile, the great elven sage Sajuel, who had been asleep for 700 years in preparation for the return of the Demon King, wakes up. However, the Demon King was resurrected and defeated 40 years ago. Sajuel is shocked to learn this, but he lends his wisdom to the Magical Beast Control Division and begins investigating with Kamishima and the others. A fantasy of magic and police unfolds.
3fba42cf-2ad6-4c30-a7ab-46cb8149208a: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
05492863-1265-42fb-b9a0-e97c1b2ef612: Centers around Ginjirou Manda, a loan shark who charges toichi — 10% more interest every 10 days, or 365% every year. Thanks to his unrelenting money-collecting tactics, he is feared as "Minami no Oni" or the "Demon" of Osaka's Minami business district.
ff8fd46c-92db-439f-9d6f-bd62c9fa080d: Lin Nan is a newly hired Chinese teacher at Jie Lao High School. Timid by nature, she came alone to Jie Lao City to prove to her family that she could live well even without their care. But not long after arriving, she became entangled in a murder case! What will Lin Nan do?
5da637ef-b363-4d07-97f3-bed2e1a1788c: Due to an unknown phenomenon, no boys are being born, plunging humanity into an existential crisis. As male trafficking becomes rampant and governments establish shelters to preserve the remaining males, society struggles to adapt.  In this chaotic world, Jessica, a popular actress with a glamorous image, is sponsored by Valentine, the boss of a human trafficking cartel. Her seemingly perfect life takes a dramatic turn when a young man named Jin, claiming to be her long-lost brother, suddenly appears, unraveling secrets and shaking the foundation of her carefully constructed world…
3c8ddbf0-7807-493b-960d-c1e508f12c46:

Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

"There is a girl among you who has become a witch."

On the morning she was supposed to start her first year of high school, Emma woke up inside a dimly lit cage. Imprisoned within a remote island prison mansion for a crime she doesn't remember committing, a confused Emma receives a declaration from a single owl:

"You have been identified as a potential witch — one who brings harm to this world."
"You will spend the rest of your life here as a prisoner."

The everyday life she took for granted completely collapsed. As Emma gets to know the other girls, all fellow witch candidates, during her imprisonment, the owl eventually gathers all the prisoners and declares:

"A witch trial will now commence."

And so began an utterly cruel game — a process of selecting, one by one from the thirteen girls, the witch... that is, the one to be executed.

Die Geschichte spielt in der Welt des Games Elden Ring. Der große Eldenring wurde zerschlagen und die Halbgötter haben die einzelnen Fragmente an sich genommen. Nun herrscht ein schrecklicher Krieg im Zwischenland, bei dem jeder versucht, an die Fragmente der anderen zu gelangen. In dieser Zeit taucht ein unbekannter Befleckter auf, dem die Last aufgetragen wird, die Halbgötter zu unterwerfen und den Titel als Eldenfürst einzufordern... Doch selbst wenn der Befleckte dieser Aufgabe gewachsen wäre, will er den Titel überhaupt?

Eine Geschichte in der Welt von Elden Ring, die nicht nur den harten Fans gefallen wird, sondern für jeden ist, der unbedingt neuen Dark-Fantasy-Lesestoff benötigt, vor allem, wenn er wie hier mit der ein oder anderen Prise Humor bestückt ist.

Glad for this opportunity, Makoto bid farewell to his terrible days in Japan and teamed up with Yuuka, a tsundere high school girl with a witch hat who has her own circumstances. Together, they decided to start a new life. Defeating monsters, completing requests, and realizing a slow life! For that purpose—first, escape the dungeon!!

"Your job is to protect me from monsters, easy, right?"
"What are you expecting from a guy who was almost 40!?"

The odd couple of a former middle-aged man and a high school girl, who get along well despite their bickering, aim to become the strongest for the sake of a slow life.
c61324a7-066d-490d-8979-545d3c3f3099: In an era where Necromancers create their own knights to fight, "War of the Corpses" is the ultimate sport. Amidst a brutal battle where countless people pour their passion and dreams into the fight, who will emerge as the final victor?
7a19cf0c-28b4-4f3e-9b51-1843029601fb:
Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies, but for some strange reason, he's not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
___
**Character Designer:** [Saburou](https://mangadex.org/author/9db8b2d0-08d1-46a7-be91-a0277faf1b70)
4b79b073-7882-439d-8f78-2332802f32bf:
In ten or so years, in a future where resurrecting the dead is an everyday occurrence, the moon will collide with the Earth, bringing with it the end.
Before the apocalypse happens, Nekuro confesses to her best friend Kiri, who, seeing no hope for the future, takes her admirer's confession half-joklingly, until one day, Nekuro dies.
fed930cb-30d2-438e-a136-9a224b7c50aa:
The apocalypse has arrived—devastation spreads, and human civilization teeters on the brink of collapse.
As the director of the last shelter, I bear the heavy responsibility of restoring hope for humanity!"

"CEOs, electricians, programmers—do you think your skills are useless in the apocalypse?
Don’t worry! Come to my underground shelter and assist me.

We need you!
9c8c7778-07da-4f58-a600-d2cd7292a5fe:
"The world of zombies might be pretty great!"

Eko-chan, a victim of bullying, enjoys the devastated world with her first friend, who has become a zombie. They set off on a survival adventure, all while her friend slowly loses her humanity...
8ab2ce67-9d19-4740-995f-af726fa305ed: Purgator of Perdition follows the journey of Lucas Graham — a man trapped between a sinful past and a present full of danger. He wakes up in Mortalis, a brutal and unfamiliar land plagued by bloodthirsty creatures, madness, curses, and shadowy forces lurking at every turn. With no memory of how he got there, Lucas is forced to confront the ghosts of his past while struggling to survive in a world that seems determined to destroy him...
5b0d31e1-2ae7-4510-b714-8bcc3a566256: Chu Xuan traveled through the Cangxuan world and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. The so-called demon cultivation is to plunder the essence of heaven and earth and seize the essence of all things. After slaughtering thousands of people, he became the Great Demon Lord. However, killing is not tolerated by the heavenly way of the human race. Wuji Sect was also destroyed by the righteous sect. When he was helpless, Chu Xuan accidentally got the blood mirror, which could take him to a doomsday planet full of zombies! He suddenly discovered that this place is simply a paradise for demon cultivators!
a15dc49f-2512-46f2-bc1e-201be8234ee5:
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.


(Source: Manga Mogura RE)
f33a4ea9-8afa-464c-9c36-b836d724d6e6:
Minjun wished for the world to end - until it did. 

When a zombie appears at his door, the bullied teen chooses to fight for survival. Teaming up with Yena, his sassy yet charming classmate, he flees the collapsing city. 

Hunted by the infected and haunted by enemies old and new, they discover that in a world without rules, trust may be their only chance at survival.
0d07096c-9451-4212-9c7c-eb80a5b54257: The survival action manga is set in the not-so-distant future, where a new virus that turns humans into zombies has spread around the world. Despite plans of wiping out the zombies with weapons of mass destruction, the zombies still roam the world, spreading fear among humans. Months and years pass, and a zombie hunter named Niki travels around the world with his partner. Niki faces a horde of mutated zombies, psycho zombies, and odd zombie "creatures" as he tries to find a place to live peacefully.
5ec2a5c8-b320-4824-938a-a99919405c27: Shinkai Yosuke is haunted by a past he cannot recall...and a body that is rapidly decomposing. Washed up on the shores of Japan, he is isolated by doctors eager to find out why he has been brought back to life only to suffer again a slow and gruesome death. But Shinkai knows he has little time left. He is desperate to find out who he really was, and why he has become a living corpse.
cad04eb4-8d22-4dd4-9ef3-f347fbf30452:
**Not even a zombie apocalypse can slow down a teenager's libido! One teen discovers he may just have the cure to a mysterious outbreak in this fun and sexy survival manga.**

When a zombie apocalypse suddenly breaks out during the school festival, shogi player Koutarou manages to save the beautiful and buxom Kana just before she's taken by a swarm. But when they reach Kosaka Kotaro was living his best life as a gamer otaku... until the zombie apocalypse hit. Now the streets are crawling with the undead—and his biggest regret? Dying a virgin.

Then he rescues the gorgeous Kana, who’s just been bitten... and doesn't want to turn into a zombie before losing her virginity. Kotaro's happy to help—and after their steamy encounter, something incredible happens: her bite begins to fade.

Could the cure be inside Kotaro? Kana’s not taking any chances. She's sticking close, keeping him busy—and making sure the "treatments" keep coming.

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, vol. 1*
85443c1b-3f4b-4e30-9169-f51521bd4561: A ghost has a story. The story is about his friendship, love, losses and experiences. His name is Andy and he really wants to share this story with you.
1596722b-bd80-431c-9721-96458dde8a4c: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
9ef7698f-9a77-4622-bd7c-a73fcbbc03af:
After the soldiers' mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)
4ad8613b-1987-4d6f-ac0e-3d28a9b2b6f2: The wacky adventures of Fran, Veronica and the other strange creatures continue. More experiments, more medical miracles and more wondrous surprises.
c466ced0-ec48-47c1-a8cf-d5ff1fe9d0d2: The Sage Dwight, along with the Hero, defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!
9cabcd69-94d9-4559-b8f9-4b61f0ace8e2: Follow the Main character "Mero" in his journey for freedom. Being betrayed in the gang he used to work for. He was sold into employment by a man who looks scarily similar to him. Seeing him work his way up the company ladder, meeting friends and foes with his team. Following his adventures of self realization, and connecting with the people closest to him. While taken down the scum of the world. With a paycheck.
f5f22716-ecee-426b-8e3f-51f9162bb14b:
A world overrun by zombies, and 100 chances for Ryu Min-Seok to save his daughter. But just when he's about to fail for the 100th time, he comes back to life?! 

The zombie apocalypse survival story of a father who awakens as a zombie to protect his daughter!
6e44705b-9f80-42f6-9ebb-1141fbe8320e: It's been ten years since Rentt Faina, a down-on-his luck Bronze-class adventurer, set his eyes on becoming Mithril-class. Unfortunately, Rentt finds himself helpless when confronted by a legendary Dragon in the Labyrinth of the Moon's Reflection... and is summarily eaten. But Rentt has miraculously reawakened... as a skeleton?
c4ef611c-90b9-4739-a65d-5a5dddd3c22e: Roberto Hoffman, um oficial da Marinha SEAL, tinha uma família amorosa e uma vida tranquila. No entanto, sua vida sofre uma reviravolta repentina quando zumbis aparecem. Após perder a esposa e o filho, Hoffman fica apenas com a sobrinha, Ara. Os dois embarcam no maior navio de cruzeiro do mundo, o Noah, na esperança de encontrar uma nova terra para a vida. Será que este navio lhes prometerá a esperança que procuram?
afa94d82-4635-410d-b216-7fd76f07259c:
The same author of Blood Lad.  
  
In a zombie apocalypse, he looks for a perfect death in the arms of a beautiful zombie girl…
491253c6-bf39-489b-b8b3-d51178abbeb8:
One year after the end of the zombie outbreak that swept through Korea, 'Doyoung', who lost her younger brother to a zombie, one day accidentally meets 'Jion', a student who closely resembles the zombie that bit her brother.
A friendship full of suspicion between two people that continues in a risky manner. Can this relationship last?
0c9e619e-c784-4403-961f-6117ffb8e5ff:
One day, the completely normal human schoolgirl Yomi Haruka turned into a zombie!!
Her head can't stay on her neck, and humans are looking very tasty to her...So she turns to the art of streaming games!
6cf4f8e5-bc1c-4051-9453-1ee3930f0ac0: After a demonic ritual, 20-year-old Shelley Highgate has mysteriously risen from the grave, and is under fire from a Grim Reaper for cheating death! The two form an unlikely alliance to find the cult that killed Shelley and traverse the gothic world of the Deadlands.
964294ee-ee00-4b45-98c1-b2b7ac444f5e: In a crumbling and dystopian Lousiana, Rilind, a zombie, aims to help those cast out from society using a peculiar power- Magic "strings" which can heal wounds. However, his world begins to change when he makes the unlikely choice to save a vampire in distress. Rilind soon learns he's way in over his head when he learns she has a bounty on hers!
c14c3462-08b6-4ce1-be95-fdfec78bb11b: Ever since they were young, Cha Inwoo had a quiet crush on his next-door neighbor, Kwak Hajun. But Hajun was completely different from Inwoo. He was popular, outgoing, and part of a completely different world. The only connection between them was being neighbors. That was it. With the college entrance exams approaching, Inwoo believed their already distant connection would naturally fade away once they started their separate lives in college. But on exam day, a piercing scream shattered the stillness of the school hallway…
622357dd-d603-4fcd-931f-9f7ac44940eb:
The world that fell due to pollutants that release the zombie virus and the people who adjusted to that place.
A village called 'Amina' that had great resources and was where professor 'Simon' lived.
However, the people of 'Amina' fall into despair after 'Simon' disappears.
And 'Ruby' who was born in 'Amina'.
Incidents that had been buried slowly start to reappear because of her...

1545011f-2288-47a9-845c-526068f4843a:
A demon world maid's cute and spooky fantasy action!  
  
Sumire, a nekomata, who lost her favorite master was wandering around, got lost, and arrived in a foreign country in the demon world?! With the android and undead maids, clean the demon's house brilliantly to take back "that something!"  
  
[Artist's twitter](https://twitter.com/yugata_tanabe)
f7e75188-cf70-456a-a1cc-76c438bbd294:
A mysterious virus breaks out on board the Boat 82-08 out at sea. The people who find out about it first only want to use it as a weapon but quickly lose control over the virus.

Will the trio survive long enough to rejoin their friend Jinu? Or will it be Jinu who doesn’t make it out to meet his friends?
b08ae7dd-947a-4275-be6c-efce64a1f305: Twelve Alien destroyers turned into meteorites and hit the earth, bringing an unknown zombie virus and setting off a doomsday frenzy. The evolution zone has opened, and power user has started to emerge! Wang Zhe, who died in battle ten years later, has reborn and returned back in time. Now he decided to use the advantages of his memory and strength to become the strongest evolutionary!
82cea62c-e413-4f60-91c7-f1d0171c2806: The story unfolds on the island of Burning Hell, located near Dokdo, involving two murderers. Criminals and monsters from Joseon, Edo, Qing, and the British Empire come to this island, each harboring their own desires.
754f8bf2-9926-44f5-82d9-db038fd4e80b: Oikawa Yuu, who has been shut up in his house, is certain to die as a virgin at the age of 21. This is because the whole world has become a place filled with zombies... One day, a survivor visits Yuu's house. The woman, who calls herself Sunny, injects Yuu with a vaccine that may save the world from the zombies... but as a result, Yuu gains the ability to turn zombies back into humans by having sex...?
74a8b3f6-0878-4842-bb77-1c4af22ab03b: Comic Synopsis: Special Forces soldier Jin Quan is betrayed during a mission and becomes a living coordinate for missile guidance. Upon awakening, he finds himself a destitute man unconscious on the streets of Downtown, a place where the underclass gather, their people serving as cannon fodder in the mines. Faced with a life-or-death struggle, Jin Quan awakens as a Demon Swordsman, gifted with the radiation from a dirty bomb explosion in his past life. In this world, Jin Quan will battle the Chosen One.
cc1b8669-82b2-4232-99c1-40d48fc2d988:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked!
___
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.
c32f794f-61ad-46b8-b06c-5959ab2d88d2:
The largest theme park in America has been overrun by a zombie virus. Sung-heon finds himself trapped with his daughter among zombies and foreign tourists with whom he cannot communicate. 

In this unprecedented disaster where any moving living creature, not just humans, is turned into a zombie, Sung-heon struggles with his injured leg to save his daughter. 

They must survive - from the zombies, and from them!
b64488d2-a750-4b54-b9c1-ae352101378f:
Aoyama Keita had a crush on his classmate Haida Monako, but he was too shy to tell her. One day, when Haida suddenly passes away, he is finally able to confess to her through a letter he places at her funeral. Little does Keita know, she returns as a zombie and blackmails him into letting her stay with him with the threat that she will tell everyone about the love letter if he doesn't. Now Keita has to hide Haida from his parents, classmates and the outside world because everyone else thinks she is dead. To make matters worse, as a living dead, she craves flesh from time to time and Haida doesn’t care if it comes from Keita…

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%8A%E3%81%B3%E3%82%93%E3%81%90%E3%81%A7%E3%81%A3%E3%81%A9!)
ba94f5f9-b80e-44cf-8d54-1c6caab065b8: A king adopted eleven children from different species. Including our main character, Jim. Jim is a demon and the son of the demon lord. However, even if his race is different, he still has a heart similar to a human's. One day, the kingdom he's living in was attacked by the generals of the demon lord. With the aim of protecting their peaceful lives, Jim looked forward to facing the threat coming into their lives.
75043a3f-daec-4ced-943c-65805e837c68:
The stage is set with an unrivaled middle-aged man in a world overflowing with zombies...! 

––It's been three years since he was first summoned to another world. Having the unique Class of "Samurai", he defeated the Demon King along with his party of warriors: "Azami", 38 years old. When he finally makes it back to Japan, he comes to know that the world is now filled with zombies...?! Realizing that his skills acquired from the Other World remain, he sets out into the city to seek the truth and search for survivors. From a hardware store to a school, through the city hall and the police station... Using his magical powers for increased physical strength and strengthening his weapons, slashing through a sea of zombies on a motorcycle, what is it that awaits Azami...?!
64113fcd-4f8c-41bc-8fa4-18a83076da2e: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
5a43ec43-471b-446f-9210-964f58aff55b: An alien virus has descended upon the world. In the absence of superpowers, how can ordinary students be able to survive in a post-apocalyptic world?
9957c35e-06e1-4b4b-875e-6a3a01e29582:
"We'll kill all vampires. Sharing our own fallen 『 blood 』 as a weapon...!!"

Arbitration Knights travel around the world to protect peace. Rinslet, a girl who has just become a regular knight, meets Yuri, a vampire girl with cool silver hair and crimson eyes. 
Rinslet learns that she is an abomination who kills her own kind by manipulating the power of 《 blood armor 》, which materializes blood into swords, bows and arrows. She becomes Yuri's kin in exchange for her life, and her goal is...?

A Yuri x Vampire x Dark Fantasy!
ea51cd71-5111-46fb-846e-a77beeeadb86: Class rep Minegishi Hinata is saved from a traffic accident by the new transfer student Nagatsuki Shion, who survives the crash as it is revealed she is half-human and half-zombie. However, the impact from the crash breaks Shion's special apparatus that keeps her heart beating, and if Shion's heart stops for even a moment, she'll become a full zombie! The only way to prevent that from happening is for Hinata to get Shion's heart pounding...
8bd19e5c-94f7-4368-a918-50f463857446: Ein teuflisch guter Butler ist Sebastian Michaelis, der dem Familienoberhaupt der noblen Phantomhives dient. Teuflisch ist hier wörtlich zu nehmen, denn Sebastian ist wirklich ein Dämon, mit dem das Oberhaupt der Phantomhives einen Pakt schloss. Seitdem hat er nicht nur die wichtigste Position in der Dienerschaft inne, sondern ist auch Leibwächter und Auftragskiller in Personalunion! Earl of Phantomhive ist der 12-jährige Ciel, der nicht nur das Familienunternehmen führt, sondern in seiner Funktion als Earl auch ein wichtiger Vertrauter Königin Victorias ist. Denn sie verlässt sich darauf, dass jede Gefahr diskret und schnell durch die Phantomhives beseitigt wird...
e9571041-4804-47f1-a6df-77eca5d0843a: A young woman contemplates life in a world where the dead walk.
0a7a0144-39c3-45c7-b270-2a909b7dfef4: In Kamanari City lies the restricted "K-Zone," a place off-limits to the public. Supernatural phenomena are said to occur within its boundaries. High school trio Chuuta, Kirimai, and Kawanakajima set out to uncover the mysteries of the K-Zone!
a4896718-ecef-4701-8497-5ba07d4e89cc:
Being a character of your favorite game is great! Sure, he’s just a minor NPC, but Corin knows this game like the back of his hand. With his knowledge and the main player Sihu’s abilities, everything’s going smoothly - until Corin discovers Sihu’s been murdering innocent NPCs and stealing their items. 

Horrified but powerless to stop him, Corin awaits the end of the game - only for Sihu to mysteriously fail at the last mission. 

Instantly, Corin travels three years back in time. Now, he’s determined to kill Sihu and take on his role - defeat the final boss and save the world.
2725e983-81c3-4a62-8e97-5027c5996c2b:
Naples, 2001. Giorno Giovanna is a small-time crook with one big dream—to become a "Gang-Star." No ordinary thief, Giorno has a connection to the remarkable Joestar bloodline, and possesses a Stand named Gold Experience. His dream starts to become reality when he meets Bruno Bucciarati, a mobster from the gang Passione and a fellow Stand user himself. Realizing that they share similar ideals, and both disagree with the gang's harmful affairs, Giorno reveals his goal to Bruno: with Bruno's help, he will reform Passione by overthrowing the boss.  
  
As Giorno becomes a member of Passione, and is inducted into Bruno's squad, he discovers that it is no simple gang; its numbers are teeming with Stand users. Now confronted by other squads of differing loyalties and unpredictable caliber, their goal to change the gang from the inside out will be a tough one. Taking on these adversaries, Giorno attempts to rise through the ranks and inch closer to the boss, a man who is shrouded in mystery.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-5-golden-wind/all)
bd459dbf-95a7-4650-a27b-576549e1aa25:
This is the beginning of the Human Farming Plan by zombies.

Humans are almost extinct, and zombie society is on the verge of a food crisis. Wataru, a zombie whose quirk is that he retained his human intelligence and emotions, cooked up a forbidden plan to achieve a breakthrough in the food crisis of his fellow zombies. His grand plan is: to look for surviving human males and females, get them to breed  and begin farming humanity (food)!

However, the first surviving woman he encounters in his search is his ex-girlfriend, who he still has feelings for, even now!?

(Source: Big Comics.jp)

---

[Official Publisher](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=48948)
d5c8ff69-2668-4f8c-9914-3beb31f5e3f7:
Orphans Charlotte and William finally confess their feelings for each other and promised to be together forever. Yet, Charlotte is suddenly killed in a motor accident, leaving William devastated. Death is usually the end of most relationships, but it seems that Will has other plans…  
(source: aoc.moe)
b747d084-ebd0-4e21-b1f4-f3dabb6a458a:
Heavy snow, strong winds, extreme cold, and an Antarctic winter with half of the year being night.  
An unidentified 'something' appeared in front of researchers isolated in the worst conditions on Earth.
7c8cb285-f2ea-4be5-84a5-a7b4c0e10332:
High risk comes with high reward, carrying gold by himself from the post-apocalyptic world, and become rich? No? Wang Bin has a smarter way to get even richer, find an ally to help him carry more gold from the post-apocalyptic world, after one trip he can become a billionaire! Even so, it is dangerous, the post-apocalyptic world is filled with zombies, and the survivors there can be scarier than the zombies because, for the sake of living, they can do anything, they are 100 times scarier than a zombie!  
  
  
Chinese  
  
高能预警，末世搬砖舔成人生赢家要致富先修路？不，王斌有一条更好的发财之道，去末世搬金砖，来回一趟轻松成为亿万富翁！话是这么说，可去末世搬金砖也并非易事，末世有数不清的丧尸，还有比丧尸更可怕的幸存者，他们为了活下去比丧尸危险百倍！
dc675324-03e6-49ad-98a8-133fe17b3d04: That day, Sayo Mitsurugi wasn't focused on her lessons, due to staying up late the previous night. During the lunch break, she was talking on the phone with her hospitalized younger brother, and up until that moment, everything was part of her usual routine. But then. Suddenly, the signal cut off, and the phone call ended. From that moment on, hell began! Due to the influence of zombies that appeared in the school, the men began to transform into monstrous beings one after another. By chance, Saya teams up with her classmates, the angelic Maria and Momo, to attempt an escape from this hell!
9be148dc-e8fc-4ca5-bd78-e0a142a27ca8:
Chaerin leads a blissful and comfortable life as the lead in a romance novel. She only has eyes for the male lead, Jeha, to the point where all the extras are literal black shadows.  
  
But then, one day, her story suddenly switches genres.  
  
All of a sudden, she discovers that if she wants to live, she has to band together with the extras she ignored before and work with them to survive!  
  
From the author of <Makeup Remover> comes this genre-defying tale!
22a3b429-d5b7-4850-a7e6-299218adc559: A short story set in the world of *Stitch You Together* by the author Kurihara Sakura.
73a132c7-0872-4c42-8a8d-1d7c931992c2:
A collection of 15 stories from the madman Hideshi Hino. Stories 1-11 appeared in the monthly horror magazine Pandora from 1989-1990. Stories 12-15 are culled from various magazines from 1986-1990.

#1 The Brain Demon and the Maggot Snake // 脳魔鬼、蛆蛇

#10 Aquatic Gaki // 水餓鬼
#11 Rot Bugs // 腐乱虫

05ccee57-de43-4e77-8381-253ff81f6cd5:
The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total.  
  
This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.

When I came to, I found myself in the body of a notorious villainess—tasked with running a boarding school in a ruined reverse harem romance novel.
But this isn’t just any school.
It’s a secret facility where troubled noble boys are locked away, doomed to live out their lives hidden from the world.

“You’re the one who gave the order to knock me out earlier, aren’t you?”

And now, the first male lead has been dragged in right before my eyes.
I’m definitely in trouble.

To avoid getting killed by the male leads, I tried to be friendly—just enough to stay alive.
That was the plan.

“If it means protecting you, I’ll do anything.”
“It’s strange… I can’t stop wanting you.”
“Say you love me—before I completely lose control.”

Why are the male leads becoming obsessed with me instead of the heroine?

Getting more involved with them only puts my life in greater danger.
So, I made up my mind to quietly run away.

…Then why are they chasing after me?

What? Did you really just say that? I’ll show you what the real world is like.

A father who's a crybaby when it comes to me.

My mom's first knight, who was called both a mad dog and a loyal dog.

"Bicbic! Beepp!"
A bird which almost lost its life and was saved.

"Only your highness is the owner of my heart now."
The top nobleman of the kingdom whom my 7 year-old sister had a crush on.

"Become the first holy king to manage the wizard."
The crazy wizard called God's mistake.

"I promise I will choose you forever."
Even the prince of an enemy country...

Everyone is on my side.

At this point, isn't it worth giving it a try?

This is the story of a twin sister who has to defeat her older twin against all odds. It is a child care story and the survival of a twin princess!
68b03ba8-bf66-436b-88d0-bb8c88114fe8:
On Kabuchi-jima, an island ruled by Princess Kaguya, ten children were raised as sacrificial victims. Several of the children thought they had escaped their fate when they escaped the island. But nearly a decade later, the kids are still dying in the order and at the time they would have as sacrifices… Their only hope now is to reunite and return to the island to seek out and destroy the source–the legend, the blood-lusting Moon Princess–before time runs out.  
  
In 2002 Kaguya Hime received the 47th annual Shogakukan Manga Award for shoujo.
a41202b8-b2fd-4e64-915a-1d792655f667: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.
ab8633a3-be08-47a9-9d85-d670dd1e8616: The tyrant Xi Wuji always thought that his pampered queen treated him affectionately, like a delicate little lotus flower. He thought she loved him, but on the day of his death, he opened his eyes. As a result of his death, she took charge of the government and had many lovers, and lived in debauchery. But he became her favourite lover again in this new life‽
9cd3def2-b495-467c-ae19-194d5b00843a:
Collection of short stories.   
  
"Fun After School" is a two-part one-shot that tells about the relationship between Iwata Megumi, the idol of Chofu High School, and Midorikawa Mayuko, also known as Miss Chofu High School. When another student takes a picture of the two of them in an intimate moment, what lengths will Megumi go to to get the picture and negative?  
  
"School Days" centers around a girl named Misaki who hates the co-ed school she was forced to transfer to and desperately misses her best friend from the girls' school she used to attend.
a65cd4c4-acef-492f-8811-a79b64b63980: A collection of HanaKimi side stories and an epilogue.
9339a063-04ac-4562-8ddf-ea3ca0777e3a: It’s the 16th century and the knights of the Mediterranean country Malta take pride in being the strongest in the world. Aciel is a beautiful lady-knight who gradually makes her way into the group of the knights, despite the fact it’s forbidden for women to be knights. Learn the tale of the magnificent knights whose charms neither friends nor foes can resist!
92dd8103-2a60-4a1a-a32d-b957bf4eb7dd: Would you make a deal with the devil to get a second chance at life? After her family was framed and executed, Ayana spent the last 13 years desperately trying to exact revenge, only to lose her life at the hands of her nemesis. But just before death’s door, a "loyal knight" appears with a strange proposition. Is he truly her knight or is she truly alone? Will Ayana be able to save her family from doom and finally get her revenge, or is she dancing to the devil’s tune?
e31f4cd3-df9b-4f8f-aea9-6ff28b8dc8ae:
Razé was a cheat soldier at the age of 15, thanks to the memories of her previous life. One day, she was summoned by her superior – the devil Prime Minister and was ordered to go on a long-term solo mission. She was expecting a harsh mission, but…

“I knew you are the right person for this, Lieutenant Colonel Razé Orphan. I want you to attend the Centrior Imperial Magic Academy starting from this spring.”

“…..what?”

Well, it seems that she has been appointed as the “bodyguard” for the prince and other noble’s kids. And so, she was enrolled to the school where the aristocratic-sama gathered.

Although she was puzzled by the glittering school life, she was trying to live a life so as not to be bullied in the future. But it seems there was a secret that she didn’t know hidden in this world.

“Hey!!!!!! No one told me that this is an otome game!!!!!”

As a bodyguard, her life would be over if any of the noble kids got hurt. But then a young lady who claimed to be the ill-fated villainess came by. If the girl died, won’t she be dead too?

Today, Razé will continue to watch over her school life (with her own life on the line).
345676c2-4e04-4726-9dce-f789eb06c98c: Dorothy, along with her beloved dog Toto, finds herself whisked away by a cyclone to the mysterious land of Oz. Something about the strange place feels oddly familiar, but Dorothy just wants to go home. Following the advice of a kindly Witch, Dorothy must travel to the Emerald City and seek out the Wizard of Oz, who alone has the power to send her back to her world. Captive Hearts of Oz reimagines L. Frank Baum’s original Oz stories in a modern, shoujo style. Each volume in this ongoing series will be released in oversized editions, featuring impressive artwork and several full-color illustrations.
f731150b-c2e9-42ce-a5af-5604bcd83c3d:
I’ve been reincarnated into a side character of a novel. On top of that, I am the character who is like a magpie bridge in the mentally-exhausting story, *The Guys Around Hestia*.

There is no romance in store for me, and it absolutely horrifies me to think that my family is destined to drown in debt!

I planned on becoming a civil servant, enjoying a life of wealth and honor that I was unable to attain in my previous life but… why are the guys behaving out of character? Why are you blushing in front of me? Why do you keep giving me food?

“Can you Imagine Shushu being shy when looking at someone?”

“Whoa… It’d be amazing if that happens.”

As Cory absent-mindedly said that to Hiley, Eve frowned and murmured under his breath, “Should I run away with her…”

Swan remained silent while he hid his face with his sleeves. His face and ears turned red.

What’s up with you guys? Why are you guys doing other things instead of being obsessed with the female lead? Get yourself together!

This is the survival story of an academy student, Schulaina West, who wants to pursue a wealthy future in a reverse harem novel. 

TL/N: Magpie Bridge is the bridge made by a flock of magpies that connects the two star-crossed lovers Orihime and Hikoboshi in the legend behind the Tanabata festival.
558be3a5-8e4b-4734-acf5-7102bef14266:
Emilone, once a successful actress but after traveling dimensions, she became a Saintess. This feat got her the decent nickname of ‘the lady who traveled dimensions’ but she didn’t receive any special attention. Because all the attention in the Empire went to Princess Ronella Nestro.

While devoting herself to her work as a Saintess, Emilone accidentally discovered the secret of Princess Nestro:

The Princess’s kind and innocent appearance was all an act!

‘This could be quite interesting.’

If she got closer to Princess Nestro, maybe her boring life wouldn’t be so boring after all. Emilone made a dangerous decision for fun.
2b1fdada-04a8-4b53-858e-b801eb4f104b:
Als Sua eines Tages in der Welt ihres Lieblingsromans in der Rolle von Blair aufwacht, ist sie fest entschlossen, dem weiblichen Hauptcharakter Chloe zu helfen, die schwierigste Phase ihres Lebens zu überstehen. Seit Jahren wird Chloe diskriminiert und misshandelt, weil sie ein uneheliches Kind ist. Blair wird zu ihrem Dienstmädchen und zu ihrer Vertrauten und die zwei entwickeln eine besondere Freundschaft. Aber es stellt sich heraus, dass Chloe völlig anders ist, als im eigentlichen Roman dargestellt. Sie benutzt schwarze Magie, beauftragt Blair, ihr mysteriöse Tränke zu besorgen, und scheint keinerlei Interesse an den männlichen Hauptcharakteren zu haben. Dann erscheint eines Tages ein gut aussehender Mann vor Blairs Haustür, der Chloe zum Verwechseln ähnlich sieht. Könnte das ... die Lady sein, der sie gedient hat?! Alles scheint möglich, als die Geschichte von Liebe und Erlösung eine überraschende Wendung nach der anderen nimmt.

---

92e6c154-47fb-46d3-98d1-36b4d3eb992f: [A hero, a magician, a knight, a demon lord...she is doted by four husbands. ] The main character is reincarnated as a "princess" in a role-playing game. Since she was physically weak, playing that game was a fun part of her hospital stays. "And yet, for some reason, I can't remember how it unfolded...! I thought I was going to go with the hero to defeat the demon king, but the world has already regained peace and the princess and the hero have become a couple!?"
99e287b2-d258-4df2-a221-5f02c2ff656a:
Lin Feilu is an oscar-winning actress. Acting cute, slandering, feigning innocence, or playing the white lotus. Regardless, she wasn't a good person. She then died on her 27th birthday. She vowed, if there was a next life, she would be a good person. In the end, she transmigrated into a five-year-old princess of the great Lin Dynasty. Her imperial mother was not favored, her older brother was mentally challenged, and her life was constantly in danger, with having little to eat and trying to stay warm.

Lin Feilu: …You all forced me!
9bf8c6ee-b735-4e3f-966e-6a31bc03aa24: Otaku Xiaxi committed suicide because a guy in a game exposed her true identity. However, she didn't die and instead time-traveled to a world with countless handsome men. Prepare to see how an otaku transforms into a beautiful goddess!
93716821-eea7-4640-a0d7-924fa21e6f82:
"I thought life would be fun if everyone loved me."

An ordinary office worker became the count's daughter, Crocetta, whose charm value was 999 in a romance fantasy game. It's a shocking situation where people fall in love with you as soon as they make eye contact. Crocetta aims to reach the ending and to escape this game.

A libertine prince, a misanthropic duke, and a devout paladin—all the male leads here are somehow suspicious. Also, it seems like her charm doesn't work on them...? Will she be able to attack the male leads and reach the ending safely?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11004208)
c7a10d9f-6628-4d58-b27a-5081ec3db27b: Even though I'm a Baron's daughter, I have to become an adventurer? On my journey to make money in order to get our barony out of poverty, I died in a dungeon…wait a minute, was I reborn?! Everything is happening exactly as I remember it did. This time, I won't let our family become poor! I promise we will always have food on the table, and that I will grow up and marry into a rich family! Wait, father needs treatment for an illness?! The town is going through an epidemic?! What is going on? Why did I become an adventurer again?!
dc930b5c-1cdc-4545-8e63-6ce17eee9f2e: 化粧品メーカー・創星堂のエリート営業マン・金田啓介。社内の派閥争いで敗れた彼は、順風満帆なサラリーマン人生から突如転落！！会社のお荷物のダメダメ女性実業団「アステリアズ」に飛ばされてチームのゼネラルマネージャーを務めることに！！「アステリアズ」に所属するのは、ギャルい柔道選手、クールな長距離ランナー、ツンデレ金髪テニスプレーヤー、アホの子×引っ込み思案な高身長幼馴染バレーボーラーズ。一癖アリな５人と共に、目指せ、下剋上！
500748b8-08d0-4977-a32e-3997eddade8d: Entaro Mashiba, who earned a starting spot on his powerhouse high school baseball team and made it to Koshien, suddenly quits the team in the spring of his senior year. As those around him struggle to understand his abrupt departure, Konoka Tanabe from the drama club senses the drama in the emotions Entaro carries and decides to reach out to him.
e4344acc-3425-42ea-8830-6e59db32781b: A manga part of the Uma Musume Project by Cygames, a game and an anime. It follows Special Week, an aspiring horsegirl athlete-idol, as she transfers in to the Traincent Academy to follow her dreams.
5a96c030-82b6-40f4-aa0f-c590b6f69f03: The Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's manga is a spin-off of its anime series. Like the Yu-Gi-Oh! GX manga, the events that take place, as well as the cards used by characters differ from those in the anime. It was published monthly in the V Jump magazine in Japanese, and has been released in English via the Shonen Jump magazine starting with the January 2011 issue. It began serialization on August 21, 2009, and ended on January 21, 2015, with a bonus chapter being announced to be included in the final volume. The author of the manga is Masahiro Hikokubo and the artist of the manga is Masashi Satō. The manga is supervised by Kazuki Takahashi.
778b8438-af3a-4534-841c-adf923b55ee1:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.
___
- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)
3e34c87e-483c-4d56-933a-d33c4a1a02e2: Having forgotten his keys, Tamao Hiroi a high-school student, returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed... Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura, one year younger, softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door.
2b2e7c95-9e4d-4199-9ea6-52add4c22cfa:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Shun Sorayama receives a letter… 
from himself ?! It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With a lot of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.
dfc125ad-5f25-44d1-82bf-92edc59ac8cf: Gokumon Girls' High School. A place where the delinquents of delinquents gather! One day, a girl over 180 centimeters tall enrolls there! Her name is Seina Amaki. At this notorious school packed with the toughest brawlers from every grade, Seina tears through her rivals one after another with her finely-honed pro-wrestling moves!
85b3c17d-68fb-4c70-8641-0ced19ca9006:
Two geniuses who made a name for themselves in the middle school baseball world but had distanced themselves from baseball have serendipitously come together at an obsecure public high school in Tokyo.

Kiyomine Haruka, a pitcher with a flawless, powerful arm. His battery partner, the shrewd catcher known as the 'General', Kaname Kei (who's currently a complete amateur due to memory loss!). And then there are those who once fell in defeat to these two...

Their paths have crossed once more, and now their high school baseball story begins anew, springing into action!
b66a6d2f-72cf-4334-9a5a-22d1f1ad8513: High school student, Kawasemi, who has transferred to the countryside, spends her days alone due to her shyness. One day, she is approached by her classmate Misago, a so-called 'countryside Yankee', and was taken to the mountains. Kawasemi was afraid of what she would do, but then Misago starts fishing!?
1930d635-b170-417f-b8a8-f84b881bcc7d:
No one could ever come close to “Battle God” Ye Qiu’s skills in Glory, a popular game that took the world by storm. His professional team, however, replaced him with another captain, and even seized his account.

He was left to start anew at an internet café as a manager. When a new District 10 opened up in Glory, he dives back, armed with a decade of experience and an unfinished custom weapon.

His path to redemption, filled with strategy and memories, marks his thrilling return to the summit.

---

***Note:*** This is a webcomic rerun of [The King's Avatar](https://mangadex.org/title/83d08adf-6118-4859-a0e7-082f3707604b).

Alternative Official English Translation: [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/the-king's-avatar_17959825305729101)
6fa85f8c-e01e-4737-956f-b2d68119f44d:
Everyone likes strong women—until they get beaten by one.

Azure says she’s helping the boy becomes the perfect male individual.

But between combat drills, emotional breakdown graphs, and her sketchy smile...

The boy starting to wonder—is he in training for war?
238911e0-a035-47e7-90d5-c24623cb563a: "We twins were born on the same day and share the same dream! And we've made a promise to each other!" Nobody's more passionate about baseball than the Kuzumi twins. Younger brother Aokaze and his golden right arm is a once in a generation talent! Older brother Nagiharu is a lefty bench warmer. These two have walked the same dream since birth, but when they meet a certain catcher, their destinies will begin to change. The creators of Phantom Seer bring you a serious baseball epic!
484f94e7-35c3-4cb5-a068-53d684c1439a: Following his battle with Nomi no Sukune the 2nd, Baki's half-brother, Jack Hanma challenges the warriors of the underground arena to take on his original fighting style of "Goudou": The way of Biting! Fascinated by Jack's relentless pursuit of more strength, the warriors clash against Jack and his fearsome style. Just what will be the outcome of this blood-ridden contest of purity?
d88f684f-6cfe-4d31-9605-9e9f73f7ff11: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...
949b20c3-de22-4e7b-989f-b26a8cdf7ecb:
“If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?”

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaidou.  The year is 2010. 

Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life. 

Now nicknamed the “Rabid Prince”, Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!
___
**Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/dogsred)
4d65c08e-79f6-4f2e-9c41-aecc98ed0a42:
Aizawa Mashiro, the 'deaf' pitcher, and Nonaka Hiroaki, the 'hearing' catcher. 

A coming-of-age story about a high school battery that bridges the world of silence and the world of sound! 

At the entrance ceremony, Mashiro takes the stage as the school's first-ever 'integration student', introducing himself in sign language. Hiroaki shrugs it off, thinking it has nothing to do with him. Baseball's all he cares about, and he just stuff the sign language chart they handed out into his pocket. 

But after school, Mashiro showed up in front of Nonaka again at the baseball club hoping to join the team as a pitcher. Forced to form a battery with him, Nonaka thought, 'A guy like him's nothing but a dead weight.' 

However, when he caught the ball Mashiro threw straight at him, the words that came out of Nonaka's mouth was 'Nice ball...' 

That was the moment their story began.
1b9950d4-c68a-4416-9dff-ad40166b76b4: Nobunaga grew up at a dormitory full of long-distance runners training for the Ekiden marathon. He dreams of being a runner, but struggles to take the first step. But when he gets pulled into a race at school, he'll catch the attention of the running club.
e4003893-3162-44c5-b5dc-d7433dfb4e0c: Millions in debt, high schooler Taira's only path to redemption is in the world of underground ping pong! "Gimme a flat table, a ball, and a racket, and I'll show you some ping pong!" A shining table and a burning ball. Nobody will keep their sanity when this crazy ping pong battle begins!
eb1babe4-e69a-43f2-b0df-e46eef3ec206:
Friendship. Effort. Victory!

The story centers around the life of a young boxer named Ryuji Takane and his sister Kiku, who is his coach. Ryuji and his sister both inherited their father's talent for boxing with Ryuji inheriting his strength and techniques while Kiku picked up his talent for analysis and strategy. In the past, their father was a famous boxer. Ryuji and Kiku went away from home to train and become famous in order to help their lonely mother. On the way to stardom, they have to defeat the strongest challengers all over the world.

The work that solidified the themes of Weekly Shonen Jump. Those themes being Friendship, Effort, and Victory!
858e2de7-afba-4096-9aa7-1fccac0119c9:
As the son of retired Japanese national team ace Shishiya Kei, Shishiya Gaku was the ace of his middle school club team, but he wondered if he was suited to be an attacker.
One day, Kei came to watch Gaku practice and met Noboru, who had exceptional talent as an attacker, and declared that he would make him the best volleyball player in Japan. The father-son relationship ended. Gaku vowed to prove his own limits as an attacker and beat his father and Noboru with the volleyball style he had pioneered.
9a5e32cc-c88c-48ad-8685-5de136ad6202:
A comedy series based off the real life story of Haru Urara.

Source: AniList
5f7b46a4-c807-4a92-9a3e-c6055c373b67: One year after Takumi Fujiwara’s student Kanata Rivington tore it up on Japan’s mega-popular MFG street racing circuit, two new drivers are itching to try their luck at the event. Their names: Subaru Sato, from Gunma Prefecture, and Subaru Kudo, from Kanagawa. The worlds of Initial D and MF Ghost meld into one as these two Subarus join together to weave the ultimate street racing legend!
3c5fa016-8050-4fae-bb1d-48ea0b6b15b9: The story revolves around a 202-pound, 18-year old girl named Okome Akino (whose name is a pun of "autumn rice"). After Okome enters a sumo match and wins against a male amateur fighter by a landslide, a trainer named Akane scouts her, and she enters the world of women's boxing.
bf16d046-cea1-401b-89bf-5cf898824c3a:
A dull, unreliable middle-aged salaryman, Tamaki Kuroudo, is treated as a hopeless old man by everyone. Teased about his pot belly, treated coldly by his daughter at home, and when he happens to glance at his wife’s phone, he sees suspicious call logs with one of her coworkers. 

As he spends his pathetic days, his capable subordinate Ayase Mizuki invites him to the equipment room. While helping her move some equipment, he accidentally touches her breast and she records that very moment on video. After work, he’s blackmailed with the video and taken to, of all places, a sports gym? 

The price of sexual harassment is body transformation? A secret muscle-training comedy he hides from his wife!
3ac702c0-d8a4-4cb6-bf67-5ef8e3f9cd03: A promotional manga recapping the story of inazuma eleven
a762620e-3d41-4627-839f-aee3d2cf7758:
Losing one match after another, shogi prodigy Yuhi Ninomiya became a shadow of his former glorious self. It was then that he faced his old rival Kanata Kuji in an official match. However, the record-setting match ended with Kanata winning his 27th consecutive game, and Yuhi losing his 17th consecutive game. Feeling frustrated and depressed, Yuhi stops by a bar, when he has a fateful encounter with a certain girl! Her name is Tsuki Kayamori. Although she is overbearing, self-centered, and eccentric, her sharp and unorthodox playstyle is as if she was chosen by the shogi God!

(Source: K Manga)
908d74e4-a62d-4cb0-ae89-2892701e314a:
From Maiu Cafe:  « A voice, some cheers… and a destiny that changes! »
Yuyu, a first-year high school student, is instantly captivated by the cheer squad’s performance during club introductions. Determined to join, she’s shocked to find herself paired with Kozuka, the most irritating boy in her class…!? A thrilling story of friendship, love, and the passion of cheerleading.
82507b6c-e585-46b2-b6e2-9956b3dd7a2b: Mini 4WD Fighter, the iconic superhero of the Mini 4WD hobby! He loves the hobby just as much as the kids and shows his enthusiasm though his commentary through tournaments while cheering the racers in fair play.
c96f1bf8-a100-40bb-98ef-c240b9b7cf96: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Once hailed as a soccer prodigy, high school girl Arai Haru transferred to a school far from her hometown, hoping to start a new life away from soccer. This is a girls' soccer story about a girl who gave up her dream and a girl who chases after it!
___
**What is a regista?**
The regista is a creative player who operates in front of the defense, almost always in a central position, and looks to get on the ball as often as possible. They are responsible for providing the link between defense and offense, and controlling the tempo of the game through their passing. The regista is also known as the deep-lying playmaker: they retain their deep position and dictate their team's play with their distribution. ([Coaches' Voice](https://www.coachesvoice.com/cv/what-is-a-regista-explained-jorginho-andrea-pirlo/))

One day, a four-year-old boy came to a sudden realization: the world is not fair. Eighty percent of the world's population wield special abilities, known as "quirks," which have given many the power to make their childhood dreams of becoming a superhero a reality. Unfortunately, Izuku Midoriya was one of the few born without a quirk, suffering from discrimination because of it. Yet, he refuses to give up on his dream of becoming a hero; determined to do the impossible, Izuku sets his sights on the elite hero training academy, UA High.  
  
However, everything changes after a chance meeting with the number one hero and Izuku's idol, All Might. Discovering that his dream is not a dead end, the powerless boy undergoes special training, working harder than ever before. Eventually, this leads to him inheriting All Might's power, and with his newfound abilities, gets into his school of choice, beginning his grueling journey to become the successor of the best hero on the planet.
___

London, the twisting, turning labyrinth of gleaming skyscrapers and shadowy, old-world alleyways - and the hotspot of modern-day Wakes. They first started appearing in the 1960s, a boom that catapulted this version of Earth in a completely different direction. Now, about 8% of the world wields this strange and terrifying magic, tightly controlled by the iron grip of the NWS.

On a cold morning in Elephant and Castle, amidst a hijacking gone wrong, there is a cataclysmic arrival. From the chaos, a new power descends, shaking the city to its core. The people of London call it a miracle, the moment their Guardian Angel arrived. But for the one who fell, it was the moment of death. Leaving behind a life in another world.

Known only as Midnight to the masses, for ten long years, the Hero watches over the city. A symbol of hope in a metropolis consumed by greed, corruption and fear. Yet behind the awe and adoration lies a darker stifling truth. London’s underbelly teems with ancient secrets, where the transgressions of the past are entwined in the very foundations of the earth. While old enemies walk brazenly in the light, the Hero must grapple with the cost of this life, where the brightest beacons attract the darkest attention.

Hunter Cha Euijae, sent to seal a rift over the West Sea, was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness, he found himself in a garbage dump — eight years in the future.

Starving, he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now, disaster alerts warn of rift openings, slime ASMR videos are trending, and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse, the future is oddly peaceful, leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty. 

Deciding to leave his hunter days behind, he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask…

Out on the road he meets an extraordinary swordfighter with no name who is searching for a legendary master warrior. Bi-Kwang promises to aid the swordfighter if he lets Bi-Kwang meet his beautiful sister. Of course, it turns out the swordfighter is the sister, Hwa-Rin Dahm, and she must switch identities to keep the plot moving along. Bi-Kwang is immediately smitten, and thus we have a triangle involving only two people.

The story takes place in a setting in each side is trying to unify the Murim as a whole, and while this is taking place, Bi-Kwang who is extremely good at learning martial arts but doesn't want to learn it, gets into a deal where he takes the girl to see her grand father since he was the last person to see him before he disappeared and on the way he encounters many enemies and some friends (who show up from time to time) and he matures since he realizes why martial arts is so important and that he has been using it wrongly.
