586c9e6d-28db-46ab-9575-31e26d578f04:
The adventures of mind “Sweepers” continue in this supernatural romance sequel to QQ Sweeper!  
  
As Fumi’s dangerous new powers blossom, Kyutaro might be the only one who can help her keep them under control. Then, when Kyutaro tells Fumi that he’ll never leave her side, she unexpectedly starts to fall for him!
212e9236-c0e3-4e85-ae92-087495820251:
"Can you give me some tips to sing well?"

The head of the chorus club, Satomi, gets entangled with a yakuza called Kyouji and was asked for singing lessons. Kyouji really wants to get better at singing so he kidnaps Satomi every week despite his unwillingness to teach him to sing.

But before long, a strange friendship begins to grow between the two of them…?
011a438a-1984-46e8-aa96-76cdf3f8fa12:
Rita, a girl with the legendary "Golden Eye," was caught by a human trafficker and put up for auction in the black market. It was the mafia boss, Albert Lorenzi, who won the auction, taking home Rita who lost her voice and was in despair due to past trauma.  
  
Rita follows his sweet whisper, "You'll be my bride," but discovers the ruthless side of him who points a gun at people with a smile on his face!  
  
What kind of fate is awaiting Rita who’s greeted by a dangerous mafioso?!
05c29e85-71c1-4f78-95cd-a03e68d9523c: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!
c016374f-4670-4d80-9299-46cea9a567ae: For 10 years I tried to be a good person for her, whom she could love. But then I found out that she did not notice my feelings and fell in love with a bad guy! So from today, I decided to become bad.
4a0b6323-7286-4f6a-aa40-0bce2ccc2904: (from ebookjapan):Miake Kousei, a man who brings out the "beauty" and "love" hidden in everyone, arrives at the grand stage! This is the rumored debut work by the genius Keisuke Itagaki!
1655b797-a968-42b3-a529-c3a98d2fd4d2:
Ayame, a top-notch assassin who has lived 25 years without any connection to romance, is convinced by a colleague to register on a dating app—while hiding her true identity!
She ends up matching with none other than her next target: Murai, the ruthless and cold-hearted young leader of a gang...!?
f436d3ae-3aa8-47fa-948e-489440e2cfae: Kujou is a lawyer who would even defend the Devil. In this new Reiwa Era where chaos is spreading, he's the “guardian of darkness” who operates behind the scenes.
7971e2bd-3373-4e3e-8b8a-dfb3c89f9ba9: A story about an ordinary boy named Mekh, whose life is about to change the moment he accidentally hit the infamous and easily-misunderstood girl named Saran.
8e343c66-adef-42ee-b6bf-ecc3d9b862d0:
The Iyahaya family, one of Japan's most prominent conglomerates based in Iyahate Prefecture, has decided to take care of a relative named Nantomo while his parents are transferred overseas. Iyahaya Sayoko can't help but be curious about her relative's boy of the same age. What kind of boy is this eccentric Nantomo?

In the meantime, a boy in a tattered coat appears before Sayoko's eyes, a poorly dressed eccentric person who eats their dog's food. When she asked him what his name was, he said, "Iyahaya Nantomo (Oh no... Not at all...)", how unclear. Sayoko and her grandmother hurriedly invited him into their house, convinced that he was their relative, Nantomo.

Even though he is not Nantomo, the head of the Iyahaya family, Totetsumo, decides to keep the poor, mysterious boy as the Nantomo and sends him to Kenkin school, the same school as Sayoko.

The school is in the state of Cold War between the Hatesate family conglomerate and the Iyahaya family conglomerate. With the arrival of Nantomo, the school is dragged into a great explosion of madness.
ea47525d-99df-45b5-9103-dd853f49f8c3: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
05e7e729-2403-4bdd-965a-bde4de9e8484:
Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.

---
Romance, flowers, and dates-- once upon a time, that was the perfect description of Haesu and Mincheol. Now, all Haesu has is the ashes of their marriage and a mountain of debt. But her world shatters completely when Mincheol cheats on her with a young coworker. Hurt and betrayed, Haesu finds herself drawn to Taeha, a young man who seems desperate for her affection… and may be hiding more than he shows.
8dfd8c0b-7c7f-4f34-8d08-dc5db5bc212d: Kyosuke Murata, a third-year student at Kita High, lives with his mother. He is a quarrelsome and single-minded man. Kyosuke's real father was Shozo Murata, the head of the Murata group. Kyosuke, who is devoted to quarreling in love, is involved in the conflict between the yakuza organizations, the Kanazawa-Murata group and the Matsuyama-Date group because of his birth! Kyosuke Murata's turbulent youth begins now. A representative work of Motomiya's hard-line manga.
dd39af11-4036-4478-a510-fe20ecd762dc:
Juyeong is in a juvenile detention center for the attempted murder of his father, Gang-ryong. He clings to hope, dreaming of a future in Seoul with his childhood friend, Dayeon. 

But everything shatters when Dayeon is tragically killed by a rogue truck, and the devastation deepens when Juyeong learns that his father was behind the wheel. 

In a cruel twist, Gang-ryong regains consciousness and offers Juyeong an ultimatum...

"If you want revenge, become the king of this detention center!"

 Now, Juyeong must navigate the treacherous world of prison politics, determined to rise to power and avenge his friend.
ab8cbb82-d0ed-45a7-8ffe-4bfa6d43d79c: O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand...
aa7f61df-54ec-438e-b194-31b4e18010e0: Over a decade before the events of the manga series, a chance encounter leads professional bodyguard Yukichi Fukuzawa to begrudgingly take an arrogant boy genius named Ranpo Edogawa under his wing. Their first job brings them to a local theater on high alert after receiving a bizarre death threat — a challenge that will require both Ranpo's brains and Fukuzawa's experience. The aftermath spurs Fukuzawa to establish the Armed Detective Agency, an organization that takes on dangerous jobs even the police won't handle!
1604836d-696a-4a2b-9ec8-e6e23f70cbef: Having become a managing director, Shima Kōsaku is appointed to be supervisor of Shanghai Hatsushiba. Now the story is brought to a highly competitive marketplace for electronics manufacturers the world over, China. Facing language and cultural barriers and some persisting deeply-rooted anti-Japanese sentiment, Shima Kōsaku keeps up his fight without ever giving up his personal style in this new world.
fc270e34-1de6-4f89-b877-2d6b8147c673:
Tiny Law is a female soldier belonging to the 12th Company of the 4th Division of the Laos Liberation Army. Born between a Japanese father and a Laotian mother, Tiny is a sniper who is known as a sniper despite being only 17 years old. One day, Muang Loa Air Base, where Tiny and his friends are stationed, is attacked by a helicopter unit of the government army. The base was destroyed, and her brother, who was her only blood relative, was a tragic corpse.

Three Japanese mercenaries, Takaoka, Inomata, and Todo, betrayed the Liberation Army and leaked information to the enemy. The three of them once saved Tiny's life on the battlefield, but they were blinded by the huge rewards from the Japanese yakuza who wanted to develop a drug route with Laos and sold their friends. By order of the Liberation Army Headquarters, Tiny follows the three of her returning home to Japan, which is also her late father's home country. Set in Shinjuku, a fierce battle between a talented sniper girl, yakuza, Chinese mafia.
ae2c4b0b-e3d6-41aa-9ad3-239b1fc8f0fb: What is the price of revenge? Kris knows she’s different but lives in the dark about her power, controlled by her father’s supervision and her job as “The Cleaner,” doing the dirty work of the Hyuu Police Department. When she finally has a chance to learn more about herself, her father is murdered by a vicious crime syndicate. Eden, the chairwoman of a rival crime family, gives Kris another chance at life. With vengeance on her mind, will Kris adapt to her new life in the underworld, or will she fall deeper into the pit?
76616e0d-d39e-4a73-9541-d49577838e89: The prequel to the series [Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka?].  The main character this time is Kumaoka Aizen (Ameli's younger half-brother who appears in chapter 22 of the main story), the son of a yakuza boss.  The story takes place during Aizen's middle school years and this section focuses on describing the personality changes of Aizen and the other half-siblings that Aizen has met.
b226efca-4b5e-4954-8382-8f29b2305c33: “The Fukurogi Incident” — a serial murder case in which 23 murderers met their end at the hands of an active police officer, Fukurogi Nodoka. Nodoka, presumed dead after her execution, awakens to find herself informed by a mysterious girl, Lassey, that she’s been made to participate in a battle royale between resurrected heinous murderers. Nodoka, driven by the desire to prevent further atrocities by these resurrected criminals and eliminate their kind from the world, plunges into this distasteful game.
c6815011-619d-47b2-933a-dae7d65327e0: Born as a daughter of a gangster family, Hanazame Ranko longs for an "ordinary romance". However, the young head of another group, Sumikawa, always bothers her! People are scared away because of Sumikawa, who is said to be the worst in the underworld! However, he always sticks by her and if she falls in love with him, whe can't go back to "normal" anymore. A heroine who never wants to fall in love x a young head who plays with her, a love struggle without justice, breaks out here!
f2f75037-90c7-455a-a7f2-857a4e8151b1:
15 years ago, two gangs survived the competition at the Capitol plaza to overtake Seoul.  
  
Gi Jun cut off his own Achilles tendon and leaves his gang, realizing shortly after that his younger brother has become the other gang's leader.  
  
15 years later, after his brother's sudden death, Gi Jun is now searching for the truth aiming to uncover what has happened.

Alternative Official English

[Webtoon](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/plaza-wars/list?title_no=4359)
46c2d4e3-5764-41f2-a73f-be43b396b3a3:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.
ddeea1f1-9edf-4b81-8369-8b4411a37968: In the Lapland region of Finland, the domain of snow, midnight sun, and auroras, there is the small Hotel Metsäpeura, run by two older gentlemen. One night during a terrible blizzard, a mysterious young man named Jun arrives at the hotel. He is clearly in dire straits, with a large tattoo on his back, no relatives and no money. However, the gentlemen warmly welcome him in and offer him a job at the hotel. The kindness of the people living in the harshness of nature will melt the heart of this awkward young man.
5787d127-c338-4afa-85a1-05964d1fef82:
Naoto Date is a feared heel wrestler in America known as Tiger Mask who is extremely vicious in the ring. However, he decides to change after returning to Japan when a young boy tells him he wants to be a villain like Tiger Mask when he grows up. The boy resides in an orphanage, the same one that Tiger Mask grew up in during his childhood. Feeling that he does not want the boy to idolize a villain, Tiger is inspired to be a heroic wrestler.  
  
The main antagonists are Tiger's Cave, a mysterious organization that trains young people to be villainous heel wrestlers on the condition that they give half of their earnings to the organization. Tiger Mask was once a member of Tiger's Cave but no longer wants anything to do with them, instead donating his money to the orphanage. This infuriates the leader of the organization and he sends numerous assassins, including other professional wrestlers, after Tiger Mask to punish him.  
  
Most of the environment and characters are fictitious, but real-life pro wrestlers Antonio Inoki and Giant Baba are included in the story as well.
fe9b4485-550a-4823-84eb-8680283b5d9f: The story follows a dark place inside the world of the Baki series, the so-called "Amusement Park". The main character is Mumon Katsuragi, older brother of Katsumi. He ventures into a dark place where money is everything and lives are cheap, the "Amusement Park", motivated to find the killer of his mentor and master Taizan Matsumoto. The killer left a few trails behind and with his wits and physical prowess, he's been able to track him down to the ultimate dangerous fighting arena.
6efe0fd1-eadf-455b-9032-60967aafcfda: Shiga Azuma, a promising young leader of an underground organization, stops to buy flowers for his father's grave from the flower shop of the blind Anji Haruki. And he keeps coming back, drawn to Haruki's inner light and comforting presence - the complete opposite of his world. But their relationship unearths darkness, obsession and secrets on both sides, and threatens to destroy them both.
2f6d31cf-70e4-4948-b9da-731ff8b89af6: Three years ago, Ye Tang, who came from a slum but dreamed of becoming a lawyer to change his poor fate, fell in love with Meng Yixing, a young gang leader who approached him wearing a mask. He was exploited by Meng Yixing and fell to the lowest point in his life. Three years later, Ye Tang, who had forged his resume and used someone else's identity to become a lawyer, reunited with Meng Yixing. Meng Yixing, who knew his past, blackmailed him to continue their relationship. This time, Ye Tang decided to turn the tables and exploit Meng Yixing. The two con artists deceived each other until there was nothing left, then exploited one another.
9f01a130-360c-492d-8699-538a89fbe219:
"From now on, is it okay for me to have an ‘adult relationship’ with you, Young Lady?"

Yui Amagi is the daughter of a yakuza family who longs for a "normal life." Her dream of living on her own finally comes true… or so she thought. But her assigned bodyguard—who also happens to be her fiancé—Ichika Izumo, the Wakagashira (Underboss) of the Amagi group, insists that "it’s only natural for me to be here," while smoking a cigarette as if he owns the place.

Yui doesn’t actually dislike Ichika (in fact, she secretly likes him), but she doesn’t want a romance arranged by her parents. Without realizing her own feelings, she decides to spite him by joining a group blind date.

However, once the party starts, she feels completely out of place and ends up depressed. To make matters worse, one of the men there takes advantage of her vulnerability and tries to take her to a hotel…!?

"You dare join a group date when you already have me, your fiancé?"

An impatient yandere Underboss × a stubborn young lady, caught in an overly intense and sweet “awakening cohabitation love story”… ♪
e7f2b44e-a958-4542-868f-6b8a8268290d:
The manga is about ten-year-old Chie, "the most unfortunate girl in Japan," who manages her family diner while her unemployed yakuza father and her mother are separated.

---
- **Won the 26th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 1981**
ce5ae6e6-40ce-4126-9c6f-ae4b4b7a5d2b:
Seo Jeong-in, the second son of a wealthy judge's family, fails to get into the university his father wants, unlike his older brother. Consequently, he ends up in a dormitory at a rural cram school catering to upper-class students. Having been aware of his sexual identity from an early age, Jeong-in has been enjoying a free-spirited and indulgent gay lifestyle. However, things turn for the worse when his dorm roommate, Seunghyun, captures footage of Jeong-in in a sticky situation with his friend Han Minwoo using a hidden camera installed in their room...
(Source: Lezhin)
d6b7314c-e1c0-44b8-b725-673317e75eec: The autobiography of Masami Kurumada, the creator of Saint Seiya.
86b384f9-980b-4bd1-ac36-57c9defd7703: Haru's been struggling: Shigure's been dead for so long that he has forgotten how being in love feels. May Yukitaka, Shigure's younger brother, make Haru find love again?
ed88b9b7-cc5e-4f20-8bd5-909cc478a235: かつて伊万里たちを手こずらせた殺し屋・沙紀。彼女にもあった硝煙と血煙塗れた過去ーー。女子高生・沙紀は凄腕の殺し屋。元海上自衛官の仙崎瑠璃が率いる秘密組織の元で働いている。仙崎は現役時代の秘密工作のせいで、多くの敵を作り、常に命を狙われていた。沙紀は仙崎の指令を受け、襲い来る刺客を退治していくのだった…。
b350534b-9222-4ca0-890f-398e97946d59: A continuation of the manga "Ultimate Path Private High School", this story follows Toratora Tora on his quest to become the most notorious gangster in all of Japan. When he encounters Schoolcap Masa, the boss of the Gokumasa family, he immediately admires him and joins the family on their rampages. Full on both laughter and violence, the manga takes reader everywhere from a juvenile reformatory all the way to the halls of the Diet.
31bcac1e-75d3-4e5e-ba05-9644f70b8302:
“Please be my friend.” Suzu, a young man searching for his missing brother, gets tangled up with Yakuza, but ends up being saved by Hana, a mysterious and beautiful boy. Suzu works with Hana to find his younger brother, but he almost gets drawn to the innocent looking Hana…
Is this friendship? Obsession? Or maybe… love?
A pure and dangerous crime love story between a clumsy young man and a handsome yakuza boy!
eb42205c-e28b-413b-ab93-345d3a021936: Toa is all Jinto needs. He is his everything, so when he finds him assaulted by some guy, something inside him breaks. Feeling jealousy, hatred, and the desire to monopolize him for the first time, he realizes these twisted emotions are "love." Follow this intense story and see what kind of love takes shape as Toa and Jinto discover their first love through a shared world of hurt and pain.
7cd3ca23-2d70-4c03-99f0-b1ee848c4dc4: An old school yakuza, Nagamasa Ryumatsu, ended up losing his life due to certain circumstances. But, when he awakened to a strange sort of scenery he had never seen before, he found that he had somehow changed into a beautiful girl?!
89daf9dc-075a-4aa5-873a-cc76bb287108:
Immortal Tatsu is an ex-yakuza who’s given up violence for making an honest man of himself - but is it still possible for a devoted stay-at-home husband to get into a few scrapes?

---
- Won 3rd place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018).  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award in the Best Humor Publication category.

6f4c43c2-7ba7-487b-9821-baf0748495c7:
After her sudden death at the hands of an assassin, the former granddaughter of a Yakuza boss reincarnates in a otome game as the heroine. 

The game is, of course, set in the time of early European mafia (but with magic and other special abilities somehow), specifically a kingdom where the royal family is supported behind the scenes by five major gangster! 

Please God, whyyy, I only wanted to life a normal life!

A dangerous love game between a former Yakuza heiress and her villain fiancé begins!

944729e5-a312-4d76-ba46-994802715a5e:
Shin Se (a police-dog) is in charge of the stealth investigation who undergoes ears plastic surgery then enters the cat's territory pretending to be a cat and lives as a mafia mercenary. He has to suffer from many trials and pains to live like a cat.  
Will he be able to complete his mission while hiding his identity until the end?
599d0a48-12e9-4fbe-94b7-30a4e252f4c3:
In an age when anyone can easily transmit information Kanji Mishima works as a reporter for a weekly magazine. He joined the company with the belief that he wanted to convey justice... but now he is on the verge of being fired. Then, Mishima came across an opportunity, a last chance to turn things around as a reporter... It was a chance to meet the "Informer," an urban legendary informant who is well versed in everything from politics to entertainment and the underworld. The most powerful card that connects him to "Informer," an urban legendary informant who is well versed in politics, entertainment, and the underworld.

Bet your life!
e305f85f-3b0c-45f3-b1e1-6fb42900681a:
Contains four comics about the daily lives of the psychopathic assassin Eigo and the gluttonous assassin Setuna.
Includes an episode about their first meeting.
df64232c-cc30-4e9c-92e1-7ccba2b743b0:
The year is 1949. Crushed by the Allied Powers, occupied by General MacArthur’s armies, Japan has been experiencing massive change. Agricultural reform is dissolving large estates and redistributing plots to tenant farmers—terrible news, if you’re landowners like the archconservative Tenge family. For patriarch Sakuemon, the chagrin of one of his sons coming home alive from a P.O.W. camp instead of having died for the Emperor is topped only by the revelation that another of his is consorting with “the reds.” What solace does he have but his youngest Ayako, apple of his eye, at once daughter and granddaughter?

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/ayako/)

---
**Volumes 197-199 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
d2025f8a-b267-45be-a41f-db7defd216fb:
A promising young doctor, Kirihito Osanai visits a remote Japanese mountain village to investigate the source of the latest medical mystery. While he ends up traveling the world to discover what it takes to be cured of such a disease, a conspiracy back home attempts to explain away his absence. Hinging upon his fate are those of his loved ones: an unstable childhood friend and colleague trapped between factions of the medical establishment that nurtured him; a fiancee emotionally transformed by Kirihito’s mysterious disappearance; and a stranger who becomes his guardian angel, a sensual circus-act performer with volatile psychological secrets.

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/ode-to-kirihito/)

---
**Volumes 31-34 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
11aa4c36-1e1f-4713-b13e-319a72842dd8: Valmillo, um traficante de drogas que reinou como chefe do cartel mexicano, perde sua organização e tudo o que possui pra uma guerra de cartéis. Assim, jurando vingança.
cea5dfa1-0769-4028-afc2-1ed2c16a3423: Koyoi, who has lived her life as an assassin, next targets a young master who lives in a large mansion with his butler. She thought she could easily fulfill her objective by infiltrating as a maid, but the master is a creature Koyoi has never seen before, a "trashy womanizer! What is the fate of the two who target each other as prey?!
cde72b5e-efcc-470a-b2d2-d34b8598c4f3: Tachibana, an alpha who turned from a salaryman to a yakuza, works under Goto, a beta, who is the young head of a group backing an omega brothel. But as a matter of fact, Tachibana was ordered to secretly keep an eye on Goto. What is the unknown secret of Goto, who rose to the top of the group’s ranks as a beta...?
62d96fe4-cfb1-450f-a6f8-119f3528b44b:
The life of an ordinary 25 years old girl suddenly takes a turn for the worse when she becomes a waitress in a restaurant for killers.

484fc2ca-d5d2-4bf2-be9c-93d6f62cba04:
After losing everything while being in prison, former yakuza Mitsuya Kaoru, who was wandering around the entertainment district, saved Shirouzu Yuuichirou, a flower shop owner who had collapsed on the street. He ended up working at his shop as a live-in, marking the start of a new life and a new love.  
  
An ex-yakuza who has lost his way x the owner of a flower shop that opens at night.  
The world of two people who live in the city at night and their pure love story.

b14dc351-d47d-4fff-9833-baade8458563: The most exquisite hotels in the world have certain standards: the finest food, the most sublime comfort, captivating entertainment, the latest weapons, reliable identity fabrication, and untraceable corpse disposal. The name of this place where the people who have "forgotten their humanity" visit is "Hotel In Humans." The hitmen guests are welcomed by the concierges who never say "no."
377fb80a-adfb-4208-985d-1a8cd43a86b6:
Harumoto Kazunobu is an underling at a mafia office. One day, the office is attacked, and only he and the boss's young daughter, Mutsumi, survive. After being taken into police protection, the two are taken into hiding at Zenshou Temple, a famous Zen temple with over 700 years of history. However, what awaits them there is a life of training outside of the law…

Death or the Zen path——!?

A youth training graffiti of young unsuis (novice Buddhist monks).
4dace42e-e4c0-40bc-ac12-28557ce2780c: "A Party Cure" takes place in 1996, when strange events began to unfold in Tells Newhour, the number of Deviants - people who had obtained abilities through murder - is on the rise. It did not go unnoticed by the special forces of the town "Cat Mafia".
450e11bc-d2a1-4845-af62-e9bbf5a0acf7: Rebel fangs defy order, price paid with raging fire.
ee4c0acd-dc97-44a1-bebe-040cf79b62bd: This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them. That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power...?
b0c3399d-b03f-4291-b9a1-efc16a83e6d6: Shunsuke Tokyo, a talented Japanese engineer with a strong passion for doll-making, has been invited to join the West German automobile manufacturer Volkswagen as an experimental doll maker. Despite the initial differences between the company's doll requests and Shunsuke's creative vision, he successfully bridged this gap by producing incredibly intricate experimental dolls!
b80a2108-07c5-4dfe-925d-a38dddc28358:
In a Japan laid to waste by a meteorite strike, two survivors, Habane and Saku, travel the desolate landscape in a lone 4x4. They have a single goal: to journey south to a place where they can finally see the Southern Cross in the night sky. But their path is far from easy, as every person they encounter on the road is more eccentric, unpredictable, and dangerous than the last...

(Source: Comic Days, translated)
f3f98ebf-f5ea-4864-896d-cf6af9d6ef2b: Few would consider Louie to be a sorcerer - especially Melissa, Merrill, and Genie. (After all, what kind of "sorcerer" spends his time drinking at bars and beating the stuffing out of the local street toughs?) But much to the chagrin of these three gorgeous female adventurers, divine will has dictated that Louie, the enchanter-gone-street fighter, is in fact a prophesied hero–who they must pledge themselves to serve! Could this bad-boy possibly have what it takes to be a hero? Or has the war god Mylee made a mistake? With a bevy of babes at his side, Louie launches into a series of adventures that range from the harrowing to the bizarre. Get ready for swords, magic, and lots of black eyes and broken noses, because when Louie fights, it's no holds barred!
cab65c9f-5f14-4ad7-bf00-cf3d074bef5f:
Horace, man who was singlehandedly handling the Diamante Kingdom's operations by using a countless number of machine puppets called [Golems] remotely by using his skill that goes beyond comprehension, was dismissed from his work thanks to an ignorant noble. He set out on a leisurely journey to search for ore to aid his research, but... the beautiful hero (disciple) who admired him wouldn't let him be!! She had already made preparations to build him a home in order to repay him but it was all a ploy to keep him for herself?!

But not only did the tomboyish female alchemist barge in as well, he also caught the attention of the troublesome eldest son of a marquis...

"Come at me, I'll settle this with one punch."
"As expected of my master!!"

Unwavering like a rock, unleashing a devastating single punch that shows no mercy!
0fa5dab2-250a-4f69-bd15-9ceea54176fa: Oda Akira, a high school student who excels in erasing his presence, was summoned along with his classmates to another world. In this world of sword and magic, Akira and his classmates were asked to become heroes and bring down the demon king. Having a bad feeling about the king and the princess who asked them, Akira uses his special skills to sneak into the king's library, in hopes of discovering the truth. Whether to help or abandon his classmates who knew nothing, it all depended on Akira.
124a996f-197f-4f03-b5dd-ea753e5ae423: Born with the gift of Hearing—deemed "useless" by those around him—Ars was imprisoned in a tower by his disappointed parents. But one day, he discovers that his enhanced hearing allows him to replicate any magic spell he hears, even legendary incantations wielded by the gods themselves. In time, Ars rises to become the world’s most powerful mage. Stepping into the outside world, he begins his journey... utterly unaware of the overwhelming power he wields!
732dc0ec-bdba-431b-9be1-40ca1d235dd4: The youngest A-rank adventurer, child prodigy Kaiser, finds three babies who were the only survivor of a destroyed village. Then he decided to give up his job as an adventurer and raise them. Over time, the girls grow brightly and show exceptional talents in fencing, magic and management. However, these girls also seem to love their father, Kaiser!
5f5104f5-c5e9-4077-ac9c-6c1ec0d51072: The old man who joined just to fill out the party is actually a legendary adventurer!? A hidden hero turns a talented S-class party of beautiful girls into full-fledged heroes! The greatest training fantasy from "Let's Become a Novelist"!!
454c96ed-4669-4772-9f9b-6fad5669c03d: 異世界の数だけ勇者がいる。けれど世界を救った後も居座り続けた勇者は、やがてその世界の危機となる――そんな居座り勇者たちを元の世界に送り返すナギサと、異世界転移に巻き込まれてしまったユウコ。肉体チート、医療チート、温泉チート（？）……いくつもの世界を旅しながらさまざまな“チート”の成れの果てが招く破滅エンドを食い止めようとするふたりだが！？
9a340c98-f179-4078-86e2-0966da882ee8: To protect the universe from the threat of the suddenly appearing "Grand Black Hole," the good Transformers, led by Galaxy Convoy, attempt to retrieve "Planet Force," which contains the power of their creator, the benevolent god Primus. However, the evil Transformers, led by Master Megatron, are also after "Planet Force." A massive energy battle begins in space and on Earth!
83ebe55c-792f-45e3-96d5-ba3f59584111: 入谷真澄は「救世の英雄」として異世界に召喚されたが、発現したのは触れた対象の情報を見ることしかできない【解析】という外れスキルだった。 ある日、同じ転移冒険者からパーティに誘われたが、彼らはこの世界で重罪とされる「同業者殺し」を犯し、イリヤはその罪を擦り付けられてしまう。最大の窮地に陥ったイリヤだったが、「解析」スキルが「不正侵入（ハッキング）」スキルに覚醒したことで、状況が一変し…！？
87f0e3b0-87f9-4734-a5f6-2fb85a99e640:
"Deliver this message. The hero is dead."  
Our protagonist, Hojin, is summoned as a hero.  
However, Hojin is useless and is soon forced to be used as a subject for a magic experiment.  
When things go wrong, Hojin is regarded dead and thrown out; but really, he is very much alive.  
His journey as a demon has just begun.
d83798f7-a148-4ff9-a28c-7ad50424cd6f: Follows the adventure of two young children fighting against Estark, the Emperor of Hell and meeting with the heroes of Dragon Quest IV: Chapters of the Chosen.
b244d4c3-1e13-487c-8d4b-da7977d3046a: Masato has arrived at Ryujin Town, the holy land of Battle Road! Admiring his friend Ryuta, the champion, he rushes to the venue to start the battle, but a mysterious woman calling herself Queen Pisaro appears there...!? A comic book adaptation of the hugely popular game!!
8eb45000-4e2d-40f2-a290-fa47db5da769: A spinoff that charts the history of three characters from *Emblem of Roto*: Asteea, Jagan, and Quadal.
b9951344-25c2-4362-b32c-81c63067b9b5: The slimes familiar from Dragon Quest are now in full color! V Jump's "Surasaku" is now a long-awaited comic with lots of project pages. We've also included a lot of original slimes submitted by readers.
07659beb-02ae-44b3-ba24-1feb8c2ff399: Surayon and Zenimaru travel the world in search of treasure that can be sold for a high price, aiming to become millionaires. When the two get into a pinch, Surayon transforms into "Yuuki", a mechanical armor (machine) used by ancient heroes, and defeats the bad guys!! But it costs money!
9555c878-3bf3-44e7-a88c-be8b069c754d: The story illustrates the travels of Fairy Rubis before the creaton of Alefgard. Although the story does not contain most of the key features of the game series of Dragon Quest, Enix has declared that this story follows the official historical background setting of the Dragon Quest series.
1831472f-5b21-42e8-a345-999e8ae57580:
The prologue to DRAGON QUEST III, presented in manga format. Contains gaming tips! 
Originally published in FAMICOM SHINKEN OUGI DAIZENSHO vol. 5 (Jump Comics Selection).
ae1dafd9-5adc-4132-810e-fc8e61fd3227: 転生者アレクサントは７つにして生前の記憶に目覚めた。そして、13歳になった年に、名門校・アカシャの家に進学する。そこで多くの才能を発揮するが、彼は錬金術と出会った――。「錬金術で面白楽しい生活を！」魔女っ子、ロリエルフ、褐色元気娘、etc.たちとともにドタバタ学園ライフを満喫し、アレクサントはこの生を謳歌する！
2e318d40-6685-4734-b08b-9c65586f32af:
A long time ago. In the Mahishmati Kingdom, a great power that prospered in India, a bloody battle over the succession of the throne occurred. Around that time, a war broke out between the kingdom and the barbarian "Kalakeyas." The mother of the country, Shivagami, declares that the one who defeated the chieftain of Kalakeyas will take the throne, and the battle will intensify. Amarendra Baahubali defeats the enemy one after another with a wisdom-focused strategy. On the other hand, his brother Vallaradeva overruns the enemy with power and the latest weapons. Watching the whole battle, Shivagami praised Valaradeva's martial arts and nominated Baahubali as the king ... A man who loves his wife, loves his mother, and loves the country ── The story of a "king" who inherits the heart of justice and fights boldly to fulfill the wishes of the people !! Not attached.

Source : [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/manga/140635/Bahubali_O_No_Gaisen)
b06d8595-f8a3-44a1-9e0a-49788b37b184: In his previous life, he died of exhaustion after a life as a corporate slave. After his reincarnation, he is revered as a hero for using his rare "plant magic" skill to end the war, but he is framed by his colleagues and expelled from the court. The village becomes more and more prosperous due to Lilit's unintentional cheats, and Lilit is visited by a flower girl, a cat girl, and even an imperial princess...?
bd2fd217-2596-493f-90e9-f86238109cf5: エレンディール商会の末娘、グウェンドリン（通称グウェン）は、商売の天才でありながら、本を愛する“本の虫”。彼女の夢は、手に入れると「世界の真理を知ることができる」という伝説の古書【賢者の書】を読むこと。ある日、【賢者の書】の1ページが家宝として保管されていること、さらに兄がもう1ページを手に入れたことを偶然耳にしてしまい──。好奇心が抑えられないグウェンは、屋敷中を探し回るのだが……!?
83c09d8a-3a7d-4dee-abf8-c537842a1501: Tori, a boy who can only use everyday magic, works as a servant at the adventurer’s guild to support his sick brother. He can only defeat slimes and obtain a small amount of magic stones. He earns a living day by day while enduring the unfair treatment he receives from the guild members. One day, he encounters a “talking book” in a cave. “Do you want to obtain a ‘real magic stone’?” Those words will greatly change Tori’s fate. The story of the everyday magician’s “unrivaled magic stone” begins here!
0c271e10-f934-4e3e-82c2-331178c84c9b:
Hazin Nam had always been plagued by nightmares, but one day, he dreams of an apocalyptic world seven years in the future where humans are fighting to survive among demons and zombies. Hazin dismisses the dream as another nightmare until he finds out Yuri Hong, the girl he had seen in his dream, has transferred into his school….  
  
With his ability to switch back and forth between his school life and the oncoming apocalypse, will Hazin be able to prevent what causes the world’s destruction?
fa9eb2a0-0623-46f7-8da4-beb70077a9d6:
Tsubasa Akimoto accompanied her best friend, Tako, to a Japanese doll exhibition on the 8th floor of Teikoku Department Store. 

The dolls on display there had real human hair. Suddenly, a bell rings, and Tsubasa and Tako return to the first floor, but Tako says she has forgotten her bag and goes back to the exhibition hall again, and that is the last time anyone saw Tako.... 

Mystery horror begins, where riddles lead to riddles!

(Source: ebookjapan, edited)
___
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 1982**
deb702b1-c2d7-479c-bdf5-1ce06a157eca:
「悪いがトリシア、このパーティを抜けてもらいたい」
男１女２のパーティで自分以外がカップルになり、パーティを追放された回復師のトリシア。
慰謝料代わりに受け取ったパーティ預金で冒険者向けの賃貸経営を計画することに。

腐れ縁のＳ級冒険者ルークとともに秘密のスキル【リセット】を駆使して、
前世からの夢である「不労所得」を目指すのんびり賃貸経営ファンタジー！
339169bd-4054-4ddc-aa99-3c89a593b409:
One day, a sorcerer Orin Jonagold was suddenly expelled from the guild he had been a part of for many years. There is only one reason──

"W-what are you doing!? I-I thought this guild was a decent place, so I've been doing my best until now!"

Because I don't understand the dialect from the far northeastern land of ⟨⟨Aomori⟩⟩ at all!!! However, after meeting Regina Miles, a beautiful novice adventurer with the skill [Interpretation], it turns out that Orin is an incredible cheat magician who can use chantless (Tsugaru dialect) magic! In order to become splendid adventurers like the shining ⟨⟨Star of Aomori'⟩⟩, Orin and Regina run freely across the land of Tohoku!
___
**Character Designer:** [Fuku Kitsune](https://mangadex.org/author/b25fedb5-b21b-4105-affd-95df17bb4051)
d5bdc73f-6b55-4624-ac2f-5332df2edbe7:
**"Pochi, I'll make enough money to buy you lots of dog food, wait for me!"**

Madoka, a university student and rookie adventurer who earns her keep by clearing dungeons, leaves her beloved dog Pochi at home and heads out on another expedition.

When night falls and she still hasn’t come back, worried Pochi bolts from the house to find her, and accidentally wanders into a monster-infested dungeon.
Cornered and out of options, Pochi is suddenly granted the EX Job "Wonderful", and with that power, the dog becomes the story's hero.

A heartwarming, action-packed dungeon romp told from a dog's perspective, part walk in the park, part full-on sprint through peril!

(Source: ToonCracker/POCHI Project, edited)

___

309c99a3-e4de-401d-b6f7-ccfc349f4805:
Fukutome Kai (21), who lives in Tokyo’s Shin-Ōkubo district with his mother, Yukie (53), is walking his childhood friend Rika (21) home after celebrating his mother’s birthday when they are suddenly attacked by a strange man. Kai and Rika barely manage to escape, but… Days later, Kai’s close friend, Korean resident Park Yujun (21), is killed by that same man. Not only Yujun, but Kai’s mother Yukie and Rika are also dragged into the incident—Rika ends up in a coma, and Yukie loses her life.

This tragedy leads to shocking revelations: Yujun had been a spy for country N, Kai has a long-lost twin brother—Im Jin, a member of the super-popular K-pop boy group Littlegang—and his estranged father, Im Dohyun (53), is living in Korea.

Overnight, Kai’s fate begins to shift dramatically. To avenge his mother and best friend, and to uncover the truth of his own roots, he sets out alone for Seoul. But what awaits Kai there…!?
3edb6f3b-163c-433c-bdcc-38a2bce7172a: Hiroshi Hoshino moves into a new house and discovers an extraordinary asparagus growing in the yard. After eating it, he transforms into a girl—now going by the name Hiroko. Embracing her new female identity, she starts attending an all-girl high school and befriends a classmate named Rumi. Unexpectedly, Hiroko discovers other boys have similar transformations, including Rumi herself. With supernatural forces threatening Tokyo, Hiroko is tasked with organizing a squad of transformed ex-boys into magical girls to defend the city
6aff6877-6a29-46d1-b391-59f7a9cfcec5:
It has already been two years since I possessed a character in this insanely difficult game. In order to go back to Earth, I have no choice but to stop the downfall of this world and reach the ending of this game.

[You have collected the body of a pathetic soldier. Inheriting abilities.]

[Inherited rewards: Stamina +1, Proficiency +1, Dehaman’s Armored Combat (D)]

I will see through to the end of this game no matter what!
eaf9a2e7-8d52-4ec2-98d1-dbfa081e4054: Sho Teruhi, a university student, is reborn as dragon knight Kakeru in a different world based on InfiniteWorld, his favorite game. He decides to live as an adventurer with his partner, Einaria, a firecracker dragon. However, a different development from the game awaits him!?
678e3447-37cc-4205-bdc0-c67b933670e7:
Also known as Princess Mononoke, the Hayao Miyazaki and Studio Ghibli film.  
  
In order to satisfy their own needs for land and resources, Man is encroaching on their sacred territory, cutting down the trees and destroying everything else that stand in their path. As a result, the animal gods became angry and attacked the encampment.  
  
Into this conflict wanders a young boy, Ashitaka, a refugee of the Emishi people. His people still live in hiding, but when his village was attacked, he shot and killed one of the animal gods. For this he has been given the curse of death.  
  
He has begun a search through Japan to find the secret of his curse when he arrives at the encampment. Outside of the encampment he is attacked by the "Monster Princess", a girl raised in the woods by Moro no Kimi (a 300 year old female dog god) and who is driven by a fierce hatred for the humans who are destroying the forest. This girl, San, has repeatedly attacked the encampment, but after she meets Ashitaka, she becomes torn between her loyalty to the animal-gods and the world of the humans.  
Surrounded by the warring characters of the humans on one side and the animal-gods on the other, each side believing in the righteouness of its cause, it is Ashitaka and San who must face each other personally and, by the end of the film, come to an understanding of each other's world and make the attempt to coexist without hatred and violence.  
  
Not far from the heart of the sacred forest where the great Deer God dwells, a new town called Irontown is founded. Conflict seems inevitable.  
  
A young girl raised by wolves, and a warrior bearing a curse inflicted by the hatred of a dying Boar God are trying to make things right. Will they succeed?
702b78cb-0155-4449-8abf-4078d4af83a7: Hana, a samurai living a life of idleness in a huge underground prison city, and Amanogawa Josui, an ayakashi vessel god who has fallen from the heavenly city. Their encounter begins a journey of rebellion against the heavens.
10ad0302-7ec3-476e-a6cf-0fe829cce9b1:
死後の世界は死にゲー（死ぬことが前提の難易度のゲーム）のようなセカイだった。カオスアニマを集めると記憶を持った状態で転生できるという。妻と息子を殺され、自身も殺されてしまい、復讐を誓う主人公・吾妻龍人（あずまたつと）は転生を目指し地獄、通称　テラ・グラウンドで転生を目指していた。

ある日、一人の少女・元高校生・朝凪　旭（あさなぎあさひ）と出会い、同じく転生を目指すという彼女を指導するハメになり、期間限定ではあるが行動をともにすることになる。メキメキと実力を伸ばしていく彼女だったが、この世界は転生を目指す愚か者に試練を与えたのだった。
61c6de9c-e8b0-4d44-aaa8-1f724f8fd6b9: Bijou village is rumored to be visited by monsters from the mountains. Hachi and Ichinoshin, who live in the village, have been trying to protect the village as a vigilante group, but one day, the monsters come down to the human village. In order to protect their village, Hachi and Ichinoshin head for the Mijo Mine, the source of the creature. What they find there is a vast underground city.
df8939d0-ec86-46cf-bbf6-bce91437b69d: 数々の大事件が起きた1920年代のアメリカ。“狂騒の時代”と言われたその混乱により、人の強烈な感情を食べ物とし寄生し狂わせる異界生物・ユーカーが人知れず大量発生していた！？
735226a4-7d5a-4dde-8e09-d08067d5502a: 大陸屈指の大国・フロイセル帝国と戦争をするはめになった小国・ランド王国は、本隊を王都へ向けて敗走させるため、庶子の第四王子ルトに殿部隊を任せる。『無能王子』と呼ばれるルトが率いるのは、たった五十三人の兵士たち。万に一つも勝ち目はないと思われたが、ルトは世界に数名しかいない『魔神格』の魔法使いだった！ ルトは魔神の力を示して敵将を圧倒するが、仲間の兵士たちと帝国に降ることを望んでおり――これは祖国を捨てて帝国の守護神として活躍する、最強の氷使いの軌跡。
66b04cb0-bf08-4f02-aace-c63212a98b99: Takeru’s life ended at seventeen with a traffic accident—and restarted in another world. A goddess handed him cheat powers, and with them he became famous in Orlea, the sprawling dungeon city. But the dungeon went too deep, and ten years later, Takeru’s given up on both conquering it and going home. These days? He just makes the rounds at his favorite brothel.
6f3958e9-bdc3-47d5-aa6f-dfc0e81f199b: At first he was just another one of those unqualified to be a rune bearer, but thanks to a "system" that completely changed his destiny, he was able to become one of the great commanders of the War Zone, where he led humanity to counterattack the great army of rune beasts.
9b16f701-8291-4cb4-acad-9191c44c191c: 前世日本人のエリックは回復術師だが肝心の回復力が低く、冒険者パーティを解雇に。だが怪我をした猫を治療したことで自身の力の本質を知る！　「回復する宿屋」の経営で楽しい生活を目指し、廃村へ出発した…!!!
0d8b3011-9a82-466b-a130-60e5832a19fb: Prepare for cuteness overload with Su Mianmian, a three-and-a-half-year-old metaphysics wonder! Cradling her milk bottle, she’s a fortune-telling sensation, adored by the nation’s wealthiest family. Whether she’s exposing scandals live on air, banishing evil, or revealing hidden fates, she’s a force to be reckoned with. Villains beware: one flick of her wrist and a well-placed talisman will put you in your place! This pint-sized powerhouse, with a thousand years of cultivation, dishes out epic comebacks and spreads joy. The internet is obsessed, demanding new chapters: “The ultimate adorable badass? Sign me up!*From the author of my previous work, “Matriarch Downgraded into a Mistress”
ca3e361b-c76b-41bd-a3fa-9c2042353dfe:
For a long time, mankind would summon a "hero" from another world once every 100 years to fight the Demon King's army. However, one day, the Demon King came up with a countermeasure against the heroes. The idea was to trap and kill the defenseless heroes immediately after their summoning. To commemorate this historic feat, the Great Demon King designated this year as the "First Year of Trapped Killing". Since then, all the heroes have been killed on spawn by the Demon King's army. In the 1000th Year of Trapped Killing, the summoner was very worried, "What kind of brave man should I call? I don't know... Someone make my worries go away!" The summoned hero turned out to be hiroyuki, the founder of 2channel and a master of argumentation...!
___
**Supervisor:** [hiroyuki](https://mangadex.org/author/9e5e08ec-17ae-4129-b61c-d0f12c19e4a3)

**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/6297)
6ee18f3c-45be-473f-be6e-263392f0a6c4: かつて存在した陸地は沈み、人々が暮らす人工地盤以外は海だけが広がる世界・ブルーユニバース。潜水能力を認められた16歳の少女・ナギサは海底遺跡・アトラを探索するダイバーに抜擢され、エースチームで先輩のハルカとバディを組むことに。旧時代の情報が記録されたキューブや大型海獣・遺跡クジラなど、ナギサの未知との出会いが始まるーー。
806f34f1-6151-4beb-a2a8-7f53b2e49216:
In the most realistic VR game “Last Savior”. Every player will get a chance to summon a Follower Spirit. The Follower Spirits are ranked from 1 – 9. And obviously, everyone wants a rank-9 spirit. However, the one that I pulled has an unheard-of rank…

[What on earth is going on?]
“Yeah…”
I don’t get it either.
68d0f13d-2520-4903-92dc-6897e704be75: 稀有な緑魔法の使い手ながら、その実力を認められず、名門・ヴェデーレ王立魔法学院を無能として追放されてしまったリュート。「王国を支える方法は一つだけではない」。そう思うリュートは、故郷のポルトス村で緑魔法を活かした農業で国を支えようと決意する。学院での修行を経て、ますます強力になったリュートの魔法は、村をどう変えていくのか?　住み慣れた故郷で、森の女神ヴィヴィアンや昔なじみの少女ミーアたちと楽しく過ごす、追放から始まるヒーリング・スローライフ!!
96818419-90d6-4e45-8f48-aefa30d3739d: This story takes place on the frigid, massive artificial planet known as Aposimz. Eo, Biko and Etherow, residents of the White Diamond Beam, are in the middle of combat training when suddenly a girl appears, Rebedoan Empire soldiers in hot pursuit. The girl asks for their help in keeping safe a “code” and seven mysterious “bullets.” This chance encounter marks a major shift in the fate of the entire planet…
e5460c71-9f44-40c3-ac30-7e988b4d3446: A mysterious app, a strange listing. I am a real estate agent, and I sell a haunted house where all kinds of tricks have happened.
2d746239-81d7-4e3d-b948-98907fdd653a: All mankind, wake up! It …… that humanity was on the verge of extinction due to the monster “Woe” that appeared from another world. Meanwhile, Hiroya Kamigami, a high school student who has been ridiculed for being called “incompetent” with no skills, changes his fate when he acquires the power of the deadliest disaster in history, “Mugen”. With his strongest skill, Infinite Awakening, will Hiroya become the hope of saving humanity or a demon that will bring destruction? Powerful ability battles depicted with majestic and beautiful brushstrokes are intertwined with epic drama – StudioSOON’s latest full-fledged battle fantasy webtoon has begun!
9da31db1-f912-45fc-b28a-a2d5deb1bb95: Set in an era of pirate beginnings, an eccentric boy of tricks and a speciality for gambling finds himself entangled in the lives of others with mysterious pasts and awe-inspiring abilities. As the eccentric Raveko Iritalli sets out on his exploration, he discovers the chilling secrets beyond the seas, leading a trail of blood in his path.
5dc71c69-1442-44e7-86c7-01abf0a17280:
In a world where the space behind each door is randomly shuffled every time it is opened, students who have survived must find a way back to their families. 

To return home, they must open that door.
8106f68b-e759-41e3-974a-2696edd3093b: The one who defeated various ranked dangerous monsters, the one who sealed 6 demon lords, the one who is onlooked by God. Elm, the dragon knight who wields several legendary equipment, humanity's strongest man, has continued to work for the Bangs kingdom. He accepts SSS rank requests, but he is mocked with the name "Subcontractor Knight". He continues this harsh labor, until his dragon partner, Baha, suggests for him to retire. So Elm and Baha depart for an unknown location to start their slow lives…
28fdf138-c261-4d37-8541-8a65344efeab: 融合現実型FPSオンラインゲーム「アサルト・アディクト」の中にログインしたまま消えてしまった憧れの先輩を救うため、女子高生・谷浦彩音は、3人の仲間とそのゲームに参加することに。だが、他の3人にはそれぞれ秘めた思惑があり、消えた先輩にも謎めいた一面があって…
ed348503-16f7-4083-9458-fc6583e54791:
Prequel of the [Original Tokusatsu Series](https://garo.fandom.com/wiki/GARO:_Chapter_of_the_Black_Wolf) featuring the first years of Kouga's makai knight training alongside his father Taiga, the Golden Knight GARO.

Raw chapter available: 6
ca5daa76-12c7-4a27-a3f7-3a1d1e071935: Crows are a symbol of misfortune and death. Compared to other birds, Crows do not have the innate ability to soar.…This is the story of a crow who will have the determination to conquer the setbacks of misfortune and achieve his dreams of soaring to the moon.
c22ce6be-9740-4a17-95c4-15aa38342206: If you get it wrong, it's a world war! ! A world where steamer roar and fleets fly across the sky. A monster-type boss and a new pair of hard-working female officers go to an enemy country as military attache. This is a complete diplomatic war story where the nation's trend is at stake!
104a4efb-d305-4213-abb2-c237391979f0:
A new era of military entertainment begins!

Year 20YX. Global warming is causing sea ice to decrease in the Arctic Ocean. The Maritime Self-Defense Force destroyer Shiranui, on which Kaburaki, a candidate to become the next captain of the Ibuki, is dispatched to conduct research. Suddenly, a civilian research vessel is attacked by someone...! The "Shiranui" quickly uses its weapons to protect the civilian ship, but...! Who attacked it? What was the reason for the attack!
e3d8a2af-c6a5-49d1-85c8-cb95a5daeced: A heartfelt fantasy woven by a grumpy witch, her two children, and the three beasts that live with them. Although the behavior seems to be severe, the daily life of a witch who thinks firmly about her adoptive child and the children who love her is drawn.
c3ea5ce6-f659-4fe9-95b6-520cec9fcb13:
The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took.

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
fc259ec6-bfc0-46db-876a-269035dc53b3:
A 17-year-old named Kang Geon transfers to an elite high school attended only by the top 0.1% of South Korea.

Trained since the age of five in North Korea as a human weapon and a genius secret agent, he’s given a mission to infiltrate South Korea’s high society and build connections.

But making friends turns out to be the bigger challenge.

Living under the guise of a family with his father, a hacker watched by nations, and his mother a legendary assassin, he navigates a spy-action drama in search of true happiness.
9a83da93-e301-4eb2-84a4-171426e9622f:
帝国騎士団の一隊長を勤め、可愛い貴族の婚約者までいるという公私ともに順風満帆な生活を送っていたアッシュ。しかし、ある日急に騎士団の追放と婚約破棄を宣告されてしまう!? 全てが嫌になったアッシュは新天地へ赴くことに―。

向かった先のローズベル王国は、ダンジョンの資源を利用して急成長を続ける帝国よりも遥かに発展した国だった！そこで旧友のベイルと再会し、ローズベル王国の第二ダンジョン都市で狩人（ハンター）として新たな人生をスタートすることしたアッシュは圧倒的実力で名声を獲得していく。一方、アッシュのいなくなった帝国騎士団ではアッシュを溺愛する後輩のウルカが目の色を変えて彼を追いかけようとしているのだった。
4eeaa087-4a6b-4428-90d8-17dc8f08a3a1: The rogue ninja Kamui is struggling to free himself from the iron fist of his own clan. As a ronin, he should not exist. In his flight from his clan he meets another ronin ninja, a woman named Sugaru. Sugaru, wanting only to live in peace, is very distrustful. Her paranoia is shown to be justified. The manga covers Kamui's struggle to leave his past behind and Sugaru's failure to do the same.
80cbf85a-1ebb-440a-8272-294edf7602e3: 新米冒険者は世界を識る者？天空城の王、ついに降臨！
f4ac0ae5-6af4-4454-8b15-01f4b1c4a349: The world is a world where humans are frightened by the threat of monsters. And among them, the most terrifying vampire is Cardinal. Born to Cardinal due to a strange fate, Dante, a young man with the strongest weapon, embarks on a vampire-killing journey with his longing maiden, Marie!
f6c6b163-68c9-44a8-b4d9-638ae6408543:
A jobless man barely scraping by with part-time work, drifts around like a wandering orphan.

His only joy in an otherwise dull and unchanging life is the online game God-Forsaken World. To him, it’s more than just entertainment — it’s an escape from reality.

Then one day, while immersed in the game, he hears a mysterious voice from nowhere. When he comes to... he finds himself inside the world of the game!

You’d think that after being transported into a game, he would become a cool, powerful protagonist... but no.

He wakes up as the Empire’s disgrace and failure of a third prince: Gilroshan Elro de Valt!
bdb675cd-1d99-4fdc-bcd8-0f35369979b1:
The year is 2099, Shinjuku City. The legendary Demon Lord Beltre has reappeared in this future city that has achieved ultimate development. The glorious prosperity of the giant city-state and...... the terrible "darkness" hidden behind the scene. In order to rule the new world, the Demon Lord is moving into the future!

Was serialized online on Kadokawa Shoten's Shōnen Ace Plus from November 5, 2021 to 2022, before being removed from the website for unknown reasons.
08753fee-c48c-4401-b89d-bc69d0fc6adf:
Trapped in the online game “Fantasy World”, after 177 cycles of deleted files and beta testing, Char has attacked all the beautiful NPCs in the game, the wives of the novice village, the priests of the church, the candidates for the dark elf queen, the Valkyrie chosen by the gods, etc.

Just after he singled out all the bosses and used hundreds of ways to clear the “Fantasy World”, the “Fantasy World” public beta was released!

The constant addition of players has changed the immutable NPCs, and Char is determined to find a way to leave the game in the public beta…

cbea3bfc-0eac-4c29-8944-82fb60008f9b:
「教えてやるよ、職人の誇りを」

戦えない役立たずとしてパーティーを追放された付与術師のリュージ。しかしこの男、作る魔石が規格外！？能力強化にとどまらず、力を付与した魔石でゴーレム生成、荒廃した土地を一晩で畑にしたりと移住先の辺境が快適拠点に！！ 何物にも縛られなくなった技術が、粋が、価値が――遺憾なく発揮される！ やがてその技術は王族にまで轟いて…？
c080e4ee-3717-478b-bb2b-5e572da5db30: "Atelier Violato", which was serialized in Famitsu PS2 and gained popularity, is finally being published as a book! In addition, all newly drawn manuscripts that could not be seen at the time of serialization are also included, making it a must-see rare item for fans of the Atelier series and Yoshihiko Ochi! ! Please enjoy it!
72133284-8d14-4f6d-a822-939b8e051539: The bikkuriman 2000, which is serialized in Korokoro, is now available in comics!! He is a warrior born to fight. One day, Takeru is asked for help by a boy who is being chased by a demon. According to the story, Kanji seems to be looking for a "next-world egg" that has the power to seal chaos, along with Super Zeus, who has been transformed by the evil energy chaos. Takeru is completely uninterested in the peace of the world, but when Zeus tells him, "If you travel with us, you might meet someone stronger than him," Takeru joins them on a journey to find the next-world egg. Decided to leave! What exactly is waiting for them on their way?
2d23a9d0-f059-44eb-be16-599baa40eed0:
The apocalypse game swept across the globe and merged with the real world, causing the collapse of order. In his previous life, Ye Xiao devoted everything to elevating his fiancée, Liu Ruyan, to the pinnacle of power, only to have his heart literally ripped out by her on the day of their engagement and transplanted into her male best friend. Reborn into a new life, Ye Xiao resolves to ascend the throne alone. Before the game closes its recharge portal, he spends billions of his fortune to switch to a god-level profession.

c1c4ac04-c9e6-48a5-92d4-ca2e658d1270:
祓魔師・シモンは、”悪魔的”な歌唱力を持った美貌の吟遊詩人・オルフェと出会う。母の故郷に向かう途中だという彼の正体を見定めるため、同行を決意したシモン。しかしその晩、オルフェを「贄」と呼ぶ悪魔に襲撃されてしまう。「もう、独りはいやだよ」「オレはお前を独りにしねえ」
二人は立ち塞がる悪魔たちを剣と歌で祓っていく…！
アウトローな祓魔師と半魔の吟遊詩人が織りなす痛快バディファンタジー！
2e7dbf7a-7ec8-4ac7-a2cd-a6cc8dc8129b:
Kain raised his sword for a king consumed by madness, only to meet his end in the hands of a friend.

But when he opened his eyes, he... was reborn as his friend's youngest grandson?

No more being a loyal dog. Reborn as Karon, he'll throw away the leash, loyalty, and fate — and live exactly as he pleases.

His past life's sins are paid for - this life is his to wreak havoc as he see fit.
67efeb77-350c-417a-a032-156a086cdbaa: Gabimaru, once renowned as the most powerful ninja, finds himself captured after attempting to flee his village. Yamada Asaemon Sagiri, his executioner, offers him a deal: to be exonerated of all crimes by the Shogunate, he must locate the Elixir of Life in Shinsenkyo, a realm rumored to be paradise. The man who claims to be devoid of all human emotions and attachments must now embark on a journey to explore the meaning of life, death, and humanity!!
e83d1723-26f8-4dd5-b510-5ca4e1f3ec4c:
Betrayed by her parents, cast aside by her fiancé the prince, and left to die in a dungeon by the mentor she once trusted—Countess Chloe meets a tragic end… only to awaken in the body of her five-year-old self.

Given a second chance, Chloe refuses to walk the same path of sorrow. This time, she’ll use the one thing everyone looked down on—her "useless" grass magic—to carve out a life of her own, far from the chains of nobility and heartbreak.

As she resists the twisted fate that once awaited her, an unexpected offer of refuge arrives, leading her to the remote frontier where a new life—and perhaps a new kind of happiness—begins.
048bfcbe-6fb0-4072-b356-263f426cc46c:
Raneko, a shy girl, and Kainu, a boy with a mysterious past. The two budding adventurers continue to challenge the Madara Tower, where the "treasure of the farthest reaches" lies.

(Source: Sunday Webry, translated)
29931a36-551a-464e-b5cb-193a83a789cc:
決して起こる事はないが、よくある異世界転移。

痴漢と間違われたおっさんは、疑いをかけた女子高生の瑞稀《ルビ：みずき》と共に、気づくと怪しげな女神のいる神殿にいた。女神ラクシェルは喧嘩を続けるふたりを仲裁し、魔王討伐の勅令を与える。女神から3つだけチートの特殊スキルをもらい、おっさんは瑞稀と共に異世界へ転移する。そこはレベルという概念がある、中世ヨーロッパのような世界だった。しかも……倒すべき魔王は、100年前に討ち倒されていた。

そもそもおっさんの力では、ゴブリンのような雑魚敵を倒すのもひと苦労。思ったよりも過酷な異世界で生き抜くため、奴隷を買ってパーティを組む事に。おっさんはそこで、犬耳族の美少女ファムと出会う。ファムとともにおっさんは冒険者として地道に活動し、ダンジョン攻略やクエストに勤しんでゆく――。

異世界はそんなに甘くない！？
ad206dba-2292-407a-8b93-5b191f4adc02: When a person dies, they transform into [Shang], and through a gate, they come into the world to cause disasters. A deliveryman named Zhang Zha accidentally enters a ghostly residence and triggers a [Shang] chaos crisis. As a result, all kinds of extraordinary figures appear, and through a series of adventures and battles, Zhang Zha continues to grow. Thus unfolds a passionate and mysterious picture of the modern martial world.
e93392c7-789c-4ea7-802d-1d1148ff8c61: D'Artagnan, a young boy who dreams of becoming a musketeer, heads to Paris with his father's letter of introduction to meet Trebeel, the musketeer captain. However, on the way, a scarred man steals the letter from D'Artagnan, and he ends up meeting Trebeel without it... And then, by chance, D'Artagnan ends up in a duel with the three musketeers, Athos, Porthos, and Aramis, who are held in awe by all...!?
d36e37b8-b039-401e-af33-39ad734576ad:
(from ebookjapan):
The world is truly in the age of commercials!　Depending on the advertisement, even black can be made to look like white. Shogoro Tobita, who dreams of becoming a cool CM guy, joins "Jun Advertising (Ad) Center" located under the building of the largest company in the industry, "Daidenpoin" (......). The company building is a shambles, the president is a super weirdo, and the only employees are Komako Sugo, a beautiful secretary with a zoo dialect, and a senior monkey named Copy!　How can such a company survive?　A nonsense gag serialized in "Weekly Shōnen Sunday" in 1970!
dde75a2f-d6d8-4032-b9e3-e5745a125b66: 世界の平和のため、ダンジョンに挑む探索者。それを行く先々で妨害するダンジョンマスター。二人は幾度となく戦いを繰り返し、やがて月日が流れた。探索者の冒険は相変わらず続いており、彼の背はすっかり伸びて青年になっていた。そして、彼を阻むダンジョンマスターもまた、見違えるほど成長していた。その豊かな胸は、服の隙間から無防備にその存在を主張していた。
ef7c5674-50bb-4fb3-860d-5cc4b312f7f8: Catch! Eat! That's all there is to it! Using all her knowledge, gear, and experience, she will feast on delicious food again today! A slightly campy action epic unfurls in a fantasy world!
ece192d0-9d4d-4f81-8319-32be35be640d:
(from ebookjapan):
Big brother Taro, a promising professional boxer, is dead. His father, who suspected the Harada gang of being responsible, was also killed. Jiro takes control of "Big Brother Tank," which his father made from scrap iron, and rides into the Harada gang. What are the three secret devices equipped instead? Jiro, who got a job to support his mother, bravely confronts the suspicious incidents that occur around him with "Big Brother Tank"! An excellent work that lightly depicts the warmth and darkness of the 1950s!
51071f70-a359-44ff-a9bb-c754bbef9231:
In the Kingdom of Nirv, the second princess was born with an apparent flaw—she had been blind since birth. Due to political conflicts, she was sent away from the capital to live in the Rint Forest, where everyone assumed she was just a fragile child, oblivious to the world around her. But the truth was far beyond what anyone imagined... She possessed extraordinary power that defied all expectations!

When the king finally decided to bring her back, he sent the Vice Captain of the Holy Beast Knights, one of the strongest warriors in the kingdom, to escort her to the palace. However, upon meeting her, he immediately realized that this child was anything but ordinary—she radiated an immeasurable force, a power that could change the fate of the entire kingdom. How will this journey back unfold? Will the young Saintess remain hidden in the shadows, or will her strength one day be revealed?
404cf1c4-028d-4ada-9a83-97b9def21a88: Robin, an orphan, spends his days training under the white wizard Farrant. However, when a golden-haired knight appears in the village, Robin's life changes completely!
a5a77a6e-ee09-4154-abf7-4b4a54b9aa6a: 王都グレンディーアで『門番』をしている主人公。しかし理不尽な理由で仕事をクビに。そんな『門番』は王都の下水道で凶悪モンスターを狩り続けて最強になっていたことを知らぬまま国を出ることに...。最強がゆえに可愛い弟子ができ、幾多の村の危機を救うも、〝自分の実力ではない〟と勘違い!? どれだけ大活躍をしても、「俺、ただの門番なんだけどなぁ」の一点張り。
c3ad6fb2-f100-4124-8691-c854ecaaa858: The first volume of a full-color side story illustrated by Isaemon Yamagata, who designed the characters for the popular game “Eri's Atelier: The Alchemist of Zaalburg 2,” alongside the game's original staff.
5e3519f1-9b4b-4890-85c3-82ea2ac6f676:
After memorizing his magecraft textbook in a single week, Louis is accepted as a scholarship student at Minerva's Mage Training Institution. But surrounded by nobles, the rough and rowdy boy from a poor, remote village is treated as a problem child and feared for the way he trounces his opponents in magic battles. And yet Louis still finds teachers he respects and friends he can rely on as he grows into the man who will become a Sage. Learn all about the notorious deeds of the Barrier Mage's youth in this prequel to Secrets of the Silent Witch.

(Source: Yen Press)
a27ddcc7-3951-41f9-9b6a-64deda08dc81: On a planet covered by a thick layer of cloud, a young thief serves a local bandit group, enduring a life of abuse. One day, a fleet of spaceships crashes through the cloud, revealing to the thief, for the first time, the starry skies. This event.. Along with a mysterious stolen amulet, it completely changed the trajectory of his destiny.
891f73d0-59a2-4ad0-b336-9b09650e86fe: Kiri, a nine-year-old boy, left his countryside home by himself to make a living. Betrayed by an adult he trusted, he is nearly sold to slave traders. However, he manages to escape and finds his way to the Adventurer's Guild, a tavern called "The Raging Kelpie's Fin." In order to become an adventurer, Kiri lies about his age, claiming to be twelve. He overcomes numerous hardships and forges deep bonds with his eccentric and quirky companions.
f9eec00c-5c7a-4c1a-9263-0806dd811f15: In the apocalyptic era, my sisters and I struggled to survive, yet we were nothing more than ants in the eyes of the powerful. On the brink of death, I awakened a reincarnation ability — and was reborn into the family of my enemies. They poured all their resources into raising me, completely unaware that I would one day destroy them from within!
3f93d8b8-7f0e-49c9-9914-265b9ca9477c:
Living quietly in the depths of a quiet forest, Sheena, a reincarnated person who lost her family, and an old traveler who knows the world, are together. Sheena's magical powers have been strong since she was a child - so strong that they are called "curses". One day, a holy knight named Fel, who has been asked to defeat a witch, crosses Sheena's magical barrier and visits her. However, he is attacked by a forest beast, but is saved at the last moment by Sheena's overwhelming magic and..."Would you like to take me as your apprentice?"

A fantasy about a love journey that begins with an apprenticeship, woven by a reincarnated strongest magician who looks like a little girl and a carefree younger exiled holy knight.

(Source: Comic Walker, translated)
40c12af5-2a68-4006-9c3f-f2be53e7773e: Oriental fantasy about a mage who lives far from civilization in a remote castle and reluctant to accept any disciple. But then he meets a mysterious boy.
2b7e33fd-e9af-4276-b7ec-24822fa232ba: The husband she loved, the only friend she trusted. But at the brink of death, Sereniel realized the truth: everything was a conspiracy woven with lies and betrayal. At that moment, love turned into hatred, and she vowed revenge. At the edge of despair, the one she reached out to was the duke feared as the “Emperor’s Dog”—Lexion Rosenbester—ruthless and merciless, known for crushing any who opposed imperial authority. The coldest and most dangerous man in the world. The conditions he set to aid her were only two: First, completely abandon that worthless man. And second—. Thus began the dangerous contract between the two. Yet, there is no hesitation. Sereniel’s second life had begun solely for revenge.
a6e593ba-cfab-4bd9-84a6-7a4c31b8c310:
She is a genius in all fields of magic, swordsmanship, alchemy, domestic affairs, music, painting, and novels?! She was able to do anything. However, she always tried not to be selfish, and decided to run away from home...! She is now an adventurer in a new world due to a chance encounter. Liliane unknowingly demonstrates all her talents...?!

7607d097-cc73-48a4-93d8-9bf9c7aa71fb: A hero emerges from childhood cruelly and incomprehensibly maimed. He travels in search of a way to heal his wound, inflicted by his own father. The father intended thereby to seal a sinister pact with dark forces, which would ever after lie in wait along the son's path. The hero rides astride a trustworthy and magical mount and provides from the aid of a god.
b641f58f-cd09-433b-816f-dd0f75bd2f40: Noah Oukrate, the S-Rank Adventurer known as the Thunder Emperor. As instructed by his master, the witch Sherah, he gets enrolled into a magic academy. There, he meets the daughter of the Duke, Claris, and the son of a fallen noble's house, Arthur. While working hard together with his classmates such as the A-Ranked adventurer Claris, he continues to be unrivaled at the magic academy with his thunder magic by his side!
d33c8bbf-9633-4de4-b75a-06501e087971: Inhan Kang, a happy-go-lucky librarian, one day receives bad news, that he has cancer. So he starts trying to get medical treatment, when that doesn't work, he starts praying, when that doesn't work, he turns to Chi/Ki techniques. His last try actually works, and his cancer starts stagnating, he continues doing it, until one day, when he gets transported to another world. There he has to start learning how to survive.
e03b00ca-a497-40a3-8f79-a48887c8843b: In the wake of the apocalyptic Red Mist, Caleb O’Dea’s world is reduced to two truths: his family is dead, and his sister is missing. His quest for vengeance and answers leads him to the front lines of humanity’s final stand. But Caleb is a living weapon, harboring a power born of the same source as the invading horrors. To fight them, he must become like them—devouring beasts to steal their abilities, evolving into a stronger, more monstrous version of himself with every battle. This is his sacrifice. Every step toward salvation is a step into the abyss. In a world where evolution is the only law, Caleb must choose: cling to his fading humanity, or embrace the beast within to become the strongest survivor of the end times.

57bdb07c-9338-4d80-a1e3-8eed6238ada4:
This book is a comicalized work of "Cyborg 009" televised in 1979. At the time, it was serialized in "TV-kun" (Shogakukan), and many fans wanted to make it into a book, and it was long considered a "legend".
This is the first time it has been published as a book, and it is an orthodox comicalized work that relatively follows the story of the 1979 anime. The artist Sugar Sato is still active as a successor to Shotaro Ishinomori. This work is drawn closer to the anime characters than the Ishinomori touch, and it is a little different from the original, and the content is satisfying to the fans.
ccb654fd-d4de-44d1-a9c1-f58ba34f3510:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

What if Petunia married a biochemist, and Harry grew up reading science and science fiction? Manga-style adaptation of the popular fan fiction by E.Yudkowsky: "Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality". Read left to right.

The original fanfic is complete at https://hpmor.com'

From the author Eliezer Yudkowsky:
This is not a strict single-point-of-departure fic - there exists a primary point of departure, at some point in the past, but also other alterations. The best term I've heard for this fic is "parallel universe".

The text contains many clues: obvious clues, not-so-obvious clues, truly obscure hints which I was shocked to see some readers successfully decode, and massive evidence left out in plain sight. This is a rationalist story; its mysteries are solvable, and meant to be solved.

All science mentioned is real science. But please keep in mind that, beyond the realm of science, the views of the characters may not be those of the author. Not everything the protagonist does is a lesson in wisdom, and advice offered by darker characters may be untrustworthy or dangerously double-edged.

1be9a5a0-d3c2-4ecc-87b4-3fa60133d5b1: Shigure Konno is getting bullied in class. One day, however, she leaves her physical body and is able to enter the world of spirit. Shigure can now look inside people's minds, discover their innermost secrets and even manipulate them.... When the seeds of trouble sown in the hearts of good citizens blossom, bizarre incidents will happen... "Six Consciousnesses Thought Changing Ataraxia" marked Kago's third version of the concept of a girl entering a cyberspace-like psychic realm wherein she can "hack" people.  He first utilized it in "Soul Diver Saga: Nirvana" (1992), only three chapters of which were published before the magazine serializing it (Bandai's Cyber Comix) stopped publication. In 1995, Kago published a much less sexually explicit one-shot simply titled "ataraxia" in Young Jump (later collected in "Hannya Haramita") before this expanded and much kinkier version followed in 2000/2001. Additionally, various characters from this manga appear in other stories by Kago, some of them collected in "Super-Dimensional Love Gun".

b75d4713-71e2-4f47-ac8e-1973327fd276: Howard(Chen Xu), the lowly office employee, is stuck at the bottom of the corporate ladder until a chance encounter with the mimic dream system changes his life! 932158c8-1f78-4f8d-be23-b205c479fe80:
Honjou Kaede wurde so lange von ihrer besten Freundin Shiromine Risa dazu überredet, mit dem brandneuen VRMMO "New World Online" anzufangen, dass sie es eines Tages sogar wirklich getan hat. Doch sie steht nun vor einem Problem: Sie ist keine Gamerin und hat überhaupt keine Ahnung von Videospielen. Sie weiß nur eines: Dass sie Schmerzen nicht mag. Und da sie Schmerzen nicht mag, entschließt sie sich dazu, all ihre Statpunkte in Verteidigung zu stecken.

Ergibt Sinn, oder? Sie will ja schließlich nicht verletzt werden! Doch funktionieren Videospiele wirklich so einfach? Und was passiert nun, wenn ihre unkonventionelle Logik auf mehr oder weniger konventionelle Spielmechaniken trifft?

Wie werden das Spiel und die anderen Spieler auf einen Charakter reagieren, der keinen Schaden nehmen kann?

With the rise of a popular RPG called Tianyong Game, its max-level players called "awakeners" have come to dominate the real world in terms of wealth and power. 

Despite Ling Ce's natural talent for the game, it's nearly impossible for him to catch up to these players because he started playing the game a year after its release.
