9fd23805-7571-4f09-baff-89d059fba8f9: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.
a41dbf1a-bd90-4de9-9d8e-9e0a4621263e:
Alba Thomas, an S-rank gatherer who travels across the land in search of precious items such as dragon horns and golem cores, one day discovers a school-bag-wearing girl inside a treasure chest.
The girl, who calls herself Nono, is still young and doesn’t know where she came from.
And to complicate matters, under the kingdom’s rules Alba and Nono are no longer able to leave the dungeon.
Unable to simply leave her in such a dangerous place, Alba decides to take Nono under his protection.
However, meals prove to be a struggle: while Alba can easily procure ingredients, he is utterly inexperienced when it comes to cooking.
Stepping in to help is Nono, who displays genuine talent in the kitchen.
Thus begins a journey between Alba, one of the seven S-rank gatherers in the kingdom. And Nono, the mysterious girl full of unknowns.
f1311d54-99bc-49ed-b12f-099b9a40c104:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)
ced1a3f9-9a34-4ada-a3b7-ca773e5af0b8:
Akira, a young yakitori shop owner, has fallen in love with Houka, a bunny girl who often eats at his restaurant. But how can he get close to her when he has to focus on the grill‽ And there are 4 other bunny girls that look just like her‽

**Note:** “Piccolina” is short for “Picco di Stellina”, which means “Starlet Peak” or “Peak of the Starlet” in Italian.
ec30192e-87df-47da-bfda-cc9a282bc51c:
Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo.
___
**Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.

The series resumed its publication in December 2023.
a2082074-8e7b-43bc-ac85-de7d995552c5:
High school boy Towa lives with his father Takaaki, a truck driver, in a working-class neighborhood in the Kansai region. They eat well, but don't like to cook elaborate meals. So what's on the dinner table today? 

An old, small apartment, a warm meal, and casual conversation. They thought it was just an ordinary house you could find anywhere, but...!? 

A heartwarming dining tale about a single father and a high school boy!
f40eeb3a-c3a8-404d-a067-ca1831e60088:
Kamiina Botan is a 20-year-old college student. At the welcome party for the dorm she was assigned to, the dorm leader Ibuki gives her a highball to drink and she becomes tipsy, leading to her involvement with Ibuki from now on...
___
Official Manga Twitter: [@Kamiina Botan](https://twitter.com/kamiinabotan)
f9b82990-7198-4131-84bb-c952830f5ea7: Aldred, the leader of a kingdom's A-ranked party, Black Silver, has accomplished the task of slaying a dragon. However, he who has pursued strength his whole life has lost sight of his goal from taking down a monster of the strongest species. As he worried about what to do next in his life, it was the scenery of Nordende that popped up in his mind; A rural village by the countryside, full of natural beauty, which he only visited once during a quest in the past. After declaring the disbandment of his party, he heads towards Nordende for a comfortable, relaxing life.
8282b342-77df-4683-a903-bfc1472d55ac: Kang Sunghoon, the youngest member of a 4 star hotel kitchen in Korea, has the ability to memorise different kinds of ingredients. However, as the youngest, he's still unable to escape dishwashing duty.
275c3ee8-bdeb-4070-a333-6add23a8415a: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there...
bdedd1a8-a0e7-403f-8d64-10d845abaef7: The classmate she's crushing on is secretly a butler at a butler cafe?! To win him over, Bang Gowoon is serving up desserts at 999% sweetness in her all-out effort to capture his heart. A sweet and fluffy romantic comedy about fresh love and even fresher desserts.
45ed7ed8-23b3-45bf-9b9c-da6e9e88f747: Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They're dismayed to see he's useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself. His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!
c1308a5b-2e2a-47e6-ac4b-0a72b3ceb97b: Gaku Kitada is a prodigy in Mathematics and a scholarship holder at Wels Private Academy, a renowned institution with a long history in the International Mathematical Olympiad. After a series of unfortunate events, he meets Kai Asakura, a culinarian prodigy with his own catering business. What does the future hold for these two geniuses, and how do their paths intertwine with each other's?
b675f776-0acb-48ec-b86c-595cf757d8cb:
Japanese sweets save a debt-ridden elf!

Alice, an elf, runs a confectionery shop in the forest of Auin to pay off the debt left by her parents.
One day, however, when she is worried that her sweets are not selling, she suddenly falls into the "Fountain of Wishes.
When she opens her eyes, she finds herself in a strange world...
881a805b-0c5f-44d0-a2c0-118ea0c8ba88: Risa Ito, who considers herself an urban manga artist, actually grew up deep in the mountains! Food, vehicles, events, dialects, customs, Jomon pottery... The strongest Deep Japan is here! A heart-wrenching autobiographical comic brought to you by “Native Countryside” Risa!
9a65ebd1-2f0f-48a7-9210-37b453152204:
“School is a bit suffocating.”
16-year-old high school girl Yonagi Fuji lives and sleeps in her car, but only in the backyard of her house because she doesn't have a driver's license. She wants to sleep in her car wherever she likes. Then, she meets a cheery girl from the same school who has a driver's license, Ichinose Asahi?

A story that, if you read it, you'll definitely want to sleep in your car!? The curtain opens on a new and exciting high school girl × car-sleeping hobby life manga!!
bb26ba2a-6197-4ddf-be83-74b7043bfb08:
High school student Kudo Akira is a man who can travel between Japan and another world called Do Merta. All he wants is a carefree, leisurely life in an isekai world!

From conquering labyrinths, exploring gourmet food and all sorts of other spicy "teehee" moments (and not the food kind)!! Trying to live the life he's always dreamed of! The story of a laid-back, infinite adventure begins!
db90d832-59a6-4f1a-97cc-84226bdd5d12: In their daily lives, as well as their special moments, Uma Musume enjoy eating "tasty dishes"♪
02ecca56-3f78-4ae1-9d57-da17e0bb1429:
Rebuild a rundown restaurant in another world!?

Sorano, a high school girl, is transported to another world where flying sailing ships come and go. In order to repay the kindness of the beast couple who helped her, she uses her natural vitality to try to improve the business!
1515d3bb-f8d3-4154-9423-e15f9e3088be:
Satomi Oka moved to Tokyo from Osaka when he entered university. On his way home from a new year's party, he stops by a family restaurant and starts a part-time job...

---
- The MC is Satomi Oka, from author's previous work, [Let's Go Karaoke!](https://mangadex.org/title/212e9236-c0e3-4e85-ae92-087495820251)
c27f1f09-0733-492b-ae8d-7b09a6cbc265:
Hiroshi Hatakeyama is a salesman who travels around Japan on business trips. He is in charge of training a new female employee, Tamaki Kaibara. He is thrown off by Kaibara’s unexpected behavior as a die-hard muscle-training maniac, but during their business trips together, the two also manage to have a good time... or do they?

Join this unique gourmet journey where a quirky duo enjoys delicious and nutritious local foods!
fd9caf16-9b4b-452b-b753-3d9bd1269fe4:
Rina was summoned to another world to be the Saint, but was surprised at how bad the food tasted. It tastes like this even at the royal palace...? I'll just make it myself, so give me your kitchen! Relieved of her Saint duties, Rina wins the heart and stomachs of the nobles through her food!
___
* Alternative raw: [Nicovideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44992)
3a1c1aa8-de86-498a-9c6f-87ad80640857:
A manga that revolves around an old-fashioned all-night food stall, the various dishes that the stall owner prepares to suit the tastes of different customers, and the joys, griefs, trials and tribulations of his faithful patrons.  
  
- Nominated for the 2nd Manga Taisho Award (2009)  
- Winner of the 39th Japan Cartoonist Awards Grand Prize (2010)
b7875551-1862-4999-a59a-235e7ed7d61e:
Jin is an adventurer so overwhelmingly strong that he can cut down a three-headed dragon with a single slash! Though he craves more power, he fears that becoming any stronger would turn him into a monster... so he retires from adventuring and returns to his hometown café, in Dagar! However, in the mountains behind his family home lies a dungeon said to grant one’s deepest desires...?!

Together with Shuna, a runaway saint who suddenly barges into his life, the power-hungry former adventurer sets out to conquer the dangerous, monster-filled dungeon! And after the battles, they savor exquisite dungeon cuisine made from the monsters they defeat—?!
9036a7e6-690d-4ba9-ab57-65ee12185a32:
"This pounding in my chest is more than just admiration!?"
Tomoya Ishida is a newbie editor at fashion magazine Sophia Monthly. After his senior's sudden hospitalization, he's hastily assigned to collect a column manuscript from the famous culinary researcher Ayumu Mitsuya. He pays him a visit soon after, and to his surprise, finds an affable, older man who speaks in a Kyoto dialect. Being asked to wait, Tomoya is served a simple dish that entices his stomach, and soon he finds himself eagerly awaiting their next encounter!
b3a9c1f8-93d2-49ba-96e2-84727c1031a6:
One day, a dull young man from Japan gets caught up in a heroic summoning and goes to another world. The next time he wakes up, he's not in a castle with a king, but in a deep forest since the summoning failed! You'd think he'd be at a loss, but he starts living a life of survival with a positive attitude that doesn't involve deep thought! Then, before he knows it, he saves the cursed forest and magical beasts one after another with his magical powers, and is befriended by wolves and dogs in a healing paradise! However, he doesn't realize that they are actually legendary demonic beasts and spirits at all. What's more, that they are adored!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/flung-into-a-new-world-time-to-lift-the-200-year-curse)
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0223eu/) (Japanese)
62608082-d81d-4513-af7d-ae3ffe2423d2:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe.
___
* **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.
885cf56f-d030-4e21-a1f0-6c51c2c83c22: Meals are just a normal thing, but they're special when shared! In a society of beastmen, Momo is a 'human-like' girl with animal ears. The wolf beastman Wasuke, who ends up taking care of Momo, decides to challenge himself by cooking delicious meals for her! A fluffy heartarming story about how this animal eared girl and her doting beastman caretaker become "family".
5c3e27c4-2ff1-4b66-968e-8b813653192e: Main protagonist is Tsurumi Asuta. 17 yrs old, 2nd year high schooler. He was working as an apprentice cook at Tsurumi-ya, managed by his father. One day a fire broke out in Tsurumi-ya, for the sake of his father's cherished knife 'Santoku Houchou' he ran back inside to retrieve it and thus met his end. Before he knew it he awoke to an unknown environment. He was then attacked by a beast resembling a boar but a girl named Aifa, from the People of Morihen, saved him. It was then that he realized he was really in different world.
bb0ec1d7-2606-4ff6-9e6e-a4a87901d85f:
Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He's also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox... It's time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!

(from Manga Helpers):

Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it. His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother.

With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story.
___
- **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**
af7cc594-4f6a-4c0a-8f74-16748910dee5:
Shirayuki, a young girl born with unique apple-red hair, happens to meet a famous but foolish young man, Prince Raji. He falls in love with Shirayuki at first sight, and orders her to become his concubine.  
  
Determined to do whatever it takes to resist his advances, but with nowhere else to go, Shirayuki cuts her hair and escapes to a neighboring country. While traversing through the forests, she meets an injured boy, Zen. After she boldly heals his wounds, he in return helps her. Meanwhile, Prince Raji sends out his henchmen to search for her.  
  
What will become of Shirayuki? What is Zen’s true character? A refreshing fantasy story between an optimistic heroine and a prince who constantly stays on her watch.  
  
**Extra stories:**  
v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (Four-season Colour of August)  
v02 - Bokura o Tsunaide. (Bind Us)  
v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 Day of Summer Holiday)
19b4e4dd-f845-4d5b-b3f7-1a51fbf12e16:
The office lady who decided she wouldn't eat too much no matter how hungry she is, Hikami Runa. The high school girl who eats whenever she feels like it regardless of the time or place, Koizumi Ichika. Runa's restraint means she won't make any compromises when it comes to eating delicious things. Ichika isn't fussy when it comes to eating and doesn't know anything about ways to make things tastier.
When these two eat together, it becomes an "obsecene meal"!
8cd2efcd-d8b0-491d-a992-10529d1e2e40:
Suddenly summoned to another world, former office lady Fukuyose Mahiru becomes a lunchlady in order to cover her living expenses, as well as gather information. Then one day, she gets her hopes up when she hears a rumor that the genius Magician Randy may hold a hint to help return her to her original world——.  
  
"To find the practitioner than summoned you here, we must uncover the motives behind it."  
  
Things become messy after it's determined Mahiru holds a great amount of magical power, and must therefore cohabitate with Randy?! And on top of that, he finds eating to be too troublesome, making him the ultimate picky eater——!  


---

[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8472ex/)  
[Original Light Novel](https://bookwalker.jp/series/202048/)
a92fcfb2-27b7-476f-a9d5-4cd557ae39c0: A spin-off of the series TONDEMO SKILL DE ISEKAI HOUROU MESHI told from Sui's perspective.
031e6262-87ef-4c53-b58b-25e2067569af: Marquis' daughter, Charlotte, was blessed with a [Gift] known as [Monster Eater], which allows her to deliciously consume monsters. However, she was exiled from her real family because "eating monsters is vulgar!" Thus, she embarks on a journey of adventure. And so, she reaches the pinnacle as the strongest existence...!!
13f6d003-505c-4bca-829a-f74d43a2904f: All we have left to do is eat.
c26269c7-0f5d-4966-8cd5-b79acb86fb7a:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
615123b3-b813-4d7d-8c72-eb5c4146d76e: Satou Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss and known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance. Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady. Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls find out about each other!?
22228a24-2dcc-4195-a5d8-357dd4a311f0: The daily life of five girls who just became university students. They love delicious food, want to have lots of fun with everyone, and study a little harder to enjoy university life to the fullest!
596e14bb-a7eb-4aad-8a0e-8ecc854fd4a8:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction! A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

Based on the short animations on Youtube. 
- [Official YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@parako)
- [Official Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/parako_official)
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Jump)](https://ynjn.jp/title/11987)
feffced2-b922-45fc-80c3-c561d643faa4:
Do you know what a shaman is?　It's said that they have the mysterious ability to connect this world with the other world and communicate with gods, spirits, and spirits of the dead. The third generation shaman, Anna, a.k.a. Aluminum Nium Birch, is searching for a super class spirit to win the proxy war of the gods. The story intersects as the beautiful stars gather in Nagano, followed by Aluminum, Death Zero, and Hana.

___
*Continuing after the events of Shaman King Flowers, the group of "Super Stars" will join together and spin together a new legend…*
  
**Officially licensed:**  
- In Taiwan by [Tongli](https://www.tongli.com.tw/BooksDetail.aspx?Bd=KD1554001) as "通靈童子THE SUPER STAR"  
- In Thailand by Siam Inter Comics
6e4e7b85-185d-4c68-8b07-b0454d9bc86a:
This is the story of Shizuka, a beautiful young lady, and Yarisu, her overboard companion. 
The two of them get hired to work as hot spring companions, entertaining customers and keeping them company, 
with absolutely no sex involved. Or almost.
ccf6d296-4d59-4d2b-9103-b7c1ed7b5768: Some kind of global catastrophe results in magic working. So now there are wizards, rangers (shape changers), and elf looking people. A remotely posted squad must fight mercenaries equipped with sci-fi technology and magic to find their missing commander.
2ea1f529-95db-42ab-9c00-d161cf8c8e28: Uemura Takitarou is a Genius Cosplayer who can change himself from head to toe. One day, he finds his only friend, Asami Kusaka, killed by the Night Blindness Man, a serial murderer who gouges out the eyes of his victims. Tominaga Hana, a model, discovers his talent and recruits him for the company, UC, an office that solves mysteries and crimes by manipulating rumors/urban legends. Can Uemura track down the person who killed Kusaka?
8787958d-a3f1-4d48-8220-fad148c7c28e:
First published in 2011, in Gangan Online. Oneshot.  
  
Death gods like Yuka have no memories of their past.  
But one day, Yuka meets Kanna, a sick girl who might know something about his lost memories.  
However, a demon’s been eating souls lately… and Kanna’s the next victim!
5f397c12-c83e-4c59-8ab8-33634c1cd2eb: Asagi is an exorcist with a tragic past. One day, an encounter with a certain ayakashi causes him to recall that tragic past.
91e8d9ad-56c9-440d-ba8b-7a9a79f8ebd5: Rumours about a werewolf appearing on nights when there is a full moon quickly spread through Bato’s school. Bato suspects that his strange roommate, Kadirael is the werewolf, but Bato gets an even bigger surprise when he confronts Kadirael about his true identity.
30d429f9-7850-4074-9eb2-b0e6875d02f5: A young girl called Ene is searching for her parents’ killer, Estoma. Her search leads her to a strange gravedigger called Mal, who she works with to find out a way to kill the immortal Estoma.
dae4fe08-40b7-4f00-9f38-796cc688e82f:
People have been missing , and they had not been seen after 6 o’clock in the evening.  
The police only manage to find their bodies the following day.  
Rumors say that these people might’ve been “spirited away”.Shintarou Asahina’s classmates decide to catch the person behind this. But Shintarou doesn’t want to be involved anymore… especially after what happened two years ago. It left him nothing but regret.  
On his way home one day, he hears noises near the shrine territory. And the clock has stroked 6.  
Afterwards, Shintarou encounters his classmate, Natsume Hirasaka, who is in the middle of fighting against a monster. A god. As a priest, it is Natsume’s duty to send back the gods who plan to bring chaos to the human world.Natsume told Shintarou to run away. And running away Shintarou did.  
If he just pretends not to notice anything, things will be just like usual by tomorrow.  
But….
6ed1b9d2-0482-4bfd-af52-790dd340a137: For some reason, the sadistic demon prince Beelzebub is living in the human world and attending high school. He begins a strange friendship with his classmate Hanako, after she defends him when he gets beaten up by a gang.
cd33cbc2-b4cd-4a6a-80a3-52139076c816: Tobei, a ruthless punk from feudal Japan, has been damned to hell for the past 300 years. Given a chance for redemption, he's sent to the modern world to vanquish 108 malevolent spirits in 108 days. Will the baffling ways of the present prove to be an even greater foe than the sinister fiends he must defeat? Tobei is about to go medieval on the 21st century!
8b1d7f2f-2c4c-4047-a394-6d5cbc56271a:
A series of short stories detailing the exploits of Dr Imibe Kana, a researcher on Japanese mythology and religion, 
as she travels around the country becoming involved in various occurrences centred around ancient folk traditions.
14bc9c44-299e-4c90-80a2-43748096f3fb: Is the unachievable the best thing? Shouldn't the present happiness be treasured the most? A broken vase cannot be fixed, chasing after a past that does not exist will only bring a deeper pain to oneself and others. A vampire's love and hatred will be displayed here, in their fullest…
06f2469a-b19c-4e22-9efd-9078fe2e58e8: An ordinary highschool girl, Lin Seonu, who is actually a woman saint holding the 'Jade of Bango', the power of ancient times, however she does not recognize that she is a woman saint. On her seventeenth birthday, she can obtain special eyesight seeing the ghosts and she goes to school every morning with the harmless and lovely ghosts. One day, however, she has an abnormal dream, and that evening, she encounters a terrible evil spirit. She is shivering in horror, but in the very nick of time a handsome man she had seen in a dream appears to rescue her and he frees the ridiculous power that had been concealed in Lin. His name is In Mu, who says to her that he is her fiance.
52a98cde-a013-40d0-9ee8-954303454f36: After souls die, corpses still keep their hearts. Both protagonists Katasaki Yuu and Watagiri Shaberu can see those corpses whose human hearts have died. Two lonely and special people encounter each other. They are determined to rescue the people who left their soul's corpses behind and alleviate their soul's pain. This is a moving work that soothes the spiritual wounds!
13f5054b-045d-48fe-bc5b-fe146c4c9733: At her grandmothers funeral 5 years ago Touno Mariko saw her grandmothers ghost. Ever since then she has been able to see ghosts. One day when visiting her grandmother she accidentally angers an old spirit and is saved by Takenaka Masato. Masato works for a spirit travel agency, which is exactly what it sounds like. As fate would have it Mariko now has to work for this agency to pay off her debt to the angered spirit.
79cf7ca0-eb89-447a-a56d-ef493426aa2d:
This story takes place during the civil war in Japan. There is a mysterious boy with a short horn on his forehead. His life turns upside down after he saves a wanted female ninja, who then tells him that she's his servant and he is an emperor!  
  
Soon a few more girls appear in his life and the adventure begins. What will happen to him and what kind of weird and wonderful stories lie in front of the small group is for you to find out.
51cf8887-e776-4f96-8978-9a74e7e61535:
Jin Araki, a very dense student whose parents are archeologists, finds a lamp in a package they sent him. 
When he casually polishes it the academy idol Sierra Zadou abruptly appears dressed in a maid outfit!
This is just the start of a "comical" nightmare for the both of them...
d1b05488-32d2-44c3-98de-e301d770f314: A boy with the power to create the strongest **weapon** meets a girl who must take his **sword** in her hands to save the world.
6650ebb9-391a-458f-a85a-28e1dc41d48a: Though it was a bit strange, three people ended up meeting. One, who looks younger than her age and able to see the supernatural. Another who is possessed by a "Yamanko" which refers to "Yama no ko", or a mountain child. She was possessed due to her bloodline and due to the possession, she has superhuman abilities which she can call upon. Finally, an awkward person who enjoys writing poems. Coincidentally, the three are also classmates.
4e07b37d-2c6d-4532-92c2-88b95a102f4b: Park Nada is an average student that dreams of drawing her own pure Love Manwha and plans to draw manwha quietly while keeping to herself until graduation. Her plan falls to crumbles when she unknowingly enrolls into Bansa High; a infamous school filled with delinquents and terrifying teachers. But not all is lost as two of the most popular and beautiful boys of Bansa High become interested in her. Join Park Nada as she tries to survive high school and her own real life Love Manwha.
3fcf213c-df1c-4778-b7ee-49658e355ca3:
In a far place in a far country there’s a mansion where a demon girl lives.  
  
One day there was a huge storm outside so in order to protect himself from the storm a mysterious boy named Adam enters the mansion. And so they meet… the little demon girl and the mysterious boy that looks like a shinigami, both outcasts in the human world, decide to create a school for monsters together!
684d282e-5422-49ea-ac5d-3e7b4190a924: Shinohara Sumi is stuck taking supplementary lessons in the heat of summer. Her situation immediately changes when a mysterious boy named Yoshino Mitsuru jumps into the classroom through the second story window. He spends each day helping her with her lessons, and her feelings for him begin to grow. But things may not be all that they seem as she begins seeking the reasons for the loneliness in his eyes…
f17675da-3d3a-48b2-910c-f7a1ab38d4bf: Sayo has always wanted to be a spirit messenger, and at last she's assigned to a position at a shrine. However, when she arrives she finds only ruins and a lazy priest. But Sayo won't let these obstacles deter her! She'll clean that shrine up and the priest with it!
498e95c9-292f-4c19-994d-7281b2253a02: Yadorigi Saori, age sixteen. For this girl, who has peered through the cracks in the world, the "malice" swooping down on her is–?
f4167532-a9e6-43c1-90e5-fe924f964bb1: An alternate take on Mahou Sensei Negima! In this universe, Negi and co. still have their teacher/student relationship, but Negi's an adult and the rest are kindergarten students! (enjoy the cuteness)
7ccb57f8-b5ad-4046-b34f-f00510789e76: Having given a magical Tengu mask to a human boy when she was little, Tengu princess Arazunaya Jirou is told by her father to go get it back. Nariyuki (the boy), now a high-schooler, doesn't want to give it back. Slapstick comedy ensues.
28a8bd96-d2ae-470f-bd96-e90a0f0fd5ae:
In the rural and peaceful Belzenia-Asmodin Empire, women of all ranks, ages, and marital statuses have begun disappearing one after the other. All they have in common is that they are both beautiful and reputable. Where have the women disappeared to - and who will be targeted next?  
  
Based on the original Vocaloid song "Venomania Kou no Kyouki" (The Madness of Duke Venomania) by Akuno-P (mothy).
f0492315-9aa6-4dff-9767-1faaae896567:
It is the Meiji era. Yui is completely bewildered by her sudden transfer to Kaede Juku, a prestigious girls' school. At that time, Yuu, the daughter of a large enterprise, appears before Yui.  
  
Yui and Yuu's friendship immediately deepens. Although it seems as if they will spend time together peacefully, Yuu appears to have a mysterious air about her somewhere…
7fa1731d-552e-45c1-ae58-4c37248d4083: A gag one-shot by the author of Toriko about the lives of the bizarre race of gods, the Gods of Laughter.
4cab05b6-b997-4278-8d41-320a87a8742d:
Thirteen years ago a disaster occurred. Out of nowhere, a meteorite fell from the sky, and that's when everything started. First of all, there is said to be numerous people who vanished when the meteorite fell. Afterwards, according to certain reports, this was known as "spirited away".  
  
At the same time, strange things happened. The sky filled with clouds, and a red mist shrouded the streets. And those terrible monsters had started to appear. A monster, in other words, a slave beast, one who has sold his soul to the evil king.  
  
However, we must not despair, they have returned from the depths of the red hell, and in order to defeat the impending disaster they carry with them a gift in their hands.  
  
"They have returned, the ones who posses the flash have returned to tear apart the fear."
a547b5fd-5c09-4f41-9342-4ee0718d43e9:
A box that grants three wishes might seem like a dream come true.  
At least that's what Keita thought, but inside the box he finds a girl. And this girl is no genie–Maki's a devil princess, and she's come to take Keita's soul! But she can only take his soul after he makes his third wish.  
So, as a sheltered demon with little knowledge of how to be evil, Maki must rely on her trusty guidebook to teach herself the ways of the nefarious arts and trick Keita into using up his wishes. Until then, Maki's going to live with Keita until he can't stand living anymore.
5e95b8c4-76e7-4aa6-a94b-46f69ff22054:
A series of seven stories revolving around lives where fantasy intertwines with our known worlds. In historical and modern landscapes, there are unique circumstances brought about by dragons, mermaids, spirits, and so on. Nominated for the 2013 Manga Taisho Awards.  
  
1. Ryuu no Shoutou (竜の小塔)  
2. Ningyo Kinryoku (人魚禁漁区)  
3. Watashi no Kami-sama (わたしのかみさま)  
4. Ookami wa Uso wo Tsukanai (狼は嘘をつかない)  
5. Kanenashi Hakuroku (金なし白祿)  
6. Ko ga Kawaii to Ryuu wa Naku (子がかわいいと竜は鳴く)  
7. Inutanike no Hitobito (犬谷家の人々)
e0029e2e-62e4-4bfc-8342-2110591812a5: Most of humanity has been wiped out by mysterious dark monsters known only as "Phantoms." Four survivors, who may well be the last of the human race, have found one another and are sharing a quiet, peaceful existence. These survivors are a kind, dependable teenage boy called Masashi, two teenage girls, shyer Sanae and bolder Yaeko, and a little girl called Anna. They feel as though they're just living in a perpetual "after school" state, waiting for the rest of the human race to come home.
107d49df-4bf1-4d92-9713-5f01a74f3e6a: Otoya, a student at a prestigious music high school, can't stand classical music. Why would he, when rock is so much cooler in every way? It's got beat, drums, speed, everything that classical just doesn't have. But what if listening to classical music could summon beings from an alternate dimension to do battle? Not so boring now, is it?
b4cac0d9-5f6e-4e2b-afd2-c8dc30f0063c: Circa, who had always failed in his summoning classes, accidentally summoned… Bisnuth, the king of fire! Bisnuth, who was angry at being summoned suddenly, and the clueless circa who got enamoured with him… this is a couple's love story which is thicker than blood and hotter than fire.
a9b8c5ae-b534-45a9-9ef1-bdec077cce70: After losing his memories in a traffic accident 3 years ago, Haru is now living with Kiriyuu, his saviour and legal guardian. But after a school trip where he and his friends wander in an ancient lab, Haru discovers that there might be more to his lost memories than he thought.
665443b6-d6a4-4e9b-9556-16b9b0ae1b6c:
The office of the Time Eliminator offers a unique service, the ability to eliminate an event that happened in the past. Rex, the man with the power to travel through time, may look young, but he's a professional. He goes back in time well-prepared, with various gadgets and even an earpiece for communication with his support in the present. While Rex typically takes on cases for profit, he's also particularly looking for ones that might give him a chance to obtain a magical "Babylon Item".

-NOTE- This series is AXED, it has no ending whatsoever, read at your own risk.
4b099074-6afc-41fa-a1a5-8699bcc26332:
Oneshot.  
  
Mangaupdates:  
Mio is a girl with above normal hearing, which has affected her all her life, she can hear all the wars that are happening inside her country. But when Rico, a girl with a 3 minute memory span, comes to save her and her country, Mio knows what she must do.
9a8421be-9420-44f6-b8db-accd11107a12: With Japan in a desperate situation, 13 "devil survivors" cut deals with devils to obtain abilities that let them fight against unknown invaders. With only 7 days left until a world catastrophe, they must make crucial decisions to survive…
3b943939-acf8-415f-853a-824b8f50fcc6: Kidnapped and stuffed into a trunk by an unknown assailant, teenager Kazumi bursts forth from the confines of the case to discover that she has been stripped not only of her clothes, but also of the memories of her life before the kidnapping. When she is recovered by a pair of schoolgirls, she doesn't recognize them as her best friends and roommates, Umika and Kaoru. As Kazumi tries to settle back into her normal life, she quickly realizes that her former "normal" was anything but! [Yen Press]
e7700625-827b-482a-a668-ce3bc5229006:
In a Tokyo of the not-too-distant future a young girl looks up to the stars with melancholy in her heart and hope in her eyes. Thirteen-year-old Asumi Kamogawa’s life has been tied to those stars; her future may very well be among them. And she is not alone… Asumi is one of many young people with ambitions to some day head off to space for Japan’s first manned mission.  
  
Before liftoff, like any true astronaut she must show the right stuff and overcome odds to pass numerous physical and mental trials if she even wants to be considered in the running for a rare spot in the elite Tokyo Space School.
9743f3f6-b905-4812-9990-c2fe85376fa0:
Iwakura Kazumi is currently down on his luck after his company goes down. While trying to rebuild his business and in need of a place to stay, he takes up the caretaker position at the Maneki Neko Jinja, a small shrine built by his great-grandmother in honor of cats.   
  
But he soon finds out that he has to share the space with someone–or something: three bakeneko who have been living there for a long time, and who seem to know his great-grandmother. Now he has to learn how to deal not only with the three cats, but also with the people who come and go to the shrine.
94c2372b-c8f6-4d0a-9d74-39ce34ed4e1c:
Collection of Toume Kei's oneshot work from 2011-2016.   
  
1. ELEMENT 7  
2. コビト事情 (Fairy Affairs)  
3. Apartment of the Dead  
4. 夕闇古書市 (The Twilight Antique Book Market)  
5. 天国のドア (Heaven's Door)  
6. 青密花 (Blue Secret Flower)
d44b35d3-1074-47c9-8b89-6395c2d23507: Hikari is a new shinigami (god of death) at Yomi Castle and is doing her best every day to get used to her onerous duties. Her duties are to manage and fulfill the destinies of humans. The only thing that keeps her going is the kindness of her superior, Commander Ryouma. The akashic records that list human destinies are stored under tight security in the castle. But, when a disastrous event happens among the shinigami, everything changes…
b42f0cd0-e85a-447b-ae65-e3f7592826fa: Murai Masahiko (16) has a fetish for the smell lingering around a scumbag in his class. One day, a beautiful girl named Mizusawa Haruka transfers into his class, but when they start dating he spills the truth: "Mizusawa Haruka died 5 years ago…." Who the hell is she!? What are her intentions!? The heart pounding suspense horror Scumbag Loser begins!
dff019fc-4a9e-4637-b68c-6458c405c1e8:
1. Tsuki no Sabaku

Armageddon. The powerful weapon "Messiah" has ended the long war, leaving behind a barren wasteland. A boy wanders west, seeking the paradise that lies at the edge of the world. The man who created the weapon runs from those who would use him. Scattered by the winds of destruction, they meet, part ways, and then meet once again.

2. I'm Not Fit to be a Detective

An incompetent detective, born loser, and die-hard pacifist...so why on earth is Yagi suddenly commissioned with the task of driving a stubborn young woman out of the home that she claims her recently deceased grandfather left for her in his soon-to-be-revealed last will?

3. Dream Dweller

A little boy who 'hates' his strict grandfather makes a new friend...

4. Snowflakes

The love between a boy and his half-sister, set against the backdrop of a Japan soon to be torn apart by WWII.
3f97f03b-20da-4fed-9c6b-f35b4699cbc5: Last year, Taichi nearly died on a snowy mountain, but was saved by his best friend, Shinobu. The only problem is that Taichi doesn't remember a thing about this so-called childhood friend of his! Assuming his memories will return, Taichi keeps this little secret to himself until, a year later, he suddenly finds himself with a much bigger secret. You see, Shinobu is more than he seems, and Taichi might not have actually survived that night on the snowy mountain!
872cfda3-13f8-43c7-ab01-5890e0da71b4:
What happens when your long-deceased older sister decides to pay you a visit because you're behaving too much like a freeter in high school? And what's more, she's become a golem to put you back on track?! Find out in this cute afterlife comedy.     
  
Note: Chapter 1 was also included as an extra at the end of [*Itoshi no Karin*](https://mangadex.org/manga/10300/itoshi-no-karin) vol. 1.
d5065166-27f0-47ce-b19f-71826da6608f: Jun and Kaoru are childhood friends with a secret everyone knows about…
af454a9c-5006-456b-b6f6-d23e8f84a8e7:
From Storm in Heaven:  
  
Kyou is the last of the Puppet Masters, with the power to defeat the Dark Demons that feed on negative emotions. He travels with his two guardian Light Spirits to rid the world of the Dark Demons, knowing that only then will time resume for him. Yet, overshadowing every victory lies the truth behind the slaughter of his clan and the fate of his best friend…
393d454c-fe68-4296-aa4c-7e121dae1e9c: Ned, an easy going, simple minded guy travels around the world in order to retrieve his scattered memory pieces, along with a short-tempered talking stuffed rabbit. However there are some people called "Chasers" who target Ned and constantly becoming obstacle for their mission. The thrilling chase begins, unraveling the many secrets of the world.
41074ec6-82a1-4c3e-9423-af61f00bbe76:
Some time before the June of summer. One day, she suddenly died…  
  
"I" and the corpse of the girl who should have died, "Makoto", spent those false summer days in that apartment.  
  
The relationship between these two sad, distorted people slowly becomes clearer…
4a96a49a-d942-4613-93e2-b023181d623c: Hanzaki Academy, an elite girls-only school which combine junior and senior high schools alike; In one dormitory resides Ibaraki Kyou, acting as the leader of said dorm despite her being a freshman. Transferred to the same school, the trouble student — Tsukumozaka Kuroe, how will they face the occult-like development to come?
27174389-bc10-43e7-b111-345f1ecb9d24: In reality, an ugly duckling could never become a beautiful swan. However, when a short ugly boy makes a wish to be reborn beautiful, his wish is granted and he becomes a gorgeous young man that all the girls fall for. Will being beautiful be everything that he hoped it would be?
4b768d9f-4c4b-4c04-8d0f-11dc744ac859: The story of Tachibana Reiji and Tachibana Ayaka continues.
cc6a5687-8b4e-4abb-9e6f-88027f922fca:
From Mohiro Kitoh, the author of Narutaru and Bokurano, comes this wonderful collection of short stories that reinforces his reputation as a skillful story teller. Spanning almost 20 years of the artist’s career—from his professional debut work Zansho to his latest contribution to IKKI magazine Pochi no Basho—this collected volume offers a unique view of Kitoh’s artistic development.  
  
Includes:  
1. Zansho - Summer Heat  
2. The Girl on the Pole at the Intersection on 3rd Street  
3. Bringing Flowers to Kasei Inn  
4. Soiled, Beautiful  
5. A & R  
6. Papa's Song  
7. Pochi's Place
7d98da47-53c6-47c9-9fd4-5bbb3e117291: Eun-Jo decides to commit group suicide, unable to cope with the burden when her daughter dies in an accident. However, she opens her eyes to the day before. She soon realizes that once midnight strikes, she is sent forty-eight hours backwards. How can she stop this? Eventually, she decides to continue reliving the past so that she can improve the life of her future self. But what happens when nothing she does has an impact on her future?
053876c4-5042-4536-a063-3da2e8b4a998: Fudou Jun (Devilman Lady) heads to St. Chapel School in order to track down a Devil Beast.
c42bb318-e908-45df-b50e-235cc78c2b7c: Fujisaki Cherry is a charming schoolgirl who loves to cosplay. However, it seems there is something more than what meets the eye..
37705e8b-c7d8-4639-a601-40084fdcb556: A demon exterminator that was sent there to the school by the secret organization known as "Ark, her crest reacted to the main character as someone compatible to become a fusion type fighter, one things leads to another and they battle an enemy, This is a one shot that never became a series.
39ec2e1e-63d7-4fdb-bf3d-ed838d80f21d:
Haizuka just wants to live a normal life, a peaceful life far away from all the trouble he's faced. But as soon as he starts highschool, an encounter with a girl and a strange creature destroys any hope of a peaceful life.  
  
Note: Was published in Monthly Jump SQ but then moved to Bi-monthly Jump SQ.19 in 2013
7b4709a0-34cd-472d-a069-d3858b0a1b07:
Reika Ryuzaki, daughter of the late diamond collector Yoshio Ryuzaki, is a jewel specialist who fights with knuckles branded as "Krishna" in cases involving bad guys who rob or misuse jewels for their own gains. She has an advantage in fighting as she can summon spirits from certain jewels to aid Reika in making her a better combatant in the field.

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/ADAMAS)
5a40f57d-0092-4d9f-b200-6e3940eb4137:
From saladesu:
A strange bunch of supernatural beings have moved in next door to Hanazawa Meoto. They call themselves "Godland Company," and they're gods/spirits/demons who perform odd jobs to help other supernatural beings like themselves when they get into any trouble with humans. There's little Kuroto the Karasu Tengu, Mia Blutheim the vampire, Neruru Hearteater the succubus, Shadric Kagel the shadow earl, and the mysterious Haizono. How will Meoto react to her new neighbours?
8a806d41-31f1-4660-b808-5be3ed08908e:
Anthology of author Mizu Asato:  
  
1. Kaerenai Futari  
On the day of graduation, I am asked out by the man whom I hate most…  
  
2. Family Restaurant no Juunin  
Original doujinshi with a story set in a family restaurant.  
  
3. Seifuku no Shita ni Aru Mahou  
Related to Mizu Asato's [anthology of magical sailor uniform school girls](https://mangadex.org/manga/26964/seifuku-mahou-kiina-chan).  
  
4. Taberu-bu  
A girl bullied at school runs into the student council president who has an infinite appetite, on the rooftop of school.  
  
5. Miyata Shoten ni Youkoso!  
Mako is a rookie part-timer at Miyata Bookstore. Her late worry is her superior, Takeo, who always looks angry and yells at her.  
  
6. Denki-Gai no Honya-san: Mikan BOOKS no Baai  
Extra episode of Denki-Gai no Honya-san
4a284387-b2d0-4b4f-babd-64101ab4404c:
G takes place at these points we call boundaries. Boundaries between times, dimensions, destinies, life and death, …  
It tells the story of young Tomak through his initiatic journey.  
The Death Grass Spirit is never far…   
  
This story is related to the short story "Lazaro Franco's Fourth Hour" published in Heaven's Door.
75af0223-9b40-46c5-9302-b98dcfc1e5fd: A spin-off manga based on The World God Only Knows. Features short stories that take place on a train.
2a3fff79-557b-4008-8fc3-c5abdde5573e:
Ran is a bright and energetic first year junior high school student who possesses supernatual abilities. Together with Midori (A troubled girl who posesses similar abilities) and her childhood friend Rui, the threesome are constantly embroiled in mysterious circumstances. Ran and Midori must learn to deal with their abilities and the prejudice and fear of those people who refuse to accept them because of it.

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%83%86%E3%83%AC%E3%83%91%E3%82%B7%E3%83%BC%E5%B0%91%E5%A5%B3%E3%80%8C%E8%98%AD%E3%80%8D%E4%BA%8B%E4%BB%B6%E3%83%8E%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88#%E6%BC%AB%E7%94%BB%E7%89%88)
f5d9ebc1-2271-413b-9500-b03ae1934f0c:
Japan is ravaged by a new form of influenza so lethal, that only one person out of a hundred thousand can survive an infection. What is this virus and what does it do? Why is there no cure, even after five years?  
  
Kazuma, a man able to withstand the infection of the unknown virus, "Cherubim [kerubimu]," has obtained the power to save his twin sister from facing the influenza! While Kazuma saves other people's suffering by using his new power, he will also encounter many surprising and painful things… A serious and comedic story of new abilities begins!
789233e9-4ded-439d-a859-bba99d78ae54: In the year 2199 a diving mecha gains consciousness, with the help of a Guardian of Atlantis crystal, and declares war on mankind. Believing that if humans are allowed to live, the Earth will die, the robot builds an army to cleanse the Earth of the human race. The robot, who calls himself Absolute, also learned how to use the “Light of Atlantis” power source to raise the city from the depths of the Atlantic ocean, and turn it into a robot city. There are humans that hold crystals as well, but it’s taking all the power they have just to keep themselves alive. For 100 years Absolute did everything in his power to wipe out the human race…until the day the first Guardian of Atlantis, Saturn, returned to Earth to reclaim his city. Upon arriving, Saturn reluctantly teams with the humans to try to defeat the mighty Absolute. Saturn and the other 5 Guardians, must find a way to reach New Atlantis, and destroy Absolute if they are to reclaim the city…and reclaim Earth.
e1eb1b29-71d1-469a-bbf7-3a78417bf5d6: Do I have the ability to make people happy? Although I haven’t studied it, but if I work hard, I definitely can find a way.
902273ec-5405-4f34-aecf-5946d88eca33: In order to search for her lost lover, Ariel drifts to the army frontier. Although Captain Arthur promises to help Ariel, he can’t help but fall in love with her… Arthur is faced with a predicament that he doesn’t know how to deal with as more secrets are revealed…
2c971edb-4c20-4f6a-a054-4bda084a9f71: Kyoushirou the mercenary is cursed with immortality after a battle with a strange man, and after years of wandering in loneliness, he finds himself out of place in modern day Japan. There, he discovers a young girl who is the descendant of his former enemy, Tokino. Though he desires revenge, can Tokino's kindness mend his tortured heart?
18303616-5df6-449d-8466-21b67cbdfe17:
Collection of short stories.  
  
Title story is about Yumetsugu, a shrewd businessman who'll take people's nightmares away for a fee.
69cf6c80-7772-40d2-8843-b90bd14d349e: Eruna Ichinomiya is a third-year junior high school student who has not decided on which high school to attend, and spends her days skipping school and playing games at home. One day, Eruna's eyes are captivated by a photo of Seisa Mikagura in a pamphlet for Mikagura Private Academy, given to her by her cousin, Shigure Ninomiya. Feeling that it is fate, Eruna decides to attend Mikagura Academy. However, Eruna discovers that Mikagura Academy is a school where only cultural clubs exist, and that it has an intense battle system where students with special powers must fight each other as representatives of their own clubs.
e833c108-6342-4efa-bb82-738d075f277c:
Each year, the villagers of a certain mountain village hold a festival to celebrate the harvest. Tominaga Yuuki, a 17-year-old born outside the village, is chosen to play the role of purifier in the Oni exorcism, the festival's most important ritual, opposite 3-year veteran of the dance Kurashina Hana, his female classmate. In the days leading up to the festival, Yuuki gets more and more fru  
strated with his role, until he starts to see…?
725fcdf3-f5cf-45e3-a4c5-9883edbd4783: Buyer beware - when video game obsessed Kaito Suzuki mysteriously receives a game called Gamerz Heaven, he gets a lot more than what he bargained for! Not only is he playing the game, he finds himself being sucked into it! With a boy named Nata serving as his "Navigator" in the game, Kaito will have to eliminate all of the monsters before he can enter the Second Zone. Things become difficult when Kaito realizes that losing this game had deadly implications for the real world!
da704103-3ba9-4cf4-ab4a-6ba1565e6f20: A serial killer is on the loose, and the authorities are stumped! But little do they know that this unusual case requires unusual sleuthing methods. That's where Mako Miyoshi, home detective extraordinaire, and Kyosuke Kagami, a shikigami user, come into place. Together, they'll investigate the supernatural crimes, but have they started something that might be too much for them to handle?
171fec2d-2b47-4871-b90a-b2644995dedb: From Aerandria Scans: At first, she might seem just a cute girl, pretty like a doll, but as soon as she opens her mouth, it becomes clear that she’s a really shrewd and independent girl! Her name is Koume and she has a “date with destiny!” She meets one very cool “tiger-master” and one very hot “tiger-tamer” and they are both handsome young men… But what is the truth about them?
5a596544-e971-463e-a7e6-94e5fc901cd6:
The popular Idol group "X Girl" is going to perform at a live venue and fans are eagerly awaiting their appearance. 
But this time, the three beautiful sexy idols are high up in the sky on a secret mission, so they descend upon the concert venue with their airplane's cockpit damaged.
b293c820-3cbf-4115-be3e-a55b8ee9bff3:
Kael (aka Ryu Shiho) was a menace in his angelic form, harassing other angels whenever he got the chance to. Therefore, the heavenly fathers decided to expel him to the human world, hoping that his behaviour would improve. But… They guessed wrong. His attitude didn't get any better at all, and to top it off, humans now call him "Lucifer" because of his evil deeds and his scary eyes. If he ever wants to see the doors of heaven open up to him again, he has to perform a hundred good deeds… Will this task prove to be impossible?  
  
Note: This manhwa was discontinued after volume 5, it has not been completed at all, i.e. not even a rushed ending.
d7a54def-ccc5-4f42-8e3f-13cea8e4bd8c:
Our protagonist Jo Cheul-Hee is a delinquent who enjoys picking fights and aims to take control of his new school where he gets transferred, but what he doesn't know is that it's an all girls school.  
  
Being the only male student there, everyone thinks he is gay!
7511b858-06e5-414d-b343-467ea468efdf:
A story about two young demons who are always slacking off at work, a place that happens to be an organization that vows to keep the balance between the worlds of the living and dead by killing humans!  
  
Vol 1&2 contain a small short story about a robot with a mission to 'save humans'
fc9fc6f6-2197-4951-b36c-9e3880023b29:
Long ago a magical cat disguised as a human woman fell in love with a human man. It is said that during their time together they even had children. They say that afterwards, the magical cat dwelt happily as a human, that she ascended to the heavens and became a cat-god, and is even now watching over the world of cats and men.  
  
Of those descendants, the cats of Cat Forest Town say that they have mysterious powers. The townsfolk care for the cats as their guardian dieties, and the cats, too, have become attached to the humans.
e39f0ca3-5f6a-4be5-8947-a18c1b6378ec:
Nearly half the population of Sakurada, a small town near the Pacific Ocean, has some sort of unique power. These powers range from being able to enter the mind of a cat to resetting the world back to a certain point in time in the past. There is a group known as the "Kanrikyoku" that controls and monitors the use of these powers. Asai Kei and Haruki Misora work for their school's club called "Houshi" club, which execute any missions received from the Kanrikyoku. Misora has the ability to reset the world three days. This means that all events and any memory of the past three days that "could have" happened, never happened. Kei has the ability to "remember" the past. Even after Misora uses her powers to reset the world back three days, Kei will retain those three days in his memory. Combining their powers, these two solve missions issued by the Kanrikyoku  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18950)  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for live action move.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18949)

f07b92fc-2d37-49b4-a837-eff9ec834ef5: The Grimoire of Marisa (グリモワールオブマリサ Gurimowāru obu Marisa) is the third official Touhou book. Its focus is mainly on spell cards of many characters with screen shots of that spell card from the games, and comments written in the perspective of Marisa Kirisame, as she has made this album or scrapbook. It has art by Moriki Takeshi and Genji Asai.
3e55208a-76cc-4da7-bda3-c244976c99f4: The manga's story is an homage to Edogawa Rampo's The Boy Detectives Club novel series. The mystery centers around Mayumi Hanazaki, a middle-school girl who used to live with her aunt and uncle until a mysterious person mercilessly killed both. Now, thanks to an unusual incident, Mayumi relies upon the spirit of the legendary detective Kogoro Akechi to solve cases.
5ed843e2-8332-4e97-abc8-cc1913173630: A boy loses his parents in a supernatural disaster known as a "Curse" and is then adopted by the Tsuchimikado family; a family that exorcises curses. Ten years later and the boy has become the head of the family and now goes about exorcising curses all the while trying to balance his job as an exorcist and his life as a student in high school.
6c4fa6d8-2acc-4977-8c55-3588d0e89ced: Koudaira Yuuhei has had trouble finding an apartment, mostly because he doesn’t have a lot of money. When one rental agent agrees to take him to a cheap place he knows, he’s a little freaked out by the garlic necklace the man wears, but he goes anyway, and falls almost instantly for the landlady, a pretty young woman named Touno Tsukiko.
ab608133-dd59-4e07-8e12-1aa6e42145a1:
“What is happiness?”
  
This story follows the adventure of Takeo, the most unfortunate girl in the universe.
Takeo goes to school and lives alone in a inn called Hyakkisou (The Manor of 100 Demons), but her life begins to change the day she sees the youkais…
c1de707c-fb56-439e-b23d-5f7e36ec71af:
Juri Yukawa lives with her NEET father and brother, her retired grandfather, her sister (a single mother) and her young nephew. One day, her nephew and brother are kidnapped for ransom. Having only 30 minutes to meet the demands of the kidnappers, Juri, who realizes there is not enough time to prepare the money, decides to head for their rescue by herself with knife in hand when her grandfather uses a mysterious stone passed on in the Yukawa family to stop time. In a world where everyone and everything are inert, Juri and her father and grandfather run to rescue the two. But at the kidnappers' hideout, they soon realize they are not the only ones who can move about in this still world…  
  
- Nominated for the 4th Manga Taisho Awards in 2011.
691563b3-ae9b-4663-8210-6d3a48df96fa: Collection of strange horror stories (in the vein of juvenile horror authors, such as R.L. Stine), from the master, Takahashi Yousuke.
830c4a7d-7dbc-4f6c-a361-ddeb4fc925f8: Do you want to understand the meaning of life? Do you really want to live?
e476c383-9111-4a81-a2ed-3e3622c2e2d2: Students at the Military Academy in the 15th Hierarchical City of Torifune are studying in order to become officers or soldiers for the Novus Orbis Librarium. Mai Natsume is a boy who was transformed into a girl and she spends most of her time hanging out with her fellow female classmates. They get into loads of quirky situations that are only made more bizarre by the magic dispersed in grimoires and other objects in the school. This is a manga based on the BlazBlue fighting games. Many characters from the BlazBlue game appear at the Academy.
ef4049ee-b156-481d-bfac-affae11deab6: A 32-year-old aspiring mangaka, Kazuya Mukai, falls off the rooftop of his old elementary school during a drunken stupor. When he wakes up, he finds himself 20 years in the past, and even his body has regressed to that of a sixth grader. Now that Kazuya has a chance redo his life that had been full of disgrace and humiliation, he hopes to win the heart of a little girl and his first crush, Anna. However, his feelings only lead to whole new tragedies.
14e0687d-f240-455a-a91d-af536c422c88: It's tough being a ghost in the modern era. A group known as "The Seven Wonders" are distressed by the lack of children taking tests of courage to the school that they haunt. Without children who believe in them and perpetuate ghost stories, they will eventually cease to exist! Can they figure out how to instill fear in children, or is the modern world already scary enough?
6b08c5dd-9801-4e58-8e65-f15b91c7223a: You are already a fish in my fish bowl. I am originally a fish.
0308b627-23e3-496b-bd13-8fd7c7265b64: A retelling of sorts of the first Dragon Quest Monsters game focused more on adventure and jokes than saving Terry's sister.
e54b20ef-8db2-4e9a-ba6c-e7e226eded35: In the twenty years since the Hinamizawa disaster, the small village has become a literal ghost town. Terrible rumors about the mysterious gas leak that claimed hundreds of lives have kept even the most curious at bay. But on this night, fate has led five strangers to the abandoned mountain hamlet-among them a certain Mion Sonozaki. As the footsteps of the living echo through the abandoned halls of Furude shrine, the sleeping demons of Hinamizawa stir once again... [Yen Press]
6609231d-e687-473f-9cdb-c6b84157623e: Selma is one of the most beautiful women you might ever see.  Wherever she goes, everyone - both men and women - are captivated by her charms.  But wherever Selma goes, death also seems to follow - for she is no ordinary woman...
9ecafef6-bdea-4934-bc15-c37a06e1b138: ミステリ漫画の金字塔『Q.E.D. ー証明終了ー』新シリーズ、スタート！ 水原可奈はハーバード大学の新入生として、燈馬想はマサチューセッツ工科大学の研究員として、アメリカを舞台に難事件に挑んでいく！！
569963c5-6b0b-4f92-b561-e1304b78b0dc: Spin-off series about the everyday life of the members of the Armed Detective Agency and the Port Mafia.
22439875-ccf0-435d-917b-e714255e27cc:
Noel Cerquetti, a girl who lost her arms and legs in a contract, works together with the great devil Caron, to get her revenge against one man.  
  
This man – dubbed the "pride of the citizens" – is Burrows, the mayor of LaPlace.  
  
Why is this girl furiously seeking revenge against this unrivalled man, loved by the people for bringing peace to LaPlace that was once overrun by the mafia?  
  
While unsteady without her limbs, Noel doesn't give up on her path of revenge, as Caron watches mercilessly, at times risking his own life to support her.  
  
With vengeance, the pair begins their chase after Burrows.
6f35b5b8-abb5-4715-bbe7-05d5d9e74ee0:
Keinoshin and Shotaro are students who spend their after school hours as Dark Hunters. Darkness and light both exist in the world, and it is their job to protect the balance between them. Kei and Sho used to be close friends when they were little, but now they are only reluctant partners. At school, they're seen as opposites--the cool and aloof Sho and the cute and friendly Kei. However, they must work together if they want to stop the forces of darkness. Their first case of the manga involves the mysterious vanishing of many cats and dogs in the area, and a second involves a little boy who can see the 'ghost' of an old homeless man he had befriended.

(from mangaupdates)
87a73a46-6439-4666-b590-12a18c6b674b: Hatate Souta, a young man who can see the "flags" that stand at the crossroads of life, transferred to “Hatagaya Academy”, a prestigious school in the metropolitan area. Not only does he meet beautiful girls in his busy school life, he even goes as far as living with them under the same roof! Surrounded by these flags, this enviable romantic comedy begins!
099992b1-ce62-4a28-8133-d39c004ab470:
She is someone with the nickname “Seatmate Killer”, and also one of the prettiest girl in the school. Every male student that became her seatmate has confessed to her, and all of them got rejected brutally. The one who became her new seatmate, the seat being located the furthest away from the front and beside one of the windows, thus being a godly seat that will make every male student jealous, is Narito Yuki. He is someone that generally you won’t notice at all. The entire class thought that he will fall for her in a short time, but that may not be the case……
___
[Alt Official English (Tentai Books)](https://tentaibooks.com/novel-author/aresanzui/)
4fd144b8-fc47-4cf4-afc7-9191d88dcc4a:
Amae Yuuya, an office worker in his third year of employment, is completely exhausted by the daily grind. Then, for the first time in seven years, Yuuya meets Aoi Shiratori, a girl eight years younger than him who used to live in his neighborhood. She had grown up to be a beautiful JK girl who was good at housework, and she said to him,

"Yuuya-kun, would you like to live with me under the premise of marriage?"

Aoi desperately wants to live with Yuuya, her first love. Yuuya, who is puzzled, agrees to live with Aoi as a guardian for the time being, but Aoi's aggressive approach makes him very nervous inside.
___
[Japanese Light Novel](https://firecross.jp/hjbunko/series/492)
7e5916f3-e271-4041-805a-23b932bb5b91:
Katagiri Naomi, a high school student who lived alone for two years, meets a beautiful girl with black hair and blue eyes, who moves into the apartment next door. The girl's name is Yui. It seemed that she really was a noblewoman, and her nickname was "Quderella" because of her nonchalant attitude at school. Naomi knows that Yui doesn't want to depend on others, but she's actually quite naive, so Naomi decides to help her.

"Today what are we having at night... Karaage chicken, huh?"
"That's right because the price of chicken is discounted today"
"I love your fried chicken so I'm really looking forward to it"
4aa0f10f-1333-4f01-a6da-5316f6a51c40: Một manga khác thuộc D4DJ, lần này câu chuyện sẽ xoay quanh về Photon Maiden - một unit gồm những cá nhân tài năng nhất Nhật Bản, được tuyển chọn gắt gao với quy mô toàn quốc. Một câu chuyện chưa từng được kể về cuộc sống của 4 thành viên Izumo Saki, Niijima Ibuki, Hanamaki Towa, Fukushima Noa.
142cd3cb-73c5-4f42-a604-62c68bf28f49: Sela Seo is a high school girl who has a complex about her deep voice. Ever since she was teased about her voice in middle school, she has been unable to say what she thinks out loud and has been unable to fit in with her class. In Sela's class was another outcast, Tatsuto Narukami, a boy who always wore headphones. She assumed he was just another “loner” like herself, but when she saw him singing behind the school building during lunch break, her feelings changed.
66fdcdd7-5a0e-4f55-8fd1-da732aa194e2:
"If you really can make me the center of the group... I'll marry you."

Mizuki Natsuno is the least popular member of the idol group "Melty Strawberry." Koichi Okuda is the only person in the world who continues to support Mizuki. Two people who should never be connected, end up in a cooperative relationship under one roof, working her way up from the bottom of the ranks to become the leader of the group.
30b89356-952c-4a72-9d8c-cf44147e881a:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)
___
* [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
67ffb21f-1351-4caf-be96-924c4df57341:
Anzu is a high school girl living under the strict control of her mother, in a household where the idea of defying her will is unthinkable. With no smartphone and no allowance, one of her few escapes is sneaking away to a nearby CD shop and listening to music.

But one night, in the plaza outside a train station, she encounters a shady-looking guy who has the looks of a devil... but plays the guitar like an angel.
cc35ae71-ca7b-4a52-b5db-477f866300c3:
"Wouldn't you like to hear my love song?"

Shiori failed to make friends upon entering school, thus, she spends her time as a loner. The only support for her is the music of her favourite singer "Kanade," and she eagerly awaits the release of his new song. Then, by chance, she finds out that  this "Kanade" is actually her classmate, Utsumi! She can't believe she's about to meet her crush in real life, but to her suprise, once they're face to face, Utsumi asks her to be his girlfriend so he can experience love to be able to write a love song. 

A pure, heart-pounding love story that will make your heart skip a beat!
be7fd0c5-209a-440c-b20d-8b611be1310c: "I can't say my own name," says Ooshima Shino. When she enters high school, she makes her first friend. Communication full of nothing but awkwardness begins. Suitable words always come to mind after some delay. But adolescence can turn even a klutz into a star… right?
1c096629-862f-4438-8c17-1c18bc3fec7d:
I believed it was destiny that brought us together. It's my irreplaceable home, warm like spring sunshine. Therefore…
Here is the newly depicted story of the lost girls from the TV anime *BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!*. (Comic Growl)
fb15cd42-cf00-480b-a6c6-12b61fe6a1ac: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
692394c0-da1d-4746-af83-4043a2c4a66a:
High school student Gou Karube is a big fan of Noa Mukanae, a member of the VTuber idol group "Hoshigaoka High School". Gou dedicates both time and money to support Noa, and his hard work has become famous amongst her other fans, the "NoaTomo". 

Noa, whom he's devoted all of his youth to supporting, one day decided to hold a solo live show, which had been her dream. Her fans were supposed to witness the moment when her dream came true... is how it should have been.
60f94690-3fb7-4405-9f83-3120267fa6fa:
Tajima Sora was an idol at the peak of popularity when she died and now the people who had gone crazy over her are slowly returning to days where they have forgotten everything about her.
Mizu'umi is a high school girl who cannot accept this fact because the late idol is a god-like existence to her. So one day, 2 years after her idol's death, she committed a taboo act.

This is a young adult fiction about an everlasting and undying idol and is dedicated to the current times where feelings of "like" are concentrated.
0e8fac17-979e-4e37-8f45-2c334b25d6dd:
Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…

*Source: Kodansha Comics, Vol. 1*
d74a8591-a02f-4d43-b110-7b8a65cec6ca: Kamine Shouta is a boy who is able to "see" people's hearts, though the ability has caused him to distance himself from people. His meeting with saxophone player Tokisaka Hibiki changes both of them for the better, and Tokisaka convinces Kamine to join the school concert band. Now Kamine, who knows nothing about music, will have to use his ability to win over the band's section leaders in the hopes of leading the band to the national competition next year… as its conductor!
0976963e-c0b4-4bdc-abde-831e9cb29cc2:
Urumin may be an idol—but she can’t sing, can’t dance, and her attitude is anything but sweet. And yet, she has one loyal supporter: Kimiya, her only fan in the enitre world. Their relationship isn’t quite like your typical idol-and-fan story… in fact, it’s a little weird!?

A heartfelt and hilarious rom-com about a hopeless idol and the one guy who keeps cheering her on. An “adorably devoted” love story that’ll make you say”this is what pure love looks like!

*Source: Mangamo*
8f5bc041-86a5-483b-abbf-abc8dd093a76: Shin is a high school girl whose hobby is quietly uploading her original songs to the internet. When an unexpected character responds to one of her songs, her blinded youth suddenly picks up with a boom!
485a777b-e395-4ab1-b262-2a87f53e23c0: Piyohiko has a dream: He wants to be a succesfull guitar-player. Then this guy Jaguar shows up, and coaxes him into playing the 'recorder'. Thus ending Piyohiko's noble dream.
e50d87b5-04e8-457c-acec-67becdbbd0d7:
The story follows Fujii To-y, lead singer of GASP, and his attempts not to sell out during his rise through the recording industry. 
It also follows To-y’s growing relationship with Niya, who find comfort in one another while they are shunned by mainstream society.
2b22a9ca-7620-4826-aff4-c8c91129dc61:
High school girl Juuna Harumi's purpose in life is to support the idol Fuwari Tsukishiro!

One day, the idol group Fuwari belongs to disbands. In her despair, Juuna learns that Fuwari will be trying out for an idol audition program. There will be a total of 100 participants - in order to lead her idol to the top, Juuna decides to take part in the audition herself and work behind the scenes.

(Source: MangaUpdates, edited)
7e905fc7-d534-479e-9880-f89effbf30e2: Oogami Haru, a high schooler troubled by her childish appearance and contrasting deep voice secretly uploads videos of herself singing on the internet. One day, when her classmate Narumiya Yuu finds out about this, instead of the ridicule she expected, Yuu instead invites Haru to form their own musical group...
3fb29e6a-8c33-4b92-bc00-ae96931bf160: Ebisawa, who plays guitar and sings in a band, was inspired by Shake's guitar playing and singing in "The Salmons." Determined not to lose, he pushed himself harder. Though his efforts paid off and Ebisawa gained popularity, the seemingly unbridgeable gap between himself and Shake eventually broke his spirit...
486c4a96-ccbb-47f3-959e-f2d5d97c54cf: A feud? A dating rumor? What's the drama between the hottest member of DOT, Yoon-chan, and the leader of the group, Kang Sol?
3ac55057-52e9-471d-a208-7a684cad8ac6: The rude guy Hibari met at the ramen place turns out to be Gaku, a band member attending her art school. As she gets pushed around by him, her "normal" world begins to change drastically.
bce90ee1-4a1d-4a64-a01e-2463cf1be061: アイドル養成校「初星学園」に通う高校生・藤田ことねの夢は大金持ち！トップアイドルとなり貧乏な家族を支えるため、夢を追っていた――が、ことねはアルバイトに明け暮れる日々で、アイドルとして芽が出ず苦しんでいた。ある日、バイト先の寂れた商店街を盛り上げるため、ことねは簡易ライブを開催。トップアイドルには程遠い現実を痛感し涙する彼女の前に、「初星学園」のプロデューサー科に通う生徒が現れ…！？
1d7ea8d7-f924-4f0b-aebe-da4303aa4dd3: As an elementary schooler, Araki Yuuhei saw a live music show and was deeply inspired. Now in middle school, he reunites with his music-loving friend Matarou and gets a strange crescent-shaped guitar. From there, Yuuhei becomes obsessed with guitar and ends up performing at his first live show with Matarou!
e6ead041-631d-4294-a1b7-d0c48b572134: Serizawa Asahi, Mayuzumi Fuyuko, and Izumi Mei, members of the idol unit *Straylight*, openly declare themselves as rivals. While they occasionally clash, they further polish their talents, shining even brighter. The new manga adaptation of the game *The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors*, compatible with the *Enza* platform, is here!
5985d431-a60c-460c-8256-ddd0133d852f: The band Mayonnais has never had an audience at their live shows. So they pray to God for someone to listen to their performance, but who appears before them?
baf1346f-14c7-4749-9754-457bf90bd14a:
Bored by his life as a ninja, Asagiri Jūbee runs away from his village in the hope of becoming a great pianist. To this end, he approaches high-school girl and piano prodigy Ibuki Aya, begging her to take him as a disciple. But she has a better idea: letting her childhood friend Otonashi Kanade teach the man instead. Problem is, Kanade gave up on piano, thinking he could never reach Aya's level… What results will the alliance of piano and ninjutsu bring about?  
  
Published in January 2019 in the Weekly Shōnen Jump.
396db045-15f2-4227-8cf1-46b7f936a7ac:
Levou, the half human and half dryar who can communicate with crows, tells of their life story. Tis a tale which tells of their adventures throughout their stormy youth.

Warning! The series will contain mature elements! eg. Violence, nudity, very sensitive topics, etc. These themes won't be the main focus nor do I intend to belittle the severity of these topics, nor do I desire to offend any individuals.
be9f4d62-459a-489a-895d-b6ca6c5fd81b:
She, the prodigious girl that stood at the pinnacle of the Global Martial Arts Competition, won the championship for five consecutive years, dominated the arena, and was dubbed the undefeatable king! He, a top tier superstar born into a wealthy family, possessed transcending beauty, was cold and black bellied, and had countless fans. When she accidentally reincarnated, as his fiancée, a sky full of blackmail material from trivial white formicas flying around, facing a world full of black fans, Lin Fan laughed coldly: If the whole world dissed her, then she’ll make the whole world tremble! Even if the wind blows against her, she would never back down!  
  
  
tl/n: white formicas(白富美）are slang for women who have fair skin, are financially capable, and are beautiful
143ed116-c9cb-4755-80a8-706bcbadfb71:
"Why is my favorite singer singing my song!?"

Tsunagu Kurose, a high school student with a passion for musics composing but a terrible singing voice, often receives criticisms whenever he posts them on the Internet. One day, while shouldering the responsibility of taking commemorative photos of the culture festival reluctantly with Otoha Hinomori - a quiet classmate sitting next to him, his childhood friend Tetsu Tamura was in a dilemma because of unavoidable accidents occuring on the stage run by his club. Without hesitation, Tsunagu gives him the demo instrumental songs he composed to save the situation. Unfortunately, Tetsu open the wrong music file with Tsunagu's terrible lyrics, making him feels like he wanna hole up due to that unfortunate disaster. In despair at this miserable situation, Otoha takes off her thick glasses, tightly grips the microphone and hums that song! 

"Isn't this voice similar to icy - the singer I've always admired...!?"

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
eeeba4c1-fda6-40eb-aa65-a25073d499ab: A collection of short stories about Boryo, centered around the theme of music (with mild sexual descriptions).
d58abdf4-9268-41d8-9920-f8fe8858a173: Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo. A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt... till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.
6eb6806e-17ea-4876-b86b-b091084eea0f: Ayamo, a girl who admires rock stars, comes across a band called "Devil Drive", and she has to fight the existence called "Junk" that devours people's power of Yin? No Music, No World! The indestructible soul of rock leads to an unlimited battle and romance.

Komatsu "Hachi" Nana is a 20-year-old Genki Girl from the countryside with a bad habit of falling in love at first sight.   
Oosaki Nana is a 20-year-old punk rocker from a different small city, who's coming off a bad breakup with her boyfriend (and former bass player of her band).   
When "Hachi" decides to follow her boyfriend to Tokyo, and the other Nana heads there to start her music career, the two young women meet by chance on a snowbound train. They rent an apartment together several days later.   
Surprisingly realistic drama and an oddly romantic friendship ensues.

Currently on an indefinite hiatus since 2009 due to the mangaka's health.

After an incident with his own impoverished parents, Daon is suddenly growing closer to Sunghyeon while balancing feelings for his former tutor, Jaemin. With mixed emotions and unspoken secrets, will Daon be rich with love or fall back into poverty?
