dcbe56a5-d154-4709-8b00-bf263b083f7c:
One day, Valen, a Librarian for the continent’s greatest magic tower, accidentally discovers an ancient book in a hidden part of Sainbritt Tower’s library… ”Through this book, you shall experience the same glory that I did.”  
Suddenly uplifted from a simple Librarian to walking the path of a great Magician set to become the Empire’s Hero– Valen’s journey to reclaim the future begins!
31b6cee6-ec62-4509-86be-fb9a3d432caf:
"…I'm screwed."  
  
On a normal day like any other, Duchess Juliana Auburn woke up from a dream. No, rather, it is I, "Lee Sian," who remembered my past life.  
  
Juliana Auburn was a character in a novel who did nothing but badmouth and find fault with her husband, his friends, and her own father who had forced her to marry an illegitimate man.  
  
According to a spoiler comment that she read, she will be killed at the start of the novel.  
  
"Why did I only remember everything now after I've already done all of those bad things to the male lead?!"  
  
In order to avoid the novel's "bad ending," Juliana plans to divorce her husband, Evan, the male lead….  
  
"I'll give you everything you want."  
  
"Don't you know that the one who falls in love first loses?"  
  
"Why should I apologize for staring at you because you're so pretty?"  
  
…Isn't my husband's obsession more serious than I thought?  
  
Promo based on the [webnovel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=4754414)
25a8c615-e226-40be-b9f7-acff007f6035:
"One day a crazy person knocked on my door."  
  
My house is a jewel shop. Someone keeps bringing a person in front of my house. Ojiram was so powerful that he treated me with curses. Others get along with them well.  
  
"Didn't you save the head of an assassination guild leader last time?"  
"She's a woman."  
"Oh, what about the vicious loan shark who owns the billion mark on Second Avenue?"  
"She's a woman, too."  
"Who left their carriage in front of a noble's house?"  
"It was a noble lady."
4344e8f2-eb56-4ff9-983b-9568d05ad08d: Suk-yun is Mr. Perfect from head to toe with crisp creases in his suit, a handsome and fit figure... and an expensive wristwatch dominating his timetable. To get over the breakup, Woo-in starts working for a cleaning company and just who is his first customer? The crazy messy junk-filled home of Suk-yun, Mr. (Not 100%) Perfect.
1c96088b-0506-4e69-8412-7da3e59cf66f: Yüzme takımının kaptanı Lee Kang için hayat, sürekli bir güç mücadelesidir. İster sporda ister yatakta - her zaman kazanır. e7311147-2d4a-4094-807f-bb39585417c4: Dungeons appeared in the world five years ago. Police and military are unable to enter these enigmatic spaces, and entry is permitted solely by the free will of individuals aged 15 and above. Leveling up is possible, fantasy items can be acquired, and for some, the transformation can lead to becoming astonishingly beautiful. Yuuta Rokujou has lived a life of being bullied since his kindergarten days. Due to this, he decided not to attend Dungeon High School that everyone else went to, rather, on his fifteenth birthday, he decided to challenge a dungeon alone.
030e6c39-7370-48c0-918e-6153e4a8828d: Higuchi Kotarou is a slightly cool sixth grader preparing for junior high school entrance exams. His mother died in an accident when he was young, and now he lives an ordinary but peaceful life with his busy father. One day, a mysterious girl named Misha moves into the room next door to Kotarou's house. When Misha finds out that Kotarou does not have a mother, she declares that she will be Kotarou's mother and wants to take care of him in any way she can. In fact, Misha is actually a half-human angel who came to the human world to stand on her own...
8280b28c-aeff-4f89-ac99-a4c783e14782:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Aesir's had enough of it! That's right. Aesir isn't quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world... meaning he's got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He's also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Aesir leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that's more his pace.
___

f6aae3a6-536f-4cdc-94b4-deccbedda939: Sudo, is an unassuming second-year junior high boy, who likes to draw. Kamoi-san, his classmate, is a middle school girl (JC) in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.
a2f26a6c-2ebc-4aec-a5ef-e9968c9f85fb: Yuito Kujo, a high school student, constantly compares himself to his exceptional older brother and sees himself as a lesser, "degraded version." Caught in a spiral of self-deprecation, his adolescence turns even darker when he discovers that his childhood crush, Suzuno, is in love with his older brother. But just as Yuito begins to lose hope, Suzuno's older sister, Kano—a college gal—develops intense, overwhelming feelings for him...!?
a53f4d4e-91fb-4242-b328-637fb32d0729:
The Gyaru sitting next to me is always sucking on a candy (or lollipop). She makes a "lero-lero" sound with her long tongue, as if she's trying to provoke me!

Any healthy boy going through puberty would look at that with a perverted eye, right?! Don't look... Don't look, me! If she finds out I'm looking at her in a lewd way, my school life is over...!!
ee96e2b7-9af2-4864-9656-649f4d3b6fec: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he gets involved with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...

20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is... appreciating lewd vide*s. "I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs." A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love... However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place! Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

Reito Harukaze, who had climbed to the highest rank of adventurers, had retired. One day, as he was thinking of living a quiet, retired life, a beautiful gal named Karen Hiiragi appeared before him.

Upon hearing that Karen was in trouble with money, Reito decided to give her a basic lecture on dungeon conquering.

He actually wanted to retire and live a slow life...

f3d3cf42-a12a-42f5-bd56-70b587eee06a:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

e2249870-322e-461f-9704-249d49d8fa89:
What if you find the cutest girl in your class, soaked in ditch? Sandai helped her... and his life changed from that day!

A high-school boy Sandai, who liked to spend his time alone, accidentally helped the most beautiful girl in his class, Shino, when she fell into a ditch near his home. He let her use shower at his home, and lend her some clothes, although he had never talked with her before.

From that day, she started to act like his friend. In fact, she seems to like him... but that can't be! She's the most popular babe in his high school! But what he didn't know was, Shino had never went out with a guy. She was not very good with guys, and Sandai was the first guy she could talk naturally with. As they spend time together, Sandai can't help himself to have special feelings for Shino.

(Source: BookWalker Global)

When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"

Ryuuto Kashima is a gloomy high school student. Because of a punishment game, he was forced to confess to Runa Shirakawa, a girl from the top of school caste and admired by everyone. They ended up going out for the unexpected reason of "Err, I'm free now so..." but, Ryuuto ends up following and eavesdropping Runa getting confessed by a handsome soccer club member, and Runa bringing Ryuuto, whom she just started dating, to her own room as a matter of course.

They have different friends and ways to have fun, different in just about everything. And yet, surprised by their differences everyday, accepting it, they begin to relate with each other.

Eri's crush is Seike Fumi, a high-spec ojou-sama from her school. But she was always too embarrassed to even talk to her... To help her out, Polero assigns Eri a series of "missions" to being them closer together - but the missions turn out to be a bit too bold and daring...!?
f9eef5bc-a46e-4542-b542-beae6b8cb2f9: Back in middle school, gyarus always gave me a hard time. I started high school hoping to change that, but... the girl sitting next to me is yet another gyaru! Though, she does seem kinda different than the other gyarus...
fc3ba74c-89e8-4391-92ed-07fbb0093427:
"Do you agree with this love, or are you very much against it?" 

What would you do if you finally found the love of your dreams but it is someone you shouldn't have fallen in love with? 

Ichibana is a girl who is a little bit girly and a little bit hot-tempered. She falls in love with Maki, a plain boy in her class, but just as she is about to confess her feelings to him, she finds out, to her surprise that he has a girlfriend!

557615b9-6fec-4ab7-a512-03cbde39815f: Kageyama, an unremarkable boy, secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa, saying, "Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school." He goes to karaoke with her alone. There, Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.
8c701f22-8ef9-4b0d-ae4e-0e17ac3cd074: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
aad8a8ac-2990-4f3c-be68-7bbb59a75a9e: Tatsumi lives a tired life because of his work at a sketchy company. His only reason for living and his passion is reptiles. Kotani lives next door to Tatsumi and unexpectedly one night after a misunderstanding ends up helping him create a channel to talk about reptiles.
215e3ced-247e-4f34-8e1a-27b60ffef8ac: It's a secret that I'm dating the love of my life at school. There's no way I can tell anyone, especially when we're both girls. But I can't help my feelings from slipping out in the background. It's not the ideal way to be a couple, but I can put up with it because I really love her... But such loneliness has also nurtured dark thoughts in my head.
70d9492e-1e5f-4335-8ac7-d73482176297: Hajime, a shy dog groomer with decent looks but little confidence, has never really stood out. One day, Mahiro, a high school girl he has always treated like a younger sister, suggests he try a dating app to find a girlfriend. Taking her advice, Hajime gives it a try—only to fall into a honey trap and suddenly end up saddled with a massive debt. The only path left for him… is to become a producer for underground idols!?
d8323b7b-9a7a-462b-90f0-2759fed52511: Shiki Tsubasa has just moved from Tokyo to Hokkaido in the middle of winter. Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country, he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home, but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However, he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!

641d88f7-e2cc-4c51-abec-6729042f2741:
In a world where opposites attract, a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent, painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds, their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns, delving into the shadows that haunt their lives. 

An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments, this manga tells about the complexities of youth, friendship, and your past catching up to you.
ce9e089e-b085-4e16-b41b-4a3343317572: Guesthouse Yadori is a seaside inn with a view of the Pacific Ocean. Also, it's run by a 34-year-old tanned gal! In an unexpected turn of events, a university student named Youichi Sakimori ends up freeloading there. The playful and alluring innkeeper Hana Yadori has him dancing in her palms from morning till night…!?
62a5c5e3-658e-41fc-a6fd-26153c31515d: Kuroizumi Ururu is an outstanding student and a great athlete, but she is also an extreme gal who ignores school rules. She wears heavy makeup every day, but when she goes to the public bath, she shows off her "no makeup" and her pure feelings of love! A love comedy about a strict student council president and a gal!
aa6c76f7-5f5f-46b6-a800-911145f81b9b: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
3faac3e4-12f0-46f1-b1fb-912c4f6f3042:
You don't know how I feel, so why are you being kind to me?

Yoshi, who is super-cheerful, has a secret after-school date with Fuji, a sober boy who is the complete opposite.
It's supposed to be "practice for Fuji-kun to find a lover", but Yoshi secretly has a crush on Fuji!?
If love is revealed, this relationship will end
But his heart throbs at times when Fuji-kun is too cool!
In fact, whereabouts of the love of the super brave Gal-kun...

A plain handsome guy who doesn't know love x a brave gal-kun who is timid about love.
9a1c3ea1-048b-4b97-b642-2f493039e771:
“XX is a cuck.”
“I hear OO is a slut.”
“I bet I can get her to sleep with me.”

During lunchtime, all the juvenile dirty talk was giving Oogami a headache. He left the classroom and went to the gym's storage room in search of a quiet place where he could be alone. There, Oogami saw Seri, another loner in his class, masturbating… or is she… urinating? Oogami tried to hide, but she had already noticed him watching. To Oogami's surprise, Seri suggests that the two of them can do something to “relieve stress” together…
